product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Bought this for the Sony RX100M3. It's a perfect fit, except the lens makes the camera too thick for comfort. So, XActo knife! I cut out a semi-circle for the lens--now it's ideal! The wrap-around flap still completely protects the camera, and the stick-out lens makes it easy to get the camera out when the flap is lifted.,I've tried a number of other cases, but this is the best. I like a belt case, and this has the loop. I wear it rearward of the right hip, and it sits in a spot where it's hard to see front on, yet easy to access. Sweet spot that does not interfere with sitting in a chair or car seat.,Only improvement, to my mind, would be a real snap instead of a magnetic one. The magnetic one is pretty good, but sometimes comes undone when putting on a seat belt, etc. Still, the flap keeps the camera securely in the case even when un-snapped.,Quality material & workmanship. I preferred a darker color, so wiped it down with black shoe dye, the rubbed with a cloth to get a darker brown antique-y look.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Fits the RX100 version 1 perfectly; can't imagine it wouldn't fit the RX100 II just as well.  Nice tanned leather; the strap matches the case (another reviewer said his didn't, but the set I got match perfectly).  A matching leather wrist strap is also included; it's a bit thicker than the nylon one that comes with the camera, and matches the case.  The case also has a leather-covered belt clip.  All I wanted was something to protect the camera, which I always keep in my briefcase or flight bag, and this is perfect.  The straps and belt clip might be useful to others.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: This is a very nice leather case for my RX100. Love the width-wise case, the combination of soft suede interior and durable leather exterior, the slightly lowered sides that allow the wrist strap to hang out, and especially the magnetic closure. Only reason I didn't give five stars was that the magnet part of the closure pulled out of the bottom of the case. After putting it back in a few times by reinserting the tabs, it broke. A testament to the quality of the leather work is that the metal broke before the leather gave way. I'll be ordering another if I can't successfully epoxy the closure back in.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Others has said they didn't like to color, and the company must have listened because my arrive dark brown.  Don't expect leather for this price it is vinyl. but I don't dare.  I am not buying a fashion accessories I simply want a protective case for camera.  I wanted a belt loop so when hiking, walking or bike riding I would have the camera ready.  I like the magnet closure as it makes it easy to get the camera out with no fumbling.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: I'm actually happy with the color.. I was looking for this case in the lighter, camel brown that some of the other Mega Brands cases are in, but I settled for this darker one.  When the case arrived, I was surprised to see that I had gotten a camel colored one!  A win for me, but this was have been super annoying had I been wanting the dark brown.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Nice quality, but the item was not as good looking as I hoped. It almost looked like one of those little clasp purses that you see women with at parties, so I wasn't interested in it for that reason alone.,Then, my Sony RX-100 m2 didn't fit very well. It fit the original RX-100 (m1) fine. RX-100 m3 also didn't fit.,It didn't seem like a very convenient design.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Under careful inspection, this one isn't genuine leather as described so I'm disappointed but it's very well designed and made. I use this, for sony RX 100v and fits well.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: This is an excellent and well made case that includes a shoulder strap and a belt loop.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: product is very useful, came  in as described ;  delivered in time

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Bought this originally for my Sony RX100m2 which it fit comfortably snug. When i upgraded to the RX100m4, the camera lens was too thick for the case so i cut out the shape of the lens in the case and it fits amazing! Sometimes you just have to innovate to make things work hahah

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: I got this to protect the camera when it was not in the bag I got for it, but I don't be using it.  It fits neatly, and it is light weight, but you have to take the case completely off in order to use the camera, and I found that hard to do without turning on the camera prematurely while taking it out, and again while putting it back.  Also, I would have to take off the lens hood in order to fit the camera into the case.  I have a neoprene case for my digital Rebel, and it attaches to the camera using a screw that fits the tripod connector on the bottom.  To use the camera, all I have to do is flip the case open.  I was hoping that was the way this camera case would work, but alas...

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Very nice will protect my camera nicely ,cameras are a huge investment ,so I don't take chances with mine ! These are light weight but will stop sticker bushes and other things from hitting against my camera when I decide to go off the beaten path. All my cameras wear one of these ,just for that purpose . Your strap comes out the side of it . So when walking climbing etc it's always protected .

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Fits my Nikon D5500 perfectly!! I read the measurements for this product and compared it to my camera measurements and it was very close so I took a shot and it's exactly what I've been looking for - fits snug around it to be able to throw it in a bag or purse for the day with some protection without having to lug around my entire camera bag. Most generic cases like this for DSLRs are much bigger than my D5500, I've tried a couple and been very disappointed so I am very happy with this purchase!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Got this for my SL1. It's about 0.5" too wide on the right side of the camera and 1"+ too long in the front with my 24mm pancake lens on, but the camera doesn't move around much inside. Overall a pretty decent fit. I think the looseness would make it easier and quicker for me to grab my camera from the sleeve when in my purse. I bought the pink, and it does not have the black rubber logo. It has the brand printed in white on the front.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: It fits my Canon SX60 HS very well. My only complaint is that its a little awkward to get the camera out. I seem to fumble at the corners. I also wish it had a slim pocket on the back. It would be handy to carry an extra SD card or battery in it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: worked well for what i got it for, protected camera in a large bag that had other stuff in it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Worked great for my trip. Closes a little snug but it definitely did the job. Would definitely recommend.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Bought this as an alternative to my backpack, as a quick cover while in the car. It appears that it will work fine. Exactly as described.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: A little hard to put the camera inside, but good product

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Seems like a well made case, but if you also order the Megagear MG499 LH-DC90 Lens Hood for Canon PowerShot SX60, be prepared for the camera not to fit too easily in the case.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)
review: After about 10 hours of regular use hanging the case from my beltloop with the carabiner, the case ripped. Bummer cause I liked it otherwise.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)
review: fits my G3X good.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)
review: tight fit protects camera.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)
review: Really useful and decent protection in not severe or extreme conditions.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Nice protective case, but I found some flaws.  First, it's easy to think that the camera is attached to the case when it's not.  I found out the hard way and the camera fell to the ground.  Fortunately, it works fine though it did get scratched.  Second. the strap attachments become loose over time, creating another opportunity for the camera to fall.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G3 X G3X Digital Camera (HotPink)
review: Prompt shipping, came in good condition. I would buy again. Thank you!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Great case. Only issue is the part covering the lens comes off completely when you want to take pictures. The bottom part unsnaps. You have to snap the separate piece back at each end  when protecting the camera.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Sturdy, yet lightweight. Neck strap perfect length to carry camera which allows instant access to camera.,Everyone is asking me where I got my new camera case!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Fit my Cannon G7 perfect. Color is as pictured. Soft case that comes with cleaning cloth for camera lense.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: very nice, quality leather, feels and fits good on the camera

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Changing from 4 to 5.  Really worked out well not having to take Canon out of a case-just open up.  Able to carry camera for longer periods as compared with my big Nikon.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Nice case for the money.  Well padded.  Very satisfied with purchase.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: Item was delivered as expected and the product fits it's purpose to protect the camera while I have it in my purse. Thanks!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: This case is beautiful. A few of my colleagues have commented that they're more impressed with my case than the camera itself. I usually leave the detachable top flap off, but I snap it on to protect my camera if it's bumping around in a crowded purse. The bottom piece screws on securely and offers a better grip than I get from holding the camera alone.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G9 X Mark II, G9 X Digital Camera (Black, Neoprene)
review: It is perfect!!,Great Item, Great Sale!!!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: The GoPro 7 Black I purchased is useful but not the level of of quality I expect from GoPro.,The good:,Great video, super pictures and works great with phone app. Does everything as advertised, and does it well.,The bad:,Unit gets hot, hangs up and or shuts down. When I say hot I mean very hot. Poor battery life <25minutes, I was experiencing hang ups and the unit would not respond at all. So I had to pull battery. That thing was smoking hot.,The ugly:,The battery that shipped with unit will not take a charge. Didn’t see that coming.,Turned off GPS, And everything else I could find, reduced picture quality , FPS and even lessened screen intensity and still gets hot and shuts down. OiVey!,Thank goodness I have a GoPro 6Black to back me up. I used its battery to power up the 7.,Final thought:,At the end of the day, I really don’t recommend GoPro 7 Black  until they get the energy and or heat issues resolved. What could be a great product is poorly realized.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: This little camera has a lot of functions. Solid build also picture and video is excellent. Only 3 things I can see so far that are cons. In the sun and recording or charging it can get pretty hot. But that can be fixed. Battery life isnt that great, especially when recording in 4K. But as long as you charge with at least 2.4A, it recharges quick. And the last thing is you cant charge while recording. That may be a safty feature to prevent overheating. So extra batteries would be a good idea. Other than those small issues the hero 7 black is pretty awesome. Thousands of applications and with great results.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I finally upgraded from my old GoPro Hero 3 I had years ago and I’m so glad I did! The picture quality is waaaay more clear, not to mention the camera comes with a built in touch screen on the back now and it’s waterproof enough to splash around without a case - so dope! The seller was fast and I got my product right in time for my little getaway to Mexico. Highly recommend the seller and product!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Soooo, I’m not a super tech savvy person but I have a son and I want to capture moments! I got this go pro because it seemed easy to use and the quality of pictures & video would turn out good.  We’ve only had it for a few days but so far it’s awesome! Hoping to turn into Peter lik one day. 🙌🏽,Looking forward to many more vacations with it and capturing moments!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: This is the best action camera ever!!! Super portable, light weight, easy to use and excellent video and audio quality. My only concern are two things. 1.- the battery life is low, but this kit comes with an extra original battery and a micro SD card big enough for take many HD videos and pictures. This will put you a step ahead saving money and time of purchase of those necessary articles. All this at the same camera body only price. 2.- Some times the camera freeze the image and you have to take out the battery to restared, I read this happen in all this cameras. I hope gopro fix the software to avoid this in the future. But only happen some times so isn't a big problem.,I love the features time lapse, 4k, 2.7k and 1080mp. The stabilizer function it's the best ever try and the 240hz is amazing. All this, the size and all the accesories that I can buy to get the best performance make me love this camera. I highly recommend this camera. I am very happy with this purchase.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: It kept freezing when I needed it the most  froze like 3 times and your not able to take out the battery to reset when your in the air

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Bought this for my snorkeling vacation after my Nokia AW started leaking. Haven't regretted it since... awesome pics and vids, the timewarp feature is a bonus, used it for my hiking adventures. Haven't had any problems thus far, with the exception of short battery life... at least one extra battery is a must.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: You can great some absolutely great photos & videos with this camera, but the battery gets used up extremely quickly, not to mention it can make the camera feel hot if used for a long period of time. Still worth it if you need a mini camera, just make sure you have spare batteries & the charging cable.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I just got my GoPro and haven't even had a chance to use it yet, and you are hounding me to write a review. Set up was super easy once I went online and downloaded a copy of the user manual that I could read. Why include a thick booklet with 15+ languages in it and the print is too small for a normal human to read? Make a booklet with English in it for those that make their purchases in English speaking countries and ask when the people purchase it online what their language preference is to send a manual in that language.,I do like the touch screen feature of the new GoPro Hero 7. That will make switching very easy.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Great action cam, the portability of this thing is where it shines as well as the mounting ability. Weatherproof durable and plenty of options for different circumstances.,It does freeze up every so often but formatting the sd card seems to fix it.,This deal where you get an extra battery for 10 dollars more than the camera costs by itself is a good little extra.,So far I love my little GoPro and bring it everywhere with me.,The stabilization on this camera is untouched by any DSLR, Mirrorless , and Phone. So if stable video is what you ultimately want there is nothing better.

product_name: Vmotal 12 Mega Pixels 3 inch LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video Camera Digital Students Cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Red)
review: I wanted a camera with a flash, that was rechargeable and took decent pictures at a reasonable price. This camera fit the bill. My only problem was the instructions. Seems they could have been a little more helpful and the formatting done at the factory. I'm 69 so that might have something to do with this also. If not for that concern I'd have given the camera a 5 star.

product_name: Vmotal 12 Mega Pixels 3 inch LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video Camera Digital Students Cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Red)
review: Used this while in HI for eight days. It took great pics of whales breaching, fin slapping and the beautiful blue waters in Maui. Would recommend because it is small, lightweight, easy to use and the pics were of great quality. I put my arm up, aimed camera and snapped in succession and still got great pics. Worth the money!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I recently purchased a new Canon PowerShot G7 X to replace an older Canon for use when traveling. On a trip, I take a lot of pictures – both of scenery and of food – and I want a camera (and camera case) to be to small enough to wear comfortably (and unobtrusively) around my neck all the time. I was pleased with the size of the G7 X, but found it somewhat difficult to choose a case that I liked for the camera. After spending many hours reading reviews, I decided to order 6 different camera cases to see which suited me best. Note that ALL the cases I ordered claimed to be compatible with the G7 X. Surprisingly, the MegaGear “Ultra Lite” Neoprene camera case was the only one of the six cases to suit my needs – all the other ones were either way too large/bulky OR too small for the camera (I felt like the lens was in danger of being crushed when these cases were closed).,PROS for the MegaGear “Ultra Lite” Neoprene case: 1. the G7 X fit perfectly – secure, but not constrictively snug; 2. the case itself was actually smaller than any of the other cases that I ordered – all the other cases were larger (L x W), but some had a shallower or less forgiving depth; 3. the case was easy to open quickly to allow for fast shots of unexpected photo opportunities; 4. the supplied carabiner secured the case easily to my own neck lanyard (I like a longer lanyard length; 5. the case is lightweight and is a stylish and unobtrusive basic black (but, for those more daring than I, it also comes in hot pink, blue, gray and red).,CONS for the MegaGear “Ultra Lite” Neoprene camera case: none really, once you get used to the Velcro closure. I had originally looked for a case with a top zipper opening, but found the MegaGear’s top flap Vecro closure worked well and was really no more “noisy” than a zipper.,* I am pleased with my purchase and would recommend this case to other Canon PowerShot G7 X owners.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I got this for my Canon G7x Mk2.  When it first arrived I was convinced that the camera would never fit inside it!  But its really stretchy and the camera along with a lens cap fits in perfectly, but tightly.  The belt loop and very secure and properly stitched and that combined with the tight fit means that you will not be able to get to the camera fast if its on your belt, so plan ahead.  Nonetheless, its a great sleek case, albeit with less protection.  And it squeezes down into a tiny size for storage.  The only thing I dont really like is the plastic clip, may have to break it off.,I also got the large amazon basics case for more protection, ie when tossing the camera into a backpack etc.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I really like this case. I agree with other reviewers who express concern about its ability to protect camera from a 3 foot drop. But if you want a case that will allow you to shove the G7x inside a bag or pock worry-free, it is perfect. All other cases were too bulky. It's also very compressible and so it's easy to quickly stow, leaving your hands free to shoot. I also like that I can keep the camera strap around my wrist while still having the case on the camera. That way you have the camera at the ready rather than trying to fish it out of a bag or disentangle it from a pocket. Can't comment on strength of belt loop as I don't carry it that way. My only real complaint is that it is VERY easy to deploy the lens accidentally while trying to squeeze the camera in. Unintentionally pushing  the side-mounted wifi button powers the camera "on" with the lens closed.  But once powered-up any shutter pressure (inevitable with this snug fitting case) will cause the lens to deploy.  Careful attention to where you press the camera will help, but I still have this problem. I'm thinking of trying the horizontal orientation instead.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Ordered this case my Canon G7XMKII. Arrived quickly and fit the camera great! It was slightly snug but once I get used to using it, it was a snap to pull my camera out of it with ease. I loved having the ability to attach it to my belt. It’s more or less why I ordered it. I carry my camera on me a lot...like a lot a lot.,I used it for approximately one week which included some light hiking and a flight across the United States. Still completely pleased with it. However, once I arrived in one of my destinations I took the camera and case off my belt one evening and found that the stitching that held the belt loop nylon on was beginning to tear. :( I didn’t feel confident in it after (didn’t want my camera to come flying off my belt once the stitching completely failed) seeing that and was forced to spend more money on a generic commercial case somewhere which was big, bulky and in my opinion not as cool as this one.,Summary:,It was relatively cheap and a good deal at first. Being small, compact and flexible it was the perfect case for what I needed it for. I REALLY REALLY wanted to like this case and use it A LOT but unfortunately the stitching just kind of looked like a weak point in the product. Not really an issue of quality but more of design. If they somehow remedied this issue I would most definetly get another one which I would attach to my belt indefinetly.,4 out of 5 stars because I just liked it so much. FIX IT PLEASEEEE :)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I purchased this case for a new Canon G7X MkII...  You can wrestle the G7X into the case, but it's tight, especially in the area of the lens/housing.  The Neoprene material and its stitching look fine, but I'm not sure it's worthy of protecting $700 camera from a drop onto a hard surface.  The limited stitching that secures the upper part of the belt loop may also be a weak point, unless your camera is very light in weight.  Removing and inserting a G7X isn't going to be a simple 'quick-draw' either, as the lens housing restricts the camera from being easily removed), so you're likely to miss a few photos.  All-in-all, the case is probably fine for protecting a lighter point-and-shoot from nicks and bruises while traveling around, but if you've got a better or more substantial camera you want to protect, I'd look for something else.  Not a big deal to me, but I did not get any lens cloth, as shown in the photo...

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Compact case for the new Canon G7X camera - and the Velcro on the flap holds down well.  Recommended for G7X owners (a great little camera BTW).  Nice padding and good workmanship.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I bought this for my Olympus Tough TG-4. This camera only has one connection area for a strap on one side of the camera. I attached both sides of my camera strap to that one connection.  With the strap around my neck, the camera hangs vertically. This case fits the camera perfectly with my camera strap. When the camera is in use, I like the extra strap with a clip to attach to my camera strap so I won't lose the case while taking photos.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: The actual dimensions are one 1.5 x 4 x 2.5. Not  even close to wat the description says and not nearly big enough to fit the G7X Mark 2. Clearly they never tried to put the camera in the case before they listed it in the title. Very irritating.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Bought this for my new Canon Powershot G7X Mark II camera. It's a very tight fit, and quite cumbersome to get the camera in and out of the case.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Bought this for my new Canon G7x MkII.  Fits perfect and because of the small size I can carry it with me all the time in my rolling briefcase or backpack.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: Modified this to fit my Sony RX100 IV. Fits really snuggly on the belt and the magnetic clip worked great.

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: It has met all my expectations of a camera carrying case.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: Purchase this camera for weekend adventures on the mountain and I must say the quality is amazing very very easy to use well built quality wise, easy to carry around. The bettery last very long time I used it during weekends and didn’t need to recharge it. Very easy to transfers the videos to your laptop. I am surprised how cheap this camcoder is as you get more than you paid for. Very happy I must say and would recommend to friend and family

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: It's a great little camera for the price, it's small and lightweight so it's easy to carry around. I found it very easy to figure out the menu options. I like how it comes with a remote so I can set it up and take pictures/video with the push of a button. The screen flips around so you can see yourself too. Overall super happy with this and can't wait to take it on vacation.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: Lovely camcorder. I tend to like to record at family gatherings so i thought something like this would be great. This has clear camera quality and works great. Its easy to use and simple to navigate. The buttons work well and it is a good overall camcorder i feel.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: It has a good balance between quality and price. It's a small camcorder that you can take it with you and take pictures at any time. It is very cool and easy to learn how to use it. I like this nice video camera.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: I like this camcorder cause it is light and can easy to take it everywhere. And also the price, I believe this is a really good quality I can get at this price. It is not use for taking very professional videos ,but it is good only for family video.To my surprise,the camera function is better than I thought.Overall, good product,satisfied.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: Great little camcorder for the price.I have used this camcorder to record my baby’s daily life since I received it. It is a wonderful product; it is lightweight, portable, and very easy to use,fits very well in my small hand and nice pictures.Definitely would recommend to my friends.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: Purchased this for an trip. At first my wife said whatever this is necessary as we have iphone to do video recording, but I wanted something more professional with more functions. After the trip, I was proven right that this had better quality than our smart phone's video. And it had more adjustable functions than smart phone to do more effect. It's easy to use with stable quality. Would recommend to anyone who needs a camcorder.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: I bought this camera for my teenage son to take a video on his favorite live show. I think he has started to love it. It is lightweight and in small size, with very high picture quality and audio quality is also fine. Functions and usage are not complex, and my son can handle it by his own.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: The battery has a great durability and I have to recharge it only after several hours of video recording.The video is of good quality, I am pretty happy with it. I have tried it outdoor as well and it is incredibly light to carry around.

product_name: Camcorder Video Camera Full HD 1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 18X Digital Zoom Vlogging Camera with 3 Inch Screen 270 Degree Rotation Screen (V10-GB)
review: This is my first camcorder, and I think I'm lucky that I chose the right one!It's easy to use, not difficult at all. Besides, it's not heavy.I use it to record my family trip, and my family are so satisfied with it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: FITS PERFECTLY. Looks nice and is compact. I like the attached loop.  I attach a belt hook to it and clip the hock to my pants belt loop to keep to store the case when the camera is in use.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: It fits well , but i thougt( woukd have preferred) the material would be slightly thicker, a bit more rigid. Would still be good just to keep safe in a hand bag or back pack

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Yey! It arrived super fast,  my canon sx 60hs fits perfectly! It's super light and pretty! I'm quite happy with this purchase!!!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Useful and good quality.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Really light and easy to use.  Easier than carrying the photo bag while out on photo excursions.  I have a camera sling that can carry the extra battery and card so I don't need any pockets on the case.  Fits my SX60 perfectly.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Works well, fits snug.  If you need a quick on and off this may not be the best thing...it does take extra effort to put on.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Nice when I don't want to carry case but want some protection when it's in my purse.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: Fits perfectly on my Canon Powershot SX60 SH.  I use it primarily as a cover for the camera while in my hiking backpack.  The case comes in a black pouch which was an unexpected surprise.  So far, it's proven to be a good product which I would recommend for it's stated purpose.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot SX60 HS Digital Camera (Gray)
review: It fit perfectly! Snug. It's good for storing my camera in my bag because it's not bulky.

review: Likely to be sending this little case back.  I purchased for the Canon G9 X Mark II.,Downfalls noticed on first opening and putting camera into it,1) it's a bit too small, the sizes of the leather push open/out as it's just a fraction too small.,2) BIG ISSUES::::: the camera appears to suppose to stay secured/screwed into the case and stay installed into the case. HOWEVER due to that configuration would seem impossible to take a picture with because the flap would be in the way (or at the very least annoying to have to hold down. product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I bought this camcorder as I was fed up with the quality of videos on my phone. I am looking forward to taking this camera around on my holiday. I did test it several times and it seemed really good with everything, the price is cheap. It's got a great quality video capability and I'm looking forward to taking it away with me!

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: My family and I plan to go skiing during the Christmas vacation. I got this camera for keeping the nice memory for my family since it will be the first skiing trip for us，hope it will works well.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: This camcorder I bought for my nephew. He really liked it. It’s long battery life , easy to use and good quality pictures and videos. It has wireless remote control also have nice case.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I love this little camera. I take pictures of property daily for work. Had it for a few months and charged it once. Holds charge, works fine. Great price.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I been wanting just to get a Video camcorder, just to plug around the house, parks, blogging, some easy to use but have some good quality, Im very pleased with this purchase, luckly i got this camcorder,i like it.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: It's an excellent budget-friendly starter camera, it has infrared night vision and supports remote control. The only thing else you need to buy is an SD card, but those are relatively inexpensive.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I needed a small compact camera for a vacation that I was going on. I did not want to spend a lot of money on one as I was going to be back packing out in the elements for over a week.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: I bought it for a child's birthday, so I was looking for something cheap but with a certain quality. The design is beautiful and the decent materials for what it's worth, it's small and it weighs little, which is also appreciated. The screen can be rotated to record or take selfie photos.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: The first look of this camera is over my expectations.This camera is in very good quality for a nice price.You can also control the camera by using the remote, which is convenient for me. I recommend people to buy this camera when you looking for a nice quality and lower price camera.

product_name: Camcorder 18X Digital Zoom Video Camera 1080P 30FPS Vlogging Camera Digital Camera with Remote Control 3” IPS 270° Rotation Screen
review: After using the camera for a couple of days, I am really happy with my purchase. I went back through all of my pictures and videos that I took with this camera and they all turned out good! This camera not only met but exceeded my expectations. If you are looking for an affordable digital camera that takes really nice pictures and videos, this is one for you!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Pros: great footage, stability is incredible, connects to phone, lots of settings and features.,Cons:Footage upload is unbelievably slow, camera gets hot, battery life when recording video is 15-25 min at best, took a bit of set up work and SD card formatting which was annoying.,I have a 13’ MacBook Pro and I am unable to edit the footage on GoPro Quik app because my computer is “out of date” and I need a better graphics card. This seems like an avoidable thing that GoPro could have worked out but when I called customer service they only suggested using a 3rd party editor....not at all what I expected. I have returned both hero 7 blacks that I bought and canceled my GoPro plus subscription.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I love the Hero 7 Black, just wish the battery would last longer.  Used on an off road jeep trip and had to change the battery twice in 3 hours.  As a pro photographer, I am used to my DSLR batteries lasting longer, but then it was running the entire time.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Just received this camera earlier today. Opened the box and discovered there is no manual! I have no idea how to set this camera up. I turned on the camera and the screen is fuzzy like looking through a shower door. Can't read any of the type on it and there's a picture of a turtle under water to try to read through as well. One would think that a camera so many people rave about would have a manual in the box. A piece of cardboard in the box says to load the app on your iPhone. I did that but it can't connect to the camera because I can't read any of the screens. I checked for any protective tape or coverings on the screen and there's nothing. It's glossy glass. I was hoping this was going to be a great camera considering the cost, but I'll try one of their competitors. GoPro is GoBack in the morning.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: No complaints. I wish the External mic adapter was cheaper. Menu system greatly inproved.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I use this camera to record my skating adventures

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Great little compact action camera, the only thing missing are basic instructions that should be included in box.  With that the only drawback the app covers this oversight, now off to get some accessories...

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: There are a lot of cheaper sport cameras on the market but there really is no substitute for a GoPro's quality and performance.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Pictures are a bit grainier than I like (coming from the DSLR scene, so I suspect I'm just spoiled), and battery life is HORRIBLE unless you turn off the wifi connectivity and voice detection functions.  Beyond that, couldn't be happier!

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Great image stabilization. No jello effect when I’m sitting at an idle or going over bumps. Mic is surprisingly good through the wind noise. The battery life is very short though, buy plenty of extra batteries for long days.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: Easy to use, works seamlessly with the phone and very durable.  Worth the money.  If not worried about the picture quality I would save some money and go with lower model.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Perfect. Exactly what I was looking for.  I purchased to protect my camera while sightseeing in Spain for a month. It Was great. Protected my camera while remaining sleek enough to keep in my purse while traveling around. Recommend.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: The case's belt loop stitching unraveled on the first day of a 5 day backpacking trip. I had it looped through the sternum strap of my back pack making it convenient to take pictures as we hiked the High Sierras. I had to make longitudinal cuts through the case as a makeshift belt loop. Otherwise it is a reasonable light weight case for the Canon G7x Mark II. Just do not attach it to a belt and expect it to stay put. A solution would be if the manufacture attached a wider nylon strap and use the same stitching pattern they used on the bottom of the belt loop strap.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: I love this case. I have a new point and shoot camera. I got this case so I can carry the camera in my purse or in my camera bag with other things. Helps to keep it from getting scratched. Worth the money. Only paid 11.00 for it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Does the job nicely enough for a soft case. The biggest drawback is that even with mostly-careful handling, the stitched holes in the neoprene already seem to be getting slightly bigger from the inevitable pulling motion. I don't think it'll actually rip, but that'll be something to watch out for.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: It keeps my camera safe(powershot g7 mark ii) but it doesn’t hold my camera as expected. I was looking for a quick draw case, so I could grab my camera fast. The way it holds the camera I kind of have to peel it off my camera and put more effort than I wanted to taking it out. But it keeps it safe and that’s all that matters.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Our Canon SX610HS fits well in the case.. It gives good protection for the camera from bumps and jolts. It has a snaphook at the back to attach it to a belt loop or something else rather than a loop that you would put a belt through. We felt this gave more carrying options especially since my wife is the main user of the camera and doesn't wear belts that often.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Nice case, but it fits the Canon Powershot G7X Mark II like a TIGHT glove. I don't want to struggle with the case when I use my camera, so I'm returning it.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Would be 5 stars if it had a pocket to keep extra batteries and memory cards, but this is a fantastic case and I'm 4 stars worth of happy with it!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: A great little case; fabric and  stitching looks good, a test of time will tell more! A bit tight, older  fat Fiji A700 camera was tight and a little tender forcing worked! I'll leave the camera in the case, maybe it will stretch a little???!  Color is very vibrant and stands out!

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: While it could be said to fit the Canon G7X MkII  - it is such a tight fit I think it will damage the camera taking it out or forcing it in.,Would fit a smaller camera without the protruding lens better - disappointing...

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: It is not leather. The catch comes open very easily which would allow the camera to fall. I will not use this case for anything but storage...

product_name: MegaGear Protective Leather Brown Camera Case, For Sony Cyber-shot DSC-RX100 V, DSC-RX100 IV with 24-70mm Lens, DSC-RX100 III, DSC-RX100 II
review: First, let me state that this will NOT fit you RX100II, RX100IV or RX100V.  At least, not without a lot of pushing and undue stress on your lens.,HOWEVER, if you do as others have suggested, and cut out a semicircle for the inner front of the case to fit the lens.  Then it fits PERFECTLY.,I added some pics here to show a) the (poor) fit as it comes from the factory; and b) to show my steps to cut out the face and the results of the mod.,I found a pill container cap that just matched the diameter of the lens and used that - aligned with the lens & camera pushed down into the case - to mark the cutting line on masking tape.  Then I used a VERY sharp knife to cut through.  There are two layers of very dense cardboard in the walls that are very difficult to cut, so take it carefully (you DON'T want to slip!).  After cutting I wiped glue around the cut between the pleather and the cardboard to keep the cut edges together.  Then I used a brown sharpie to color the cut edges.  Voila!,You can see in the final pics, how far the lens protrudes from the case front with the mod.  Makes it obvious how tight it was before.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I wanted a small, easy to use camera that could zoom for a trip to Scotland and Ireland.  The camera worked extremely well, though I never went past the 8x optical zoom.  I especially love the option to delay the shutter by 2 seconds in low light to prevent camera shake when pressing the shutter button.  Underexposing on stained glass windows (which otherwise looked all white) worked very well.I bought a spare battery and recharger.  I took 1,050 pictures over 22 days, and only replaced the battery twice.  The spent battery recharged in 2 hours.The only problem with the camera is the small cord, which I could not put around my neck.  Consequently, I dropped the camera on stone steps, and it got banged up.  It continued to produce great photos.  I took it to a camera shop, which gave me a long cord to attach to the camera's small cord, so I didn't drop it again.  However, the shop advised me that the tiny connections inside could have come loose, and the camera might not work after a few weeks.  It got me through the trip, and I will now buy another one to replace it.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I just got this yesterday but I've already used it three times. Very Good item. Like it!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This point and shoot has been great to use and I have been quite satisfied with it considering its low price. I have attached test photos and videos so you can be the judge on the quality. I noticed that this camera is especially good at picking up accurate and bold colors in both the photo and video modes.it includes a ";Getting Started"; guide, a warranty card, a small lanyard, a 680mah battery, an external battery charger (which is nice if you plan on buying additional batteries), and the camera itself.With the popularity of smartphones, what is the appeal of this entry-level point and shoot camera? Well, unlike most smartphones, this camera features an 8x optical zoom. This is a great feature that allows you to zoom in decently close while experiencing a minimal degradation in quality. The camera's maximum video quality is 720p but it features quick auto focusing and as mentioned before, good accurate colors. The only issue that I had with the video quality is that the stabilization is not the best.Conclusion: This is overall a great entry-level point and shoot and I do not think you will be disappointed for the price. The 8x optical zoom is definitely my favorite feature and the photo and video quality is about what you would expect for a camera in this price range. There is no included SD card so you will need to buy one, and there is no included transfer cable (mini USB) so you will also need to buy one of those to load the photos and video onto your computer unless you have an SD card slot. The user interface on the camera is easy and simple to use. This camera is great for those who are not extremely technologically savvy as there is basically no learning curve. Nice job it.Disclaimer: I purchased this product with my own money for my own personal use.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Mini Shot has pro features that are helpful for nonprofessional photo enthusiasts. Obviously, it has the 1.7"; LCD Viewfinder, but I also like the Auto Focus, which I use often. It has Exposure, White Balance, and Gamma Correction so all I had to do was snap and print.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I ordered this camera because a friend of mine isn't into technology and I was graduating from college in a few days. It arrived on time and we were happy after purchasing the correct size micro sd card. I would recommend this camera to friends and family. I ordered a package deal which included a sd card, and camera. Just a note: the camera will not work without a 32GB micro sd card ( the small one). The one advertised is too large.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is exactly what we were looking for. A modern full size instant photo camera. It is large, but looks neat and is a lot of fun. The pictures are exactly what you would expect. They look just like an old Polaroid photo. I highly recommend this camera.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I use a 32MB SDHC card (not included) and view photos on a computer with a variety of image software already installed. Scene functionality in the camera itself is acceptable; there are nine choices such as Portrait, Night Portrait, etc. There a couple of quirks. I have to install the SDHC card before the battery. My fingers are too large to click the card into its slot when the battery is in place. The user manual could be improved with some editing.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography

I’m sure it’s a temporary situation, but a challenge for Christmas Festivities!  Anyone find a current source of film?

review: I want to buy a kids camera for my daughter, she likes to take photo with my iphone, but when she took my phone, she spent lots of time on it, I guess a camera maybe solve this problem, it really does. She likes this camera. The picture she took is clear, the camera is light and easy to carry for her. I think it's a nice camera with good quality and plenty of accessaries. Nice gift for kids.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Don't be fooled by the point and shoot simplicity of the presentation.  There are over 100 pages of instruction on line for this product and it seems for an amateur, this will do about anything from changing mood scenes, fireworks, closeups,extended zoom, black and white, sepia tone, on and on. The pictures are not professional quality but darned close for me.  This kit comes with every thing you need without having to buy any extras.  The little trap door for the battery and memory seems to be a little flimsy compared to my similar Sony model that gave out after 15 years.  Over all, a good buy.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I needed to replace a camera that is used to take pictures of items to sell online and this bundle has a lot of items for the price.  The Camera is quite small at 3 ½” wide and 2” tall and about ¾” deep.  It does have many features when taking pictures.  I typically use it to take pictures of smaller items a light box.  It does take very nice pictures and I have figured out how to make it work for my needs.  Settings are easy to change although they are small and hard to read and I must use reading glasses to see them.  Buttons are quite small as well.  For my purposes, the megapixels per picture are reduced, the flash is turned off, and I set a timer to a 2 second delay.  The camera does take pictures very quickly.  It does have a Macro feature that works well, however, make sure you are very close to the item before taking the picture.  I find that it is sometimes easier and quicker to get a clear picture of a mark using normal settings and then use picture editing software to crop and enlarge it.,Transferring pictures to your computer is simple and there are several ways to do so.  I use a cord connected to my computer directly to the connector on the side of the camera.  One neat item in the bundle is a USB type reader that has 4 slots (2 on the side and 2 on the end) that can be used to import pics from the memory card or other means.,The battery holds a charge well and is very easy to change.  Setting up the camera and getting started is very easy.  I had the camera up and running in about 10 minutes.,The bundle comes with many items.  The small tripod is handy.  The case is very small and just large enough to hold the camera.  The charger and accessories will not fit in the case.  Frankly, I only use the Camera, Charger, Memory Card, and Battery.  I keep the tripod and USB Reader available and do not use any of the other items.,Overall, the Camera is easy to use and takes very nice pictures both close up and normal.  It is a very good camera for the price.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: If you buying this for the accessories, don't.,The card reader doesn't work, the two tripod feel like cheap plastic that's about to break, and got a strap that can't be use with the camera, the camera bag have little padding.,The only good was the SD Card and the extra battery with charger and I'm not so sure about the battery.,Just buy the camera and the accessories separately.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: This camera was awesome! I used it when my husband and I went to Disney world the extra battery was even better but then again the full charge battery that I started for the day lasted all day and the next day.  The pictures and video(s) was very clear the qualities are exceptional. I'm just so glad I found this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I have nothing but good things to say about the product and the entire package sent along with this camera. Firstly I love its pocket size that I can carry it anywhere. The features are very easy to use and the package comes along with everything i will need to use with this camera. It has a carry case, cleaning products, tripod and many more. Everything came in perfect condition except for the  Tripod which had a crack. I contacted the customer service and they were very responsive and quick to send me another replacement. Very happy with the service. Would recommend this package to anyone who needs a small basic pocket size camera for travel.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I really like this camera... it is easy to use, and best of all quality of the photos is great!  I like the convenience of it being small enough and light weight for travel.  I have a larger camera, but it is not easy to travel with and can be cumbersome at times.  Thank you!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I really like this kit. The mini tripod is what caught first induced me to buy the kit. Upon de-boxing i was pleased to have a 32G high quality SD card and a high quality extra battery with travel charger. I have not really looked at the other items yet. So in short it feels quite practical.  For some reason I am finding the notes from the vendor quite appealing. But that might just be me.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I'm not picky about cameras.  I just want one with a reasonable price,  quick shot,  and easy to use.  That would be this one!  Had it set up in no time and all the extras are fantastic!  Very pleased with the camera! The seller was great and delivery was fast.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I was quite surprised with all the accessories that it came with. I had a Canon camera before so it was very easy to use. I like having a backup battery that it came with and a case to carry it in. The only bad thing is the tripod doesn't come with any instructions. It's not a automatic thing to figure out but other than that I have no other complaints.,Thank you for good deal.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I've had my fare share of basic point and shoot cameras. However, this bundle package is a first for me and wow am impressed:,-Two handheld\table tripods,-extra battery,-usb driven memory card reader,-cleaning kit,Personally the only thing that possibility didn't belong in my kit was some wrist strap that. In the middle was detachable. Kinda like how an lanyard would detach. I say possible because the other end of the strap the string that likely goes to the camera was alittle bit too thick in my opinion for this type of camera. Other then that again very impressive bundle for the price.,As for the camera haven't yet really really used it yet. Main intended first use is for an April trip with my family. Might or might not use it sooner.,Even with all that said, I did turn it on to poke around the options, as well as, get a feel for the product. Did like the on screen tips and info of features in which made the camera user friendly.
