review: Took the camera on vacation to New Zeland. The weather was beautiful, but the ocean was COLD. This resulted in the lens fogging up so bad that the camera was inoperable. When I contacted GoPro they stated that although this was not unusual, it was not covered under their warranty. Although most users will not experience this, GoPro should at least clearly state this in their user and warranty manuals.

product_name: GoPro HERO7 Black Camera + Extra Rechargeable Battery + PNY Elite-X 32GB U3 microSDHC Card (Bundle) - Waterproof Digital Action Camera Touch Screen 4K HD Video 12MP Photos Live Streaming Stabilization
review: I love my GoPro! I take this every time I go to the Caribbean! I've got perfect footage of Stingrays, Mantas, Sea Turtles and tons and tons of tropical fish. The clarity is amazing. Now, to get a drone to mount my GoPro on!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera itself is good quality. So I gave it a 4. It's much smaller then I expected but I like it and it's easy to use! The pictures are good! I was however unhappy with some of the accessories... Thankfully they were packaged separately! The lens cleaner was open in the package so I lost my 2 screen protector since they won't stick now and I'm pretty sure I got the wrong strap for the case so I'm kinda disappointed with the accessories because of it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: My Nikon S4000 developed lens issues that could not be repaired (basically, it was a throw-away!) so I was shopping for a very small camera that would fit in my shirt pocket; this sub-compact does just that. Response is a tad sluggish when adjusting the lens for distances and the screen is not as clear as I'd like but the pictures are great. I do have other cameras with higher telephoto capabilities but this is very good for limited distances.  Functionality is great for this camera, for the price.  Although it comes with practically everything you need to get started right out of the box, the extra battery with AC and DC chargers are what sold me on this.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I'm so excited to take this on my trip to Scotland!! It is fantastic!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: This is a replacement for my very small Olympus, which I used for many years and carried all over the world.  I looked in camera stores and online for a small high quality replacement with little success.  My wife found this Canon Power Shot ELPH 180, with a treasure chest of accessories included on Amazon. This camera is what I was looking for easy carry and use. The photos are very high quality and the camera is easy to use and ideal for travel. The two tripods (one for hand carry use), the 32 GB card, two batteries and chargers, card reader, case and other accessories make this an unbeatable value.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: It is small and takes very good pictures. Bought it for a trip to Colorado i will be taking in early Oct. I have played around with it and like so far the pictures it takes.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I am pleased with the Canon Powershot  camera I received.  It comes with a lot of goodies as you can see in the picture I submitted.  The picture was taken from my old Canon Powershot.  So far I am happy with is camera and I will update my review after I get back from Keywest, FL

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Wanted a simple, easy to use camera, as I am not very tech oriented. This worked great, pretty intuitive. Also compact, light weight, and takes sharp pics. Does have other settings for those who want some advanced features but I have not used those. I would however, appreciate more in depth written instructions rather than having to download and print them but I guess this is how companies save money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I love this camera! I think its a great starter camera for someone. Takes great photos and videos! Took a picture of the moon, and with the zoom you can actually see the craters.. it's awesome!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: the battery life is non-existant. Had a webinar and while recording battery kept dying! Very slow to recharge the battery and I was only recording for 1 hour.,Check Sony!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Well first of all, I'm not a professional photographer, just your average customer wanting to take pictures to post on Facebook, take family photos, and grab some video of shenanigans of the family and pets. For such usage, this camera is perfect. With this purchase, you get the SD card, and extra battery, A USB card reader to me it easy to transfer files to your PC, a little tripod, carrying case -- basically all you need to get started right after you charge up the battery and insert the battery and SD card into the camera. I ordered the camera on Friday and received it on Saturday. Quick service! The longest delay was trying to figure out how the tripod worked -- it looks like a fat selfie stick -- you push the legs outward, not up or down. Duh ... In any case, I've been taking pictures and shooting nonsense movies just to see how the outfit operates. So far, I have been very pleased. For the money, this is a great little camera plus the service is great.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Very, VERY disappointed in this camera.  Our iPhones take vastly better focused pictures with better dynamic range, even with their tiny lenses.  Trying the different metering modes and other options has little effect on improving the absolutely terrible focusing performance.  Sometimes more than half the pictures in a sequence are out of focus.,We had 2 of the fabulous PowerShot SD1000 7.1 MPixel, 3x zoom, aluminum body cameras for many years before hard, daily and travel use finally did them in.  Although with a lower pixel count, they outdid this piece of mediocrity by a long shot.  Those old Elphs were purchased, on sale, at about the same price point many years ago.,How can a much more recent product have such inferior performance???

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The silver camera does not have all the updated software, but the red ELPH 180 does.  Buy the red one!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The battery worked for 1 weekend now it swells up whenever I charge it. I haven't gotten the opportunity to comment on the actual camera due to not being able to turn it on

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I've owned a lot of these small point and shoot cameras in my lifetime, and this is in my top two favorite.  I am very pleased at the quality of picture this one produces.  I love the simple options the camera has, and the simple explanations included on the camera, which make a switch to different modes very easy.  Truthfully, I've never looked into the options that my cameras have; I just leave everything on auto.  But the simple explanations which are displayed when you turn on the "help" mode make the options easy to navigate.  After fifteen years of using this type of camera, I finally have one where I feel confident changing the settings to increase quality of picture.  I still usually leave it on "auto," though, and the quality is much better than most I've experienced.  The camera is very lightweight and compact, fitting better into my purse than most I've owned.  I just took a 6-day vacation in which I took over 800 pictures, and I only had to recharge the included battery one time on day four.  Plus, it's cute because it's red.,The only reason I didn't give this camera five stars is because the processing time is very slow though. The picture takes a couple seconds to process, thereby making it difficult to snap a couple pictures in quick succession.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I just don't like taking pictures with my phone, so wanted to replace an older Canon digital camera.  Got this based on the price and what I read in other reviews.  Have taken quite a few pictures with it on several vacations (mostly scenery) and am quite pleased.  It is easy to use, the zoom is all I need for my vacation pictures.  Battery life is great, love the color--lightweight, easy to use.  As long as it continues to hold up, I will be very pleased I chose this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This is a great little camera that takes nice photos.  I bought it to replace an similar older Canon camera which I had for 7 years.  The new Elph 180 camera is very similar to my old one and I could use my old USB transfer cable and I now have a spare battery (from my old camera).  I agree with other reviewers that it's bothersome that Canon doesn't include a USB cable with this camera.  And I also agree with other reviewers that it really is hard to rig up the wrist string because the hole for the loop is so tiny.  My old camera had a metal body and I was worried that the plastic body of the new Elph 180 would be fragile.  But, it seems to be pretty sturdy.  So, overall, I'm pretty happy with this new camera.  I've been using it for 2 months now and it works great.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This is probably the worst pocket digital camera I've owned since 2000.  Feels cheap because it is and the quality if the images are grainy and not as vibrant as the Sony equilivant. I purchased this camera to replace my Sony Cybershot W830. I use it for work and needed a camera asap so I couldn't return it or I would have.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I've bought maybe 20 of these cameras over the years for my company. They are cheap and get the job done for building inspections. Very simple to use and durable.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: We recently visited Rocky Mountain National Park with the grandkids. One was trying to take photos with a V-Tech kiddie camera. One was taking photos with her hand-me-down Apple phone. The quality of the kiddie camera photos was very poor. The camera phone photos were poor quality and hard to view or download. We let them take turns using our backup ELPH and they had a wonderful time, took a few nice shots, and made great strides as photographers just with a little fooling around.,The ELPH is so intuitive, the auto setting is so nice, the anti-shake is so effective, and the view screen is so big that this turned out to be a very newbie friendly camera.,Don't underestimate the beauty of digital. You could burn off the cost of this camera in film and developing on a normal film camera in one family vacation. This baby will hold a few thousand high quality digital photos on a normal, (say 16 GB), memory card. That's a lot of pictures of the inside of a backpack, hands, feet, the rear end of the family dog, birds, ants and Mom's elbow. But among those will be a few really nice candid photos of the family at play, and I have to say we had the best time in front of the computer monitor looking at all of the easily uploaded photos.,The camera is solid and will take a fair amount of reasonable abuse. The wrist strap is flimsy, but saves the occasional accident. After a few minutes of instruction and practice the kids were naturals with the camera. Over the course of a few days the quality of the photographs, in terms of composition, choice of zoom, framing, and the like, improved dramatically.,This turned in to a great family activity, and got the kids totally invested in the vacation. It helped them to learn how to look and to see. And the operation of the camera never got in the way.,So, it's beyond dispute that, technically, this is a fine product. But moreover, in terms of value for cost as a useful thing to own, this was a worthwhile and rewarding purchase.,Please note that I bought this item for my family with my own real cash money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I have returned this camera.  I bought it as a replacement for my old Powershot SD1200.  I take a lot of bird photos, and the SD1200's maximum 3x optical zoom is inadequate for this purpose.  Unfortunately, even though the Elf 180 has an 8x optical zoom, every photo I took at 8x turned out to be fuzzy.  I am positive it is the optical zoom causing the problem, because I had turned digital zoom off in the settings.  (Digital zoom photos are even fuzzier.),I subsequently bought a more expensive camera, which has not yet been delivered.  I was going to keep the Elf 180 anyway, for travel use.  But then I realized that for non-bird photos, my old SD1200 takes photos that are as good (or better) than does the Elf 180, and also has more user-friendly controls.  For example, the SD1200 has a macro button on the camera, whereas the Elf 180 forces users to drill down through a series of menus to reach that function.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Decent camera for the price paid. Bought it as a gift and decided to just keep it for myself as I don’t think it’s too much better than a cell phone. Perfect gift for a kid probably. And great for travel as it is lightweight. Perhaps when you don’t want to bring/use your phone.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: This camera is great. The picture quality is superb and the fact that it is able to hold an SD card is fantastic. I use it for every event now.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Awesome little camera! It takes good pictures for the price. It’s lightweight and easy to use...my 5 year old likes to take pictures with it. I bought it to send to daycare with my kid for them to take pictures here and there. It’s small and lightweight enough it packs easily in my kid’s backpack. Would recommend.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Cute and compact camera.  Great for vacations because it fits easily into a small space.  The camera was easy to use and my 12 year old niece was able to figure out how to use it.  I will be getting her one for Christmas.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: I bought this little camera for an upcoming trip. I didn't want to risk an expensive one on. It is easy to use, very small, rechargable, & takes good pictures. It does need an sd card which is not included, but if you are like me you probably have a few laying around from old electronics. All-in-all a great buy. I recommend it for trips, in the glove box, kids, in your purse.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This is a great 1st camera at a good price for someone young or just getting started taking photos. I bought it for my 8 yr old who likes to take pictures. She is a little young but her 9 yr old brother has it too and he loves it. Easy to use, good general photos

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: There is no flash and no microphone so you cant hear the videos when you play back.  Almost every picture is grainy and out of focus.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: This does the job and picture quality is very good. I am pleased with this camera and have recommended it to others.

product_name: Digital Camera Vlogging Camera 2.7K Full HD 24MP WiFi YouTube Camera with Flip Screen Retractable Flash Light and UV Lens
review: Very happy with this camera, excellent value for money. Comfortable to hold and really good video pictures. I highly recommend it! Great for anyone just looking to casually record or capture family moments, or for anyone looking to record to upload to social media outlets.

review: It has WiFi Function to connect to the phone. The picture quality is amazing as well as the video recorder, overall it was a very good purchase, would definitely recommend to everyone.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: My kids lost their camera last summer, and I was looking for another one for their upcoming school trip to Washington, DC.  It is lightweight and takes good pictures for the price. Easy to use. Very good for the kids or any beginners.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: It's size is convenient and the pictures turn out quite nice. My husband keeps it in his motorcycle bag for when he's  cruising. This camera has better quality than his phone. If you want to use it for a lot of pictures before uploading them, I would get an additional disk.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: So the piece that attracted me to this package versus the other Canon packages on Amazon was the 3 included lenses. I should have known better. It DOES come with the 1 Canon kit lens. The other 2 lenses are XIT brand and the two of them together can be purchased for less than $20. They actually make the pictures worse. Also, just to note, these are not stand alone lenses. They screw onto the front of the lens like a filter would. These are completely not usable for any kind of quality pictures. An average point and shoot camera takes higher quality pictures than you will get through these lenses.,If this is your first DSLR, the kit provides a decent value. All of the components are cheap, but will give you an idea if those are things you will use and should replace with better versions.,The camera itself is (so far) awesome. The camera alone would have been a 5 star purchase. The package alone would be a 2 star purchase. The way it's listed and pictured is deceptive. Overall, it's worth the $10 over just the camera, but be sure to keep your expectations low.,All the included components are as follows:,$10.69 xit macro lens xt58wab,$8.93 xit telephoto lens xt2x58,$19.75 vivitar large gadget bag,$22.46 xit tripod xt60trb,$4.50 vivitar 4in pocket tripod,$9.16 transcend 16gb flash card,$16.99 transcend 32gb flash card,$8.68 xit remote shutter release,$4.93 xit SD/microSD card reader,$7.46 pro series digital filter set,$3.95 lens cap keeper (stick on),$2.94 xit universal screen protector,$3.99 xit digital ultraviolet filter,$3.00 vivitar cleaning kit and card wallet,$14.95 slave flash,Total accessories: $142.38,$449 Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera Kit with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Lens (Black)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: This case is so cute and holds my Canon G7x perfectly!  Great quality for the price paid.

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)

product_name: MegaGear ''Ultra Light'' Neoprene Camera Case Bag with Carabiner for Canon PowerShot G7 X, Canon PowerShot G7 X Mark II, Nikon COOLPIX AW130, S9900, Olympus STYLUS XZ-2 Digital Camera (Blue)
review: Too tight for g7x mark ii. You have to shove it and close it.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: First things first: I love the camera. I have been using it for about a month now, and it has been wonderful. It is a fantastic first time camera and does a great job at helping you learn it. The rating is due to what comes with the camera, so please beware.,Pros: The SD cards alone provide good value, as they can get expensive as you need bigger cards, for a first-timer, and as long as you aren't shooting raw+jpeg like I am, you won't need anything else. Also helps to mention you get a sd card wallet and a usb reader/writer. The uv and other filters are also nice if you want to use filters in your shots, when I first started out I was using a uv filter on my kit lens. I have since bought a much better lens, and do not use a filter anymore. The cleaning kit is very handy, I have no problems there but also bought a professional cleaning kit. The mini tripod is quite cute and has been handy a few times, beware, I have had trouble getting it to hold up my camera sturdy enough with anything other than the kit lens. As stated above, the camera and everything it comes with is good. It also comes with a remote shutter which is very nice as well. I tried it out with my silly little tripod and was pleased with the result.,Cons: My biggest issue with my purchase is it sounded like you are getting two extra lenses with the purchase. You're not. The picture you see of the three lenses grouped together: the bigger one is the kit lens and the two extras next to it are them. They are not lenses, they do not attach to the camera. I would call these "lens extensions", as they screw onto your kit lens like a uv filter does. They are also 100% worthless, please take it from someone who has already tried them, and then bought other lenses and compared the difference. I would upload the bad pictures they took, but have since deleted them out of my library. The bag it comes with is incredibly small, and barely fits all of your accessories, heaven forbid you go and get more equipment to add to it. I have since purchased a backpack that I can grow into, and the bag is now a spare parts bag. The bigger tripod is a cheap plastic, and while it is just fine for indoor photography and videos, I wouldn't dare use it on a windy day taking landscape shots. The flash could be a pro or con depending on your personal thoughts. It is not an ETTL, meaning that you have to manually adjust your settings to match the flash and how it fires, the camera will not do it for you. It also is completely stationary, it is brighter than the built-in flash, which is better for outdoor shots that you need to light up. I can imagine it would be difficult for a beginner, it was difficult for me.,Conclusion: If I had known better at the time, I would have either spent less money to get a kit without "lenses" or spent a little bit more to get real lenses included in the kit. The camera itself and the SD cards provide wonderful value, but I would not make this purchase again and wouldn't recommend it to anyone.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Will keep this review short and simple. This is my first camera, this bundle has everything you need if you're into photography. This, in my opinion is a great camera to start learning on. Super easy to use and very high quality pictures. I've been out shooting the past few days and have taken some amazing pictures. Worth every penny! If you're thinking about buying it, do it! You won't be disappointed.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This is a great camera. Easy to use and take great pictures. The accessories are useful. However, the flash is not compatible with this camera (see alert). I read that this flash is not compatible with the camera. Therefore, they are sending accessories that are not compatible in a bundle which is not fair. Other than the accessories, this is a great camera.

review: If you are looking for a great entry level camera and kit for photography look no further! They say that a picture can speak a thousand words. I will let the pictures do just that.

review: I highly recommend this product!,I am no pro when it comes to photography, but I do want my own slr and want to learn! This is perfect for a beginner like me, it came with so much accessories. Love it!,It came in a box, of course! Lol see picture below, everything has its own case. product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: We love this camera. I bought it for my wife and after a couple days of learning how to use it she was taking professional quality photos.  The camera is easy to use and comes with everything you need to get started.  The bundle package is a good deal.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this set for the youth group at the local church. Works great but my only complaint is that the extra flash that comes with this bundle does not work!?!? Why would the seller even sell it with this camera if it does not work?? I saw other reviews stating the same thing but I Figured ok maybe I will be the lucky one that has one that will work, nope. But that will not deter me from using this camera. 4 stars. Good camera with a dollar store extras. Dollar tree at that. If you find this review helpful click the helpful button.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is an excellent choice for a step up from point-and-shoot, or a first camera for a novice DSLR.  It's fully automatic but you can gradually take creative control of every aspect of your photography as you become more comfortable with the settings and features.  The tiny instruction manual included in the package gives just the basics and can be frustrating, but download the PDF file and there are your clear directions, step by step and in color.  For an experienced amateur photographer some of the items included in the kit will be redundant (who doesn't have at least two tripods?) but buying the camera, lenses, flash and cards separately would be more expensive than what you receive in this packed bundle.  The only thing I would change is one feature of its WiFi capabilities.  Unlike the Canon SX60HS, it can't wirelessly download to the hard drive of a computer.  You would use your cable or card reader.  But it's just a minor annoyance.  It can easily send your photos to any mobile device.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Absolutely love my camera 110%.... The quality is great and not to mention all the accessories it comes with that are very handy. I am really happy with this camera and I am looking to buy another lens just to take more awesome shots.

review: Camera arrived a few days ago, only opened tonight to use, very new, authentic, camera easy to use, I am a small white camera, camera operation is simple, too like!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Have been using it for almost 2 months now, and I would say I absolutely love it! The versatility of this camera is definitely the reason for purchasing it. Excellent macro and telephoto performances, this can be your all-in-one camera.Though the plastic material does make it feel kind cheap, it feels great when you actually hold it. Don't have too much expectation on the overall image quality, it only has a 1/2.3 inch sensor, but it's good enough for daily use or sharing it on instagram.  Overall, with this price, this is definitely one of the best deals that you can get for a bridgecamera.

product_name: Waterproof Digital Camera FHD 1080P Underwater Camera 24.0MP Waterproof Camera Selfie Dual Screen Point and Shoot Underwater Digital Camera (k1) (k1)
review: this is a really beautiful waterproof camera.very nice design and my husband had use it to take the picture underwtaer.i hope i can use it wuderwater with the sea.enjoy it!

product_name: Waterproof Digital Camera FHD 1080P Underwater Camera 24.0MP Waterproof Camera Selfie Dual Screen Point and Shoot Underwater Digital Camera (k1) (k1)
review: It's a pretty affordable camera so I wasn't expecting to be able to take professional photos with. But it's perfect for what I needed it for. Beach trip with the family and waterproof . The photos actually came out pretty good I think. It was pretty clear.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've had this over a year.  It has the worst focus I've ever experienced.  So many fake positive reviews about this camera here because very few of these raving reviews mention the horrible focus in their cons list.  No question the lack of focus must be at the top of any cons list.  I've missed thousands of shots because the lense wants to refocus every single shot, even after I've locked in a focal range & target to be focused on.  Like someone else here said:  This is a TOY.  Buy it if you have $300 to blow, if you have lots of spare time to waste waiting for it to refocus & refocus & refocus & refocus..., if you don't really care about getting that shot because you'll be disappointed a 1,000 times, otherwise it's not worth the frustration.  It's only a toy that zooms out far, but will fail to focus on your subject 50-80% of the time & will drive you nuts if you actually want to take a real picture & not waste your time.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am a professional photographer and I love collecting camera's and lenses ( about $ 40k) invested in to it).  So I was eager to receive my recent order of a Panasonic Lumix FZ70 - but to be blown away by its performance and quality - who would have believed you could get the equivalent of a $1000 DSLR for less that [$]?My main purpose in ordering this camera was to have a digital camera that was light, easily portable and (most importantly) had a viewfinder. I have severe presbyopia and would be constantly taking off and putting on a pair of reading glasses to see the screen of my Samsung which was usually visually obscured by the ambient light of everyday outdoor shooting. This camera solves that problem as I hoped it would...but I discovered it could do so much more. I couldn't have imagined it possessed so many extraordinary features normally associated with only the most expensive DSLRs. Hand-held night photography? Check. Extreme macros? Check. In camera special effects? Check. And a zoom that has to be experienced to be believed (Check my photo in middle). Focus on a distant feature that literally can barely be seen from your current position and then slowly zoom out until you discover that it is so far away that in the full wide position of the zoom it has disappeared completely! Even has a "hidden" ability to make time-lapse video in the MINIATURE setting. Take pictures in reduced sizes for social media use or go full-blast RAW for Photoshop lovers. Be sure to download the full users manual PDF file for a course in this cameras many, many features.To the cameras amazing feature list  add an exceptionally protective and handy carrying case with internal straps that allow the camera lens to be cuddled by the case and leave room from the neck strap as well...and I scarcely need to mention that the kit comes with a 16GB high speed SD card. I am a confirmed addict of Amazon and this cements that relationship once again. I am SOOooo happy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: When you pay 300 bucks for a 4K camera, I guess you have to understand there will be limitations. I have worked with Lumix before on a much higher end level, and their camera's are AWESOME.,When the camera is in decent to good lighting it works very well. Once the lighting starts to fade the quality almost instantly turns to pixelated garbage. During Christmas I was shooting some test footage of my family around the tree, and the results were terrible. Between the artifacts, pixelation and the camera having a hard time focusing I was very disappointed. I also was filming my black cat and the camera couldnt focus, couldnt translate the scenario. I grabbed my 80D to see if it was just a tough situation to focus on... but the 80D did just fine.,This camera should ONLY be used in controlled lighting or daytime ventures... this camera will probably be a great one for you, especially with the price. But if you are going to encounter darker rooms or places, shadows, low light environments... I would suggest getting a camera with a better lens than F2.8-5.9... and a system that can deal with low lighting better.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The LUMIX FZ80 for me is more of a video camera. While it takes very good pictures and has great capabilities in regards to manual settings, I think you'll find this to be more for video makers who also want to take the occasional high quality photo. The 4K videos are crispy clear, no upscaling or shady business there, it's a legit 4K video. The 1080p 60 FPS mode is my favorite for general filming though, combined with the powerful 60X optical zoom it really can't get much better than that. There's also the scarcely heralded slow motion video capture function which captures 720p HD video at 120 FPS, and it works really well.,Where the camera falters a little is it's features beyond those mentioned above. No external microphone input, no DC power input (only USB, you must run it off the small 895 mA battery), and no live video output (HDMI is only for playback of previously recorded videos and photos) put this camera in the "beginner" section for me. But this is where we are reminded of the price. You aren't going to find another camera capable of what this one is for this price. This is a bargain camera for those who wish to take a step up from pocket digicams or their cell phone cameras, and a very worthy candidate of being someone's long term main camera for Youtube or other minor video production.,All around the camera is built well and very intuitive to use once you get used to it's many built-in features. If you want to buy this and just put it on fully automatic settings you will probably not be disappointed as this camera has excellent auto adjustments both with photo taking and video. I highly recommend it all around for anyone that might be interested in this type of camera.,You can see my video shot with this camera on my Youtube page "TheCRTProductions"

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: An outstanding travel camera. My wife and I used to travel with a full set of digital SLR equipment with all the lenses and a separate HD camcorder. It was like a suitcase of stuff. And by the time you got the correct lens on the body, the shot had disappeared.,So we got this camera. It does EVERYTHING. The zoom is amazing. But you really need that two axis stabilization with zoom. Colors and details are great. 4K UHD video at 30 fps. The HDMI output is nice to connect to big screen. But if you have a wi-fi capable TV, you don't need wires to see the pictures or video.,The remote app for iphone works nicely as well. And the touch screen is very useful.,One con: battery life. Just a few hours of use per charge and the camera will not function with non-OEM batteries without the smart battery id/charge control chip. So buy lots of batteries and an external charger. Also, the camera will not both run and charge from the USB port. It's run (on battery) or off and charge. Annoying that you can't use the camera to sort images while charging.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera works far better than I expected. Literally just point and shoot for great pictures. I decided to try the Moon shot because it should be very difficult to hold the camera steady. The moon picture on Aug 4 2014 was not done with a tripod. Think I might have a typo and put the 14th instead of the 4th but the picture is what is important. It came out very sharp for a  maximum zoom picture without a tripod. I will absolutely recommend this camera to friends and family.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have owned every new model of this camera for about the last 10 years and always loved the camera. When I saw that this newest model came out and had WiFi, I of course upgraded. I miss my old Panasonic!  The focus on this camera makes it almost unusable for us and we are looking at other brands to replace it. Wow!  So disappointed!!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I think this is a perfect camera for those looking to experiment with some more detailed photography than the smaller point and click cameras can offer. (While also staying within an affordable price range.)  I have only tested a few pictures out, because I just received it, but I already love it.  I tested the zoom, and it's amazing how far it can go.  The 1st picture I have attached was standing in my garage with no zoom, the 2nd picture is zoomed all the way in, capturing the flowers in front of the house across the street.  I am definitely impressed with the zoom, and look forward to experimenting further with this camera.  For just testing pictures, I think the quality is amazing already, once I really learn all of the controls I think this camera has some major potential.  I would definitely recommend this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this camera because I wanted more performance than my iPhone without dropping a ton of money into a heavy camera that wouldn’t be practical for carrying on hikes. I’m just a little over a month into getting to know this camera and I couldn’t be more impressed. I’m attaching a few photos to show the experience I’ve had using this camera to date.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This was a gift for a young family member. It is easy to use, and takes very good photos. My only minor complaint is that it's tricky to learn how to use only a slight pressure on the shutter button to depress it halfway in order to focus before depressing all the way to release the shutter. It's mostly a learning problem, but the key is for the user to wait for the on-screen focusing aid to change to green before depressing the shutter all the way down.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: My old camera was wearing out, not taking clear picture, so I got this Nikon to replace it. Cost, battery type and reviewers' comments were big factors in my choice. I am thrilled with this little dynamo! Long battery life and sharp pictures. I create textile art, and this camera shows every stitch in crisp detail. Highly recommended.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I love how the so called " professional " critics rip this camera. It works great, takes great pics and is super convienient. Bring4  AA batteries. 2 go in the camera, two for spares, and you can go to the moon and back without worrying about recharging.  But thanks to there stupid snobbery, they are making these types of cameras obsolete in the market.  Soon we will have to pay 300 bucks or more for a bunch of features and accessories the common photographer will never use.  Hoard these A10's when you can folks, these perfect little cameras will soon be gone

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I think it's a pretty good camera for the price. It is so small it is almost difficult to handle. It fits in my shirt pocket. Do buy the cable; I had a very small USB cable for my old Canon camera but it would not fit the Nikon. It takes a while to get the hang of pushing the shutter release halfway, then pausing, then pressing it home. I think the people who complained of blurry pix were pressing the shutter all at once. One function I like is you can reduce a shot to an email-able size (640x480) in the camera. It makes a copy.,I selected this camera mainly because it takes AA batteries. I have since purchased a Canon PowerShot ELPH 190 which is almost twice the price but it has wifi.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This camera would be great if it was for taking pictures of people and places that are willing to stay still for 5 to 10 seconds, but, since it was purchased to take pictures of children, most of the pictures do not come out well.  Let's face it, asking a child to stay still for more than a second does not work well. AND, action shots, forget it!!!  Even taking a picture of a child's triumphant moment, lost every time.  And, two pictures in a row, your kid will be done with that and moved on to something new by the time it is ready to take a second photo.  Overall, pretty disappointing.,This camera is just way too slow.  I am planning on replacing it, but need to find something under $100 that is a better fit.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Good value for the price.  I wanted a small, cheap camera for travel.  Wish it came with a cable for connection to a computer.  Apparently Nikon uses a lot of proprietary cables.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Great camera. I have owned Nikon film cameras for years. There are no better cameras in the world despite what Canon owners profess ! This was a replacement for an earlier model Coolpix which my wife carried in her purse for 7 years. The A10 is a more sophisticated camera with better features.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: These are good quality cameras that last. I usually purchase the L32 for work but it is getting hard to find it available. The Coolpix L32 (,) has a 20.1 mega pixels sensor and this one has a 16.1 mega pixels sensor and that makes a bit of a difference in picture quality but if this is something you would notice, you would not be getting a camera of this type.,There are many cameras of this type that are either inexpensive and of bad quality or great quality but very expensive. This camera falls in a vanishing category of great quality at a reasonable price. This camera will take great quality pictures at 16.1 mega pixels and it is important to note that the zoom is optical which means that you will not give up any of the resolution when you zoom in. If your goal is to get the best quality you can get, and this camera does not make you happy, I do not think that the L32 would make you much happier so you will have to move to professional cameras that have detachable lenses and you are looking at many times the price.,There is something that you will not like about this camera and the only reason I gave it 4 stars. The world is moving fast to 4K video resolution but unfortunately this camera cannot even do 1080p recording. Considering that most cell phones today have 1080p video recording capabilities, you would think that a device that all it does is camera functions, would at least have the ability to record 1080p video. If you are looking for a quality camera that is easy to use and you want it to last, this camera is highly recommended. But be sure first that you just need a camera for pictures and not for video. This may be the reason why these cameras are at the brink of extinction, they are great picture cameras but our mobile devices have spoiled us so much that we do not want just a picture camera any longer. When we consider buying a camera, we do it because we want something better than what we already have in our pocket and that usually means that we are looking for optical zoom and quality lenses with quality video capabilities.,If you are still interested in this camera, here are some things that you may want to know:,1) It has an easy to view 2.7" screen.,2) Operation is very simple and the menus are easy to figure out without having to read a manual.,3) It uses 2 AA batteries that you can buy everywhere. I had cameras with rechargeable batteries that go dead if I do not use the camera for a few months or their charger is proprietary and when it is broken or lost, it costs a lot to replace it. I love the simplicity of just putting 2 new commonly used batteries and be good to go.,4) It takes the full size SD memory card which means that you can just put in an adapter (many micro SD cards come with a free adapter) and turn it to a micro SD card while you will not have to throw away your old full size cards.,As for durability, we use cameras for the nursing staff to take pictures of patients and enter them to our electronic health record (EHR) software. We also use them for employee badges. Although we do not need high resolution pictures for these functions, when we get the less expensive cameras, they do not last for more than a few months. I always find them dead or the battery compartment door broken and held by rubber bands. So I have been replacing those $30.00 to $50.00 cameras with the Coolpix L32 and this A10 and I do not have any problems anymore.,Note that this camera does not come with a USB cable unless you purchase the bundle and it has a non standard connector. You can either use a USB card reader like this one ,, or you can buy the USB cable here, ,, which costs about 12 bucks at the time of this review.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I've owned two other Coolpix cameras in the past.  I always liked them because of their ease of use and how well they worked, and the quality of the pictures.  All that is changed now.  The picture quality is terrible, many pictures are unstable, there are less features on this model than on the one from five years ago.  Nikon should look up some of their old designs and go back to them.  This camera is garbage.  And it costs about the same as the ones I bought five years ago which were far superior.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I purchased this camera [with the bundled USB CABLE] through amazon PRIME as a Christmas gift for my daughter. After the camera arrived I was notified by curt email they were out of the usb cable - about five days before Christmas. When I went to amazon to look at the order to figure out what had happend (and  to see if they had credited my account for the part they were not including) they had completely removed the portion of my order that had included the cable?!! So, now I get to track down another cable.  Then I found out that all the usb cables for Nikon are proprietary. You have to use their cable. Then I noticed there is no memory card included with the camera - this is my mistake not catching this before I ordered it. Then, in trying to call amazon to discuss... well, the Help button provides no HELP. It's an endless loop to keep you from actually reaching anyone. Shame on amazon. I have been a very good customer and a Prime member.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: I'm consider myself an amateur photographer, but I like to think I get off some decent shots every so often. After my old camera died after falling from my backpack, I was in the market for a new one like it but with a few extra features.,This camera is really good and takes sharp pictures. There are also many different shooting modes that can yield some very artistic results, especially the Moon Mode which yielded some beautiful shots of... Well... The MOON. The zoom on this camera is like nothing I've ever seen. I've taken shots from miles away and zoomed in so close you would think I was about 20 feet away.,While this camera does have a lot of features, some of them are pretty complex and difficult to understand. I recommend reading the manual online in order to get a full understanding as the included manual is only useful for getting started.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: The camera are pretty cool, but just the built quality feel cheap, made out of plastic. It got flip out screen, good for YouTuber/vlogger. The most surprising me is that it's got MIC input and also wifi connection in which made life easier. Overall, the camera is pretty good for kids or beginner Vloggers. It's a budget video's camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Perfect beginners camera for vlogging. I purchased this for my gamer son wanting to launch his YouTube career... smh. I must say for the price it’s awesome. It comes with everything you need minus the tripod and mic, fortunately he already had it ready to go. I attached photos of everything included and I was impressed with the quality. It’s not as heavy as I anticipated but the price tag wasn’t as heavy either... It’s simple to use and he set it up right away without even looking at the manual, kids these days... Very happy with this purchase, now I can rest for a while before he asks for a higher end camera for the holidays. I recommend this for an entry level vlogging camera before having to shell out hundreds for a Canon or something along those lines.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: There are so many clever functions to this camera. I especially like the “selfie” feature which allows you to see yourself forward facing. The screen flips easily in and out. The lens options are nice as well. I like that it came with a velvet carrying case for the extra lens when not in use. The camera itself is very user friendly, but it’s important to note that you need an SD card before use. Some cameras have some internal memory to store pictures, but this camera does not. So maks sure you purchase a card for this at the same time as buying this camera so they come together.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: If you wanna start YouTube and don't wanna spend so much money then this camera is the right fit. I bought this not expecting the best thing ever. I wanted something simple. A camera that can record and make good decent quality, even for YouTube and School projects. When I received the product, I was nervous. Opening it, I found all the needed cables and accessories for the camera. The batteries have decent life, again it's simple. If you want a simple camera, this is it. The retro look gives it an awesome style.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: i bought this camera for myself ,the camera  was really wonderful, it is take great pictures , very clear .I choose this one because it was small and I can take selfies ,so I actually I like it. I love take pictures when t went to the travel .easy to carry for travel abroad ,it doesn’t have many buttons ,it is easy to use, the quality is great and also the camera come with two battery,that’s  great. the battery can use for long hours . I am so happy with it.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Nice camera with great package! Everything inside the box is well protected. It comes with two travel bags, one for camera and the other one for wide angel lens. No worries about running out of barriers since there are two batteries with it. It is very easy to operate. With the wide angle lens you can get more in the photo, which is great! Pictures look more beautiful than without it. Most importantly, this camera takes great photos! Highly recommended!

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Cool camera at a great price,I Are there better cameras? Yes..but they are definitely MUCH MORE EXPENSIVE.,Recommending this to anyone out there looking for a wallet-friendly portable and effective camera

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Handy. and Lightweight. I bought it to use for to take pic to post on my blog. Dont need tobe really expensive one. just a regular one that do the job. This is decent. Work well. Not feel heavy when holding. I like it to be small and light weight.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Used this for the past month on an around country road trip and it served me very well. I love the old fashion look of it! It is sturdy and produced great photos!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This is coming from someone who is challenged using her phone camera. The point and click feature works beautifully, or focusing manually results in quick, beautiful photos, even close up. I needed this camera for my work and it fits the job perfectly. No fussing around with focusing, and downloading the photos is a snap! The camera came with everything I needed and then some. I would highly recommend this for someone just starting out with photography, or for those of us that need to include photos in a work report. Very satisfied!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This replaced a now dead early Canon point&shoot that I liked for its simplicity & ease of use. This one, while capable of much more than the old one, is also simple to operate, even for a decrepit & digitally/electronically challenged individual such as myself. All I do are snaps, and this product accomplishes that to a "T".

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This is a smart bundle. The camera is tiny but powerful, and it comes with everything you need - cleaning supplies, SD card, card wallet, card reader to easily transfer pics to your computer, a tiny tripod, battery charger, case...  We bought it for our office to assist with documentation of events and for our newsletter.  Was ready to go within an hour of opening it and worked like a charm.  Reasonably priced and good bundle.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is all as advertised plus much more.  Downloaded operating manual and was surprised such a small device can do so many things.  I don't know if I will ever use everything it can do but is nice to know it can be done.  Pictures are very good.  Camera is easy to use and set up is simple.  I just wish I could remember everything in the 111 page manual.  I put in a 32gig card and use it as a dash cam also.  Very happy with camera and free shipping was a plus.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I have used cameras for over 60 years.  This is the poorest camera I have ever used for indoor use.  It is almost impossible to produce a clear photo inside when one has to use the flash.  The response from the camera is delayed in low light situations and unless one rests the camera firmly on a flat surface and the subjects are well lit the results are fuzzy.  I purchased this camera to capture birthday and holiday photos and out of a dozen indoor shots, only one is clear.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This package provided all that I would need to be able to use my camera in the most effective way. Each of the items compliments the other and is a great starter kit. At some point I'm sure that I will change to a more professional style camera, but this is great for my needs at the moment. Everything arrived in great condition and a day earlier than I had expected. The only item I replaced was the SD card. For my plans, going for the 64 GB was the only way to go. That just means I have a 32 GB back-up ready to use. This is a great camera choice.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I like the overall feel of my camera and the portability.  Even though people may think if I have an iPhone why the camera, many reason first one that comes to mind is my images on the iPhone sometimes are fuzzy because my hands move perhaps, but with my camera, pictures are clear not fuzzy perhaps the way it fits in my hands, I just like it, don’t seem to have resolution issues when trying to order prints either, big plus!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I was so surprised how small this camera is. I was replacing a different Canon that kept giving me a "change batteries" message and I was so sick of it that I went online and found this camera and it was delivered the same day. It takes great pictures and is easy to use. It is similar to my old camera so I am able to use it without much trouble. I did order extra batteries so that I would always have one available. I am able to use my old camera's cable to download pictures so I don't have to take out the card. I find that taking the card in and out can be a problem. If you want a simple camera that takes good pictures, I would recommend this one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I'm a Realtor and I needed a quick replacement for my Canon camera which had recently stopped working.  (I had used it for a number of years)  I researched several online options.  I choose this Canon PowerShot and am very happy since it arrived very quickly.  My photos of new home listings upload easily to my computer to be posted on my real estate websites.  I was really pleased with all the "extras" that came with my new camera since my previous camera had been purchased at a local camera store as a camera only.  The new one included an SD Card, card reader,  a mini tripod, screen savers, cleaning kit and a card storage case.  This was in addition to the battery and charger that was part of the camera package.  I've only used it on one occasion so far but I'm very pleased.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Don’t buy waste of money. Not easy to use and photos come out average. I found phone camera better quality. Accessories are cheaply made.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have owned three of these cameras and they are really good inexpensive cameras to keep with you for special moments.,The first one after about a year had noise in the video sound so I purchased another with an extended warranty and at about,the one year point had some display problems. Seems Sony does not want to fix it and accused me of abusing it so I will try,the extended warranty instead. While it is in for repairs I bought another. It is a good camera for around $100 even if it only lasts,about a year. I just made sure on the third one to get the square deal extended warranty because Sony wanted me to pay over $200,to fix my second one that was ten months old and still in the warranty period. So buyer beware.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Nice camera but has some serious problems. I compared the photos from this 20.1 MP camera to my Nikon S4000 12 MP camera. The DSCW830 (in landscape mode) has a problem with bright sun as it causes washout. That does not happen with my Nikon. We have gravel walkways and if the sun is shining the DSCW830 has a problem photographing the gravel, the Nikon does not. My 5 MP phone camera also does not. Other areas that are in the sun also get washed out. It appears that the brightness overloads the image sensor. I have been taking photos of our yard for years as we have lots of flowers and stuff that blooms from Spring to Fall. I compared a lot of previous photos taken with other cameras/phones and the comparison to the DSCW830 was disappointing. The color and clarity were not what I had hoped for.,However, if you are not doing outdoor photos then this might be a good camera as it is easy to use and easy to setup.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I'm no expert, so this is a good camera for me.  I also hate reading a lot of directions, but that was no problem.  This was easy enough to figure out between a bit of reading and a few minutes on YouTube.  PROS: Easy to figure out, small as a deck of cards, has a lens protector, can look up more detailed directions online (for trouble-shooting); CONS: Doesn't come with a protective case, doesn't come with a memory card, a little on the slow side -but that doesn't bother me.  It took Rembrandt a lot longer.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I honestly am considering returning this camera if I still can... I loved my Sony Cybershot cameras in the past which is why I purchased this and I assumed this one would yield *relatively decent* pictures. I wasn’t naively hoping for super crisp, professional shots considering the price, but I am very disappointed with the quality of the pictures this camera takes.... even with a flash, the pictures just aren’t any good. The speed of the shutter is super slow so if you’re trying to take even slightly low light photos without a flash, they will be, with no doubt, super blurry and grainy... and with a flash, the picture is washed out and everyone has red pupilsz The camera is lightweight, which is nice but I honestly don’t even bother bringing it with me places because the photos it takes aren’t worth the time or energy.... I was hoping for a light weight, quality point and shoot to use when I don’t want to carry around my SLR... and to replace using my iPhone all the time. No such luck with this lil guy, unfortunately... Perhaps I’ve lost my touch with using these little cameras, but I truly feel this products isn’t worth the money, especially for someone without any background in photography, which is who this ideally would be perfect for... in a perfect world.. anyway, don’t bother. And I’ll just add, writing this review makes me want to see if I can return it even more now.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought his camera for my tech challenged parents who wanted a small easy to use camera for their vacations. There is a setting in the menu "easy" that they can leave and get automatically the best settings without them having to change much. There is also an easy slider botton that changes between photo, panorama and video... so far so good. The only downside is the battery life, I felt that they ran low fast. I bought a 2 pack and car charger in addition to the original items in the pack and that was perfect for them.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This was for a granddaughter who loves it, but it's been a struggle figuring out the details of how to use it.  The directions in the package were worthless, but the company sent a pdf file with directions that were helpful on request.  Focus is the major remaining issue as there is no push-and-pause autofocus feature as with most digital cameras and she does get some blurry pictures.  I was also on my own figuring out spare batteries and external chargers.  The battery stuff is fine now, and we'll see what the pictures look like when she comes back from camp.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Update March 9, 2019.,This camera is a white elephant since 4 months ago. very sad. my last sony lasted for years and was my best companion device everywhere i travelled around the world. I even get comments like "cool, someone with a real camera!". This lousy replacement is so bad i ended up like everyone else using my iphone instead. Disappointed,.,Original review:,Purchased this to replace my Sony DSCWX9 which i loved until it is acting up after many years (plastic battery lock fails which i held up with a piece of tape) and it is not restarting properly upon pressing start button.,I want another Sony. I had had two previous DSC generations with Carl  ZEISS lens and i like to stick with it. After researching and reading the reviews, I thought Sony DSCW830 would be good replacement but NO.,1. Picture quality not good - the colors does not come close to the true colors that my old sony takes. The old sony takes sunsets for example, showing vibrancy in the hues,I take many photos for real estate properties and compare with my old sony, this one pales in comparison. it does not capture good ANGLES like the old one does. I took photos of the same rooms from same position, the DSCW830 cannot capture as much and as wide.,2. Smaller display LCD screen. I knew that before buying from the specs but usually when  they change a newer model, it is an upgrade. in this case, they reduce screen size for what? save cost of manufacture???,The only positive thing i like is that the video recording is quick and good. And, it is lighter and smaller so fits in my pocket without much weight. but these do not compensate for poor quality photos.,I do not recommend this camera. wish i can return it for a better one.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: PO'D...DOES NOT COME WITH A/C WALL ADAPTER! PC CHARGING ONLY!.. So I bought this camera for a special event TOMORROW, Jan 25th, 2019. It arrives, looks OK, BUT, where is the AC ADAPTER it says and shows comes with it? Missing item? YES, but it's MORE than just that. The little square box, which has 2 inputs, 1 for the USB connection(other part of the USB, a micro USB, connects to the camera itself to CHARGE IT, WHEN the AC Wall adapter is plugged in) ...and the other "2-port" connection, the "POWER CORD(Mains lead) which IS NOT Included in the US/Canada/China VERSION of this camera),  Look at the Instruction manual, 2nd page, and it shows For Customers in the USA/Canada/China, a square box, that has an AC Adapter that pulls out from the side so you can plug it in and charge it. NOPE! NOT WITH THIS CAMERA!...I was sent this yesterday, spent 30 minutes on the phone being apologized too. The Rep said he'd send out another camera, and I am too take out the AC Adapter from that camera, and return the rest...I said PLEASE MAKE SURE it has the AC ADAPTER, because if I get this again, and there's no AC adapterfor me to plug in, I'm gonna be really PO'd....After being put on hold, I'm told, YES IT DOES, and we'll overnight it for FREE!...OK, TY!!...Well it just came, and it's the same damn thing, NO AC ADAPTER to plug into the wall...Now, you CAN charge it via the USB using your PC & supplied USB Cable. Now for some, that is perfectly A-OK....But, for myself, and/or others who may not own a PC, or only have an older PC with a lot less USB Ports too access, it's not OK!...Now I won't do that ever again because in the past I did that with another small item that said I can charge it via my PC and supplied USB Cable and it F'd up my PC within a few minutes, so never again. I fought for months with those companies to get the money to fix my PC, and finally did!  So again, this HAS NO AC OUTLET w/ "PRONGS (if you will) to plug into the wall...IF you wanna charge this via your PC, and that is OK with you, godspeed....It's Not hard listing the ACTUAL CONTENTS, how it charges etc...IF this ad said, CHARGING THE BATTERY VIA THE USB & YOUR PC ONLY, IN THE US/CANADA/CHINA...OK, not a problem then I look for a different camera....So i blame Amazon, and Sony for this BS and utter nightmare...Just look at the image in the Instruction manual! I did that before I bought it, and I also read other customers questions and replies, and YES it comes with a charger and AC ADAPTER.....While I guess, technically true, if the camera's INSTRUCTION MANUAL SHOWS THE AC ADAPTER THAT PLUGS INTO THE WALL, THERE BETTER BE A DAMN AC ADAPTER THAT PLUGS INTO THE GODDARN WALL!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Good portable solution with great battery life. I recommend its use for casual photography. Please note that its a good camera but by any means, it is not a professional camera. It's a good option to give as a gift for older or/and younger people. Please keep in mind you will need a small SD card too.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Been a week but so far, so good.  Very easy to use and the photos have been great.  Including the zoom.  A lot of options for photos tho and the book will travel with me at all times. There was a wrist strap included in the bundle but it is too large for this camera.  Trying to figure out what else I can use it for.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera is small and compact and the pictures are good. However, it takes a very long time for the pictures to be taken. Whenever you need to take pictures quickly, this camera will fail an you end up with blurry pictures. I purchased the camera to capture my child in a competition and it took so long for the pictures to be taken I ended up not having any pictures of the event. This was so so disappointing. the person has to stay still for a long time for you to capture images. i even try adjusting the settings and this did not help.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: honestly, this is an o.k. camera. nothing too complicated, but not super user friendly either. too many options, which may or may not be a good thing for you. however, i find the camera on my microsoft lumia 950 blows this out of the water, especially with night pictures. it does take very sharp pics, but so does my lumia 950, and these days, i found my lumia brand new, although listed as refurbished on ebay for the same price as this camera, and thats also obviously a phone which i have on me everyday anyways. so, why need this? these types of cameras are becoming obsolete.

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: This is perfect for travel because it one thing less to worry about during the trip because it's not the end of the day if you lose it not like these few hundred dollars camera you gotta be so careful about. This thing is so compact so light and picture quality wise is actually pretty good, yes pretty good not super great but your paying 80 bucks for a recording camera don't expect too much. The attachment picture shows this camera is laying on an iPhone 6Plus so to give you an idea how small this thing really is, the only downside of this purchase is that it doesn't come with any mini SD card so you have to purchase one. Have fun recording!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: I Love this Wide Instax it camera, both the Instax 8 and the wide work great but I do enjoy the size of this photos, it's not much bigger but it does make a difference at least for what I needed it for. For my wedding I did a scrapbook at the entrance instead of a signing book, So I had guest take a selfie( or had someone else take pic) and then they would write a message on white portion of pic. So with this size I was able to appreciate it better specially when it was a couple of guest versus just one person. Great Product.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: We are very pleased with our camera!  We needed to replace an old camera because it no longer worked, and didn't want to spend a lot of money.  However, we still needed something that would take great pictures.  This is perfect.  Reasonably priced and meets our needs.  Not to mention the accessories!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Excellent camera. convenient and easy to use

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera is good but the screen isn't very clear so at first I thought maybe it was messed up but it takes good picture but I wish the screen on the camera was better quality so you can view it easier. IT doesn't shoot very fast so if you want a camera that shoot instantly this isn't the one. I'm using to take photos of my signs for my business so it will work but not sure I'm happy about the price so haven't decided if it is worth it for the price when there are other camera out there that could be better.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: this is a replacement to a sony pocket camera that has been used for over a decade.
