product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Lovely camera and kit for me to learn to use over the next month or so. This will become part of my research tool set. I am very pleased with this vendor and the speed the camera rrived and how it was packaged. WAY TO GO, 5 thumbs up!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: While the accessories are nice to have, the majority of the extra stuff are things you probably wouldnt purchase individually due to low quality. The screen covers were of such awful quality that after barely putting one edge on my camera, I had a doubt, tried to take it off, and spent the next hour carefully scraping away the adhesive that cemented itself to the camera.,I dont feel comfortable even thinking about putting the extra battery that came with it in the charger, much less the camera considering how generic it looks. The same can be said of the little "tripod" stand with legs so short it can barely stand on its own as well as the "stabilization brace" which appears to be more awkward than useful.,In any case, the camera itself is an authentic Canon and of great quality, but the extras are things you're probably better off buying from other places to get real quality versus a low budget "bundle" where you end up paying for things you cant even really use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Great point & shoot camera for the price.  The clarity when zoomed is very good and the HD video is sharp and clear.  Comes with so made extras that you will need.  Would definitely recommend this camera package!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this as a gift for my wife’s birthday. First thing I noticed is the camera is double boxed with a bubble mailer in between the two boxes to keep it from moving. Inside the box with the camera and accessories were plenty of packaging peanuts to protect the inner contents. The price point alone is worth the camera so the fact that they include all the accessories is enough to recommend this to anyone looking for a starter camera. I turned it on to make sure it was functioning fine and it was perfect and seemed easy to use. Accessories that are included are a travel charger, screen protector, travel case, extra battery, an SD card, wiping cloth, a care kit, a small tripod stand, and a usb SD card reader for easy access to plug into any computer/device that supports USB input. Honestly not only did they ensure that the product arrived as safe as possible but they ensured everything included was for every possible convenience. Hope my wife loves it! Thank you guys.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I'm absolutely in love with this camera! It's super easy to use (especially for a beginner like me) and the company is super helpful and friendly! When I bought the bundle I wasn't sure what all I was expecting to receive and it felt just like the holidays. For example, I would've never thought about getting a car charger for my camera before. Now I don't have to worry, because the bundle came with one! I'm super excited to go on family road trips with it, especially knowing I have a way to charge it. Here are some pictures I've taken with it, granted I'm very new at photography.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is what I expected. It took great shots in the daytime and the zoom helped to get a more precise shot. I would not classify this camera as a professional grade to where you could head out and do wedding shots or photo shoots. In fact purchasing the $1000+ Iphone would probably give you just as clear and precise images for those of us who haven't upgraded yet as (July 8 2019). Camera came with a few accessories which was an added bonus including an extra battery & charger unit. Did not perform well under low light despite the onboard flash. The camera does not have a ton of options to change the lighting settings so I assume that taking shots in a dimmer area will result in dimmer photos of low quality.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Pictures are fairly poor quality on a par with an old 256KP I bought many years ago and inferior to any phone camera that I have seen. Some features are non-functional to useless. Difficult and time consuming to download pictures as it requires removing the chip and putting it directly into a computer. Then all pictures require manual sorting one at a time. None of the advertised ways of doing this function in the camera. Camera has lots of buttons and settings most that do nothing at all or have very marginal effects. It is what I would expect from a cheap camera priced under $50.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Great package that included absolutely everything anyone could want in a camera package.  Easy to follow instructions.  Item had great reviews and turned out to be just what I wanted/needed to replace my aging  Samsung digital camera.  That camera had been great with every possible feature so it was a hard item to replace, but this one does the trick plus the added value of such a large zoom lens. It will get a work out as I am preparing for a week long Harley ride/camping trip with some brothers from church then a two week cross country AMTRAK vacation.  I will update my review after returning, but I fully expect the update to  be a glowing addition.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: This package kit was great, we used it to take pictures at our wedding.  For non-professionals, we had many nice shots due to the high degree of zooming, the good resolution of the digital images, and the many beginner friendly features.  The kit made it a breeze to know we had all our bases covered (no worrying about finding the right kind of backup battery, compatible SD card, or spare charger types.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: OMG! You have found a lifelong customer! Where do I start? First the camera is AMAZING! Hands down best camera I've ever owned! Then the accessories it comes with are not only GREAT quality but accent the camera so nicely (stand, cleaning kit, 2 batteries and 2 chargers, screen protectors, a carrying case with shoulder strap, etc) ! Everything works perfectly! I am 100% satisfied with this purchase! There is always uncertainty when buying electronics offline, well you don't have to worry here! 10 out of 10! 5 stars! 100% you are the best! Thank you!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Wish it would have came with a port on the camera to connect directly to a computer, other devices to import pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Takes awesome  pictures

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Camera works great and has tons of features. The add on kit has so much! Came right on time. Very happy with this purchase!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Purchased for a trip and am learning it during our VBS program. Taking great photos. Buttons and screen are a little small, but finished product holds up to what I am looking for. Shipped quickly with very nice accessories and well packaged.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: This is just an affordable camera. Takes great photos!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: The camera is a Bat Mitzvah  gift for my granddaughter in Israel. We haven't given it to her yet. We are sure that she'll love it just as much as  her sisters love theirs!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Have not had a chance to use everything yet, buy so far so good!  All the items seem to be of good quality and contraction.  Everything came well packaged and as advertised.  Great package for a traveling set or for someone just starting out!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Value and quality in this one

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Product does not have portal link to USB cable. Too many accessories, would like more put into the camera itself.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I bought it for my 11 years daughter and she like it

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: A camera is a tool. In my world, that is.  Not a gizmo or a grown up toy, a tool. I cannot keep up new products or enjoy the sensation of having one’s equipment obsolete two years later.,Forcing the wrong tool to be a surrogate or having an insufficient one, for lack of a better term, sucks tuckus, can be so distracting your productivity is slashed and often negates the positive flow of creativity. Sure, millions of amazing photographs have been taken with terrible cameras, but the aresnal of options with this here X-T3 makes it much easier to do what I find most difficult, capturing what I see in my head and getting it on film... pseudo film.,Megapixels are cute. The configuration possibilities infinite. Metering and autofocus lovely. Design impeccable. Rugged. All boxes checked.,Here is why I’m totally floored by the X-T3....,FINALLY, a digital camera I can use without pining for my F3. I earned my degree in Photojournalism shooting endless rolls of TRI-X, T-Max 3200, actual slide film (great way to learn how film sees light at eight bucks a roll) and color negative when required.,To me, digital cameras were horrible until the D700 opened my, ahem, eyes. Blunt, insufficient useless tools. Convenient, sure, but hamfisted and simply not worth it. After living, eating, sleeping and having a blissful love affair with an 8008s, the F3 + MD-4 combo and then the F5, how could I take fifty steps back? Shutter button delay. Remember that? DX cropping? Befuddling. My 85mm is now what? Destroyed my flow. The D700, an FX body + grip that broke my AMEX (grip a must) felt good ten years ago. Obsolete eight years ago. I’ve been nursing it, but we fell out of synch.,FUJIFILM,The X-Pro2 got me back in the game. It’s perfect. Converted after 25 years of Nikon loyalty. However, that means I had to collect new glass. I’ve always shot prime @ 85mm, 35mm and a Wide (20, 24 or, yawn, 28). Gathered those (FUJINON 14, 23 AND 56)...,SECOND BODY. Changing lenses when doing documentary (inc. events like weddings) is laborious, conspicuous, an unwelcome respite and messy. Thus, second body. Which one? The X-Pro2 is my first rangefinder and has a special usefulness. My second needed to be equally effective. I chose the X-T3 (plus battery grip and simple grip - both worth every dime).,It’s now Day Three with the X-T3 and I am in love. It will enable me to produce the work my imagination conjures up. “Why?’, you ask..,It feels like a 4:5 scale F3 (with grip) or a even a classic take on the D700 at 3:4 scale. Tools I know. Tools I love. Tools that don’t make me think about knob fiddling or hunting through designed-by-mathematicians menus.,Except this one has an entire camera shop and darkroom built right in. After a few hours I now have seven custom modes ranging from film noir to oversaturated Velvia to 70s soft portrait. All the Fujifilm cameras have this, yes. Being able to SEE IN BLACK AND WHITE while I’m shooting in black and white doubled what little ‘talent’ I have. No longer do I have to mentally convert and calculate how the film reacts to the world seen through the lens of an SLR. Pause and think about that. My palette is grayscale. Color distracts me.,WHY I LOVE THE X-T3...,Flip out screen.,Touch screen.,Bluetooth remote and transfer.,Fast, fast, fast focusing.,Joystick.,USB-C (thanks Tim Cook),Everything Fujifilm (just the route I took),Software evolution (similar, but not the same firmware as the x-pro2),With battery grip it’s 100% capable of enabling you to apply your Talent (Eye) shooting riots, sports, action, war, protests, more action, more sports. Fast made faster. Ruggedly rugged.  Having a robust camera opens doors and wins trust because subjects recognize you as a professional.,And so much more.,This is the camera that finally allows me to accept digital, forget about digital and shoot unhindered.,Buy it. Buy lots of batteries. The metal grip makes it much easier to hold. The battery grip gets an A.,As a tool, it will be treated as such. I’m curious how it will stand up over time. Picking it up mid-review, I think it’ll be just fine.,Can we slow down on technological evolution? This is enough. I’m good.

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: Recently tried the Fujifilm XT3 and now have converted my run and gun setup to the XT3. First thing that really grabbed my attention during the initial test shoot were the dials in top, excellent, quick and easy to use. Next the AF is stellar, very quick and tracks nicely. Finally after the shoot seeing the results of the Extera profile, which more than satisfied my needs. There are so many options I really like about the camera, it seems very well throughout and feels familiar after a few short projects. Bravo to Fujifilm to producing such a great camera!

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: I was so looking forward to using this camera specially the 4K 60 fps feature for that 4K slow-mo, and after watching so many reviews online, I made the decision that i'm going with this camera instead of the Sony A7III. Right out of the box after turning on the camera and confirming the date, the camera just freezes with black screen, and doesn't even responds to the turn off and on button, i have to physically remove the battery for it to turn off. i researched the problem online and i found a lot of people having the same issue and they called Fuji and they told them it's a fried motherboard!? Very disappointed in Fuji quality control. I was so looking forward to use it and i also bought 2 prime lenses for it, so i had to return everything. I guess after they moved their manufacturing from japan to china the quality went down hill. I didn't want a replacement as this made me feel unsafe with the longevity of this camera, and i just went with the safest route the Sony A7III instead.

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: Love the XT-3, the only complaint I have is that there was no silver seal on the baggie that the camera came in, which it should have because I paid for a brand new camera. I’m a Nikon girl for the most part but thought this would be a great walk around camera. The Fuji menu systems are a bit more complicated than Nikon but this is my first Fujifilm so there is definitely a learning curve. The photos that this camera produces are gorgeous! Im very happy so far.

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: As a Fujifilm XT20 owner I have become a big fan of the Fuji X system cameras. The XT-3 does not disappoint!  I upgraded to this camera primarily for the  improved focus system,  video capabilities and weatherproofing.  I could not be happier with the performance of the camera. The focusing is so much faster and more accurate and has improved the performance of some of my older Fujinon lenses.  Battery life has never been great in the Fuji system but the XT 3 seems to be a bit better than the XT20- just know you will always need extra batteries on hand with Fuji cameras, but for me that was not a dealbreaker given the trade off  of amazing performance.  After this camera I know I will never go back to DLSR.  Maybe more camera than I needed as a hobbyist/enthusiast but it’s definitely bringing my photography up to the next level-and it is such a fun camera to shoot with  I find myself taking it everywhere.  My favorite combination lens is the 10-24mm f4.0  because I really think this camera excels at landscape photography.  That being said, the 35 mm F2.0 pretty much lives on the body.  The amazing Fuji X lens lineup and this camera body make a perfect kit  that will take your photography game to the next level.

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: Brilliant, i compared it with Sony a7rii, nikon d7500(though its not mirrorless) . Personally i liked the fuji more. Looks are everyone’s individual choice so I won’t comment. But i liked the retro style. Lens quality is the best i have seen so far in a kit lens. Battery is great but i ordered a spare. I am learning photography but i would say its a bit expensive for amateurs/learners - i absolutely love the viewfinder, as i had seen other competitors’ as well. Got 2 memory card slots, so thats nice. Yet to click and learn settings but whatever i clicked so far was damn good! Waiting for some good weather to go out!! Just a tip : Do not get mixed up in full frame vs crop. If you are tyring to : means u really do not know much about photography. You can get equally amazing shots with a aps c. Try the camera if possible in person and remember a basic dslr can also produce amazing pictures and there is NO bad camera.!!

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: Fuji has bested Canon, Nikon, Sony and Panasonic with this camera for its 4K 60fps shooting for starters. Much more intuitive/options for manual knob control and within the menu itself. File sizes are considerably smaller than the Canon 5D Mark IV (1.5 g per minute in 60fps vs canon 4 g in 30fps which is as high as Canon goes per minute to boot). The Fuji is definitely a more well thought out piece of equipment overall. I had even discussed the camera with a B&H specialist whom had just himself purchased the camera for video and also believes the Fuji X-T3 to be the best option on the market. The only 2 downsides I have experienced are slightly less low light capability than the Canon 5D Mark IV or III for that matter and the 4:3 crop factor -neither of which is by any means a deal breaker but it would be nice to see no crop and better low light in their next rendition. One small thing for me is while the LED screen is better than the canon and articulates unlike the canon, it does not flip fully up just tilts and doesn't not flip back which is I like on the screen I have on my old Canon 70D. The screen however is clearer and brighter than the canon 5D and the look of the video is something I like. I will update once I have more experience with the camera but so far, I am very happy. Great job Fuji!

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: I use the camera mostly for video and mainly in commercial applications.  The camera takes awesome 4K video. I don't know of any competitors that offer up to 400MB bit rates like this Fuji does unless you buy a much more expensive commercial video camera.  There are many manual features and it also takes good photos and video in auto mode.  I really like the Chrome profile which gives you film and video a little vintage look.  Very quick auto-focus, nice kit lens f2.8, Solid metal construction.  The only disappoint for some will be the battery life.  Needs a larger battery for all day shooting. I bought the battery grip package so I have plenty of life for a full days shooting.

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: This is my first camera and I love it so far. Pictures are amazing and the video quality fits my needs. So far I've shot family events with hopes of getting into some commercial work once I get the hang of it. Still learning the camera but I have no regrets so far. I really need a gimbal for it but can't decide what to get.

product_name: Fujifilm X-T3 Mirrorless Digital Camera (Body Only) - Silver
review: I've been using this camera for a few months now, and I can't get enough. I've already taken tens of thousands of pictures because this camera is a true pleasure to operate. Sharp as a tack with the 56mm f/1.2, or fully weather resistant with the 23mm f/2. Battery has not been an issue as like in other mirrorless options. Customization buttons, tech features, and hardware features get used regularly. Eye detect autofocus works well. I've stopped using RAW because the jpegs are just that good. Best camera I've ever used.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I was hesitant to buy  a brand I had never heard of but this camera is high quality and takes great photos. Don't let the small size of this camera confuse you, it 21 Mega Pixel take great photos and is easy to use. I would not hesitate of take this camera on a trip or t give one as a gift. Highly recommended.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: If you want something that doesn't even work...then buy this.  If you want a disk that doesn't run for set up and does not support windows 10...then buy this.  Don't bother to search for a driver to get your computer to recognize the camera when you plug it in to the USB port...you can't.  There is no support.  I would return the thing in a hot minute,  but the box got thrown out so I can't.  Am I happy?  Nope,  not at all.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I tried taking couple photos, which came out a really good quality. It has lighter weight than I expected. It’s easy to use and carry around. I’m satisfy with this good price and got a really quality camera. Highly recommend.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I just took this little camera with me to D.C.  It took excellent quality pictures.  Has a small zoom on the camera which is an added bonus, but I was looking for a simple point and shoot camera without a lot of complications and this is exactly what I was looking for.  Also, the small compact size makes it so easy to put into your pocket or purse.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I saw that many people got one for their child and so I did as well. She’s young but loves taking pictures with it. The quality is okay considering the price for the camera. She loves it.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I ordered the red color for my daughter and she liked it. It’s very light and small. The instructions are easy to follow and understand. I need to buy a SD card as well.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera looks pretty but my experience with it wasn’t.  I read the instructions throughly and understood them, but I found the operation of the camera unnecessarily complicated and counterintuitive.  The scan disk was also difficult to remove: though it had a small spring mechanism, it didn’t boost the disk enough to get it out without tweezers.  I may have tolerated all of that except that the picture quality was poor as well.  I was very disappointed in this camera and returned it.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I ask my friend’s 7 year old daughter what dose she want for her birthday? She told me a camera. I start to look online to find something affordable but also have a good quality. I placed my order on this one , she was very happy when she saw the camera. It is very easy to use. The picture quality is really good too.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Bought this for my 9 yr old son so he could have a camera to take with him on a field trip to Kennedy Space Center. The camera would not hold a charge on the batteries. I had to go old school and buy a little disposable camera. My son was kind of disappointed...I was very disappointed. Keep browsing for a better quality camera. Don't fall for rave reviews of this camera.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I always loved photography, My son also likes. I bought this digital camera for him as a toy .This camera is so easy to use. It comes with two rechargeable lithium batteries and stays charged well.This is a great gift for little children who is like taking pictures .

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I used to have one like this in college and never loved another camera like it. So I bought it again for a recent trip to Disneyland. It took amazing photos and videos. I plan to use this as my youtube camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Took this on a trip and shot about 400 pictures.  Pictures came out pretty good. I use a DSLR but wanted the convenience of a pocket camera. It fit the bill. This camera is very small. It can be hard to see if you are level.  I couldn't find any feature for panarama. You get what you pay for.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I really love these ELPH cameras. This is my 2nd one and it works like a charm. Clear and crisp pictures in the size of your palm. Although Sony has elected to make these in plastic instead of metal like the first iterations, its still a good functioning camera for those who remember when you took pictures with a camera instead of a phone. LOL!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: The concept is fine, but if you read other reviews, you will find that the camera doesn'twork all the time. I had to send mine back because it died.,I went with another brand and another model type.  This camera would rock if it was reliable

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera was a great buy !! It is compact and the images are sharp and clear. I can download them to my computer,,and the quality remains unchanged. The battery life is also a plus and when it does need charged you can remove it and plug it into the charger. Priced right and received in 2 days with Prime.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Good camera. I took this on vacation to Europe because I wanted a small camera that took good pictures. The pictures turned out great! The battery lasted the entire vacation. Recommend for anyone who needs a small, good camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: does not take very good pictures and it does not focus very well, not worth the high price.no I would not buy again!!! very disappointing!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Very complicated WiFi setup....most difficult.  Also the battery life is limited so it is best to have a backup battery if you are in travel when you do not want to miss out on capturing images.  Otherwise, it is definitely better than a Polaroid.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Received this in the mail yesterday. I purchased it based on the high reviews. Came with everything you see in the picture. The battery took about an hour to charge and it’s been very user friendly so far. I’ll take pictures this weekend and provide an update.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: We have just received this camera Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 and to our big surprise it turns out that there is NO USB CABLE included. It's an essential part of any camera. We've had 5 cameras, 3 out of which are Canon brand and all 3 came with the USB cable, non of which fits this current. Please, advise ASAP.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Still a few things I have trouble with which I'm sure I'll figure out.  The previous Sony which is same basic model works better for downloading photos which this newer one does not.  My only complaint.  I'd sure buy it again if something happened to the new one!,David

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I'm not impressed. The camera takes a long time to focus and is only decent in optimal lighting situations. Save your money up and buy something better.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I initially gave this camera a 2-star rating but I have decided to come on here today to change that to a 4. I really like it, I never realized how much fun and convenient it could be to have a tiny camera to just carry along in my bag to snap a picture where ever I am. My little nephew loves it too. it is so easy for him to use at only 4 years old but still inspires me to take as many photos as I can anywhere I am.,it doesn't have audio but it has a movie making function.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Feels so bad to write a negative review but got to give a fair review. #1 Best Seller was the reason that prompted me buy this camera. But alas! After using sparsely for just a year or so, something went wrong with the lens and the camera no longer works properly! The pictures clicked are completely blur and hazy. Totally useless!! Probably the camera is good. Hence, the best seller. But it's just me who has received a defective piece unfortunately!! And,it is going to be just 2 stars from my end.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Good camera. Good pictures.  Not so easy to use and operate. Manual lacks in clarity and instructions. Had to figure it out for myself.,I recommend this camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Pretty disappointing, I got this camera thinking  it would be better than taking photos with my iPhone 6. It takes blurry photos in lower light situations and nothing  to write home about in normal lighting.  The video is horrible, the iPhone is much better and the stabilization is awful.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This is a very good camera for everyday use. I keep it with me at all times at work and its' 'predecessor' cybershot was extremely reliable and although it still works well, developed an issue after 6 years and I figured it was time to replace it, so I purchased the next closest clone in the Sony line which I expect will serve as well. Purchase was fine and delivery fast.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Second bad camera I've ordered here although everything else I get is great.  I can't return it because I waited too long.  A costly mistake because this is going into the garbage.  The memory card slot was defective, bent, I don't know what, but a memory card could not be inserted.  I bought the recommended memory card from Amazon plus purchased two others close to home because I thought I was making a mistake.  I finally used force to push one in and it wouldn't  come out.  Had to use pliers. Sigh.  Makes me think you should check this as soon as you get the camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this for a very technologically challenged friend and he was able to use it pretty easily.  I showed him how to do the basics and he got it right away.  It takes great pics and the zoom is a good distance.  Also, there is an easy mode that you can put it on that makes the wording larger and makes the camera even more simple.  I highly recommend this camera for new users and those that might have a difficult time with the technology.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this little to replace my [ pricier ] Cannon that My lady friend dropped. I was skeptical with Not having experience with Sony Cameras. Even though I know Sony produces quality products. But this camera was about one third the cost of My previous camera.. Well with their reputation and the [Positive] experiences I have with Amazon. What did I have to loose... Well I had nothing to lose. In fact I had a Big Gain. The camera is More then I expected. I got a great camera, at a price.So I can afford to buy one for My Son !

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This camera takes great pictures but the batteries die fast.  The batteries that come with it are junk and didn’t work when I got the camera.  I changed them immediately and then I only took about 50 photos and I had to change the batteries again.,The screen shuts off instantly so you have to constantly adjust the zoom to get the screen to turn back on so you can see what you’re taking a picture of.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: First digital camera I've had in a while.  My phone doesn't take great photos and the price was right on this.  Small enough to fit in a shirt pocket and takes good photos.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This budget, wonderful little camera gets the job done extremely well! Sure, there's plenty of more powerful cameras (and smart-phones) out there, but for a point-and-shoot, this one delivers flawlessly. Plus, the UI is very easy to use!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I received the camera, set it up and I took 2 practice photos to make sure I knew what I was doing and now after only 2 pictures, the camera keeps telling me the "memory is full".  There is nothing in the paperwork, operating manual, etc. that tells me how to fix the problem so the camera just sits here in the box.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Had this camera for about 8 months. Rarely used it, but we took it on a recent trip because it is so small and light weight. Brand new fresh batteries last long enough for maybe 5 pictures. Different brands of batteries, keeping the camera turned off between shots, nothing helps. This is a waste of time and money. Avoid it.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I purchased this as a gift for my mom. She wanted to take pics of our vacation. It will not turn on. I tried using only name brand batteries. I used brand new from the store. I recharged my charfeable batteries.. Nothing,Very frustrated bc we leave tomorrow now I have to return and go to store to purchase a new one.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: I was looking for an inexpensive point and shoot for my 14 y.o. son's 21 day backpacking trip out west. While the price was great and delivery was fast, the quality of the images was really disappointing. We ended up using a camera we had from 10 years before and it worked well.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Bought it for my vacation and was not able to use . Even with fresh batteries it wouldn't turn on completely. Would get a black screen and When I tried to connect to my PC to download the 4 pictures I was able to take it wouldn't connect.Got back from my vacation and was not able to return the camera because the return policy had expired 2 day before my return. 30 day policy is too short a time. last time I buy a camera thru Amazon.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Well, purchased and used for about a month and a half. Since that time the camera has just stopped working. It will turn on for a few seconds then cut back off. I dabble in electronics, so generally I can mend any problems that arise. But this product did not last any time at all. I wish it was a better product. *I will update of seller reaches out and offers a replacement*,Just a note to other fellow reviewers, If a company offers a replacement please update your star rating and comments. Any company willing to take that time is a company that wants to try their best.

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: This has been a handy little camera.  Probably not the greatest but for it's size and features, I like it.  It's small enough to put in my shirt pocket so it's easy to carry and have ready for a shot.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I had a camera from Sony that looked identical (W650), which worked very well, but broke by accident. So, I needed portable Sony with Zeiss lens.,This camera meets most of the expectations, except one- the speed. I've got many not focused pictures and some, which are just late. There is no manual included (I found it at manualslib.com) and there is many adjustments, which is time consuming to try. So, the camera is just little slow for now, but works right otherwise.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: ok, first, the picture with this review is from my iPhone because it takes better pictures than this hunk of junk. I'm tired of having to make changes in the menu EVERY SINGLE TIME I TURN IT ON!! For all that is holy can you just save the dang settings???,Pictures are fuzzy, it says it's focused but no....,It won't turn on when you push the button (sometimes),It will randomly turn off,I threw it in a river.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This camera was purchased as an inexpensive alternative to a DSLR (ok - not alternative, but when traveling abroad, the teacher wouldn't allow my daughter to bring her DSLR so we got this instead).,This camera caused major distortion on the corners of images - so if any person happened to be in the corner - they looked pretty funny. This camera also had internal dust on the lens. I cleaned the lens several times - with the same stuff I clean my professional lenses with - and nothing got the dust out - so I have to assume it was on the inside of the lens. ALL images had this dust on them - and they are NOT easy to remove in post processing. I had high hopes for this camera being a nice alternative when my daughter can't take her bulky DSLR - but this is not the case. Not many of her photos turned out. Quite disappointing for a once in a lifetime trip.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I bought this camera to take on a trip to China. It was great most of the time. And the 20MP pictures are so much better than my phone. The slow reset to taking the next picture is a little annoying, and I killed the battery every day. I really wish I had gotten a spare battery. So if you will be out for more than 5 hours and you use the zoom a lot and take a lot of pictures, 400 was the most I was able to take in a day, you will really want a spare battery. The auto focus and image stabilization work great, so does the panorama feature. I dropped it a few times and it was still just fine, but maybe I was just lucky. Overall, I am glad I chose this camera, even with the short battery life.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: If your are looking for a small Camera ,with a German Zeiss Lens, that takes really good pictures ,for under $150,this is the only one. I spent 16 days in The Galapagos Islands ,and the  "Nasty" (So hot ,humid, rains all the time). The Amazon Jungle Rainforest. It was so bad ,I thought my Camera would stop working. But it survived just fine.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: l bough this camera new it would not work so i sent it to sony repair it could not be fixed so they sent me another one that one was broke also i am out 118.00 i can not get sony on the phone. so far no camera no money.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: The camera seems fine, but the item description should clearly state "WARNING, THIS CAMERA WILL NOT DOWNLOAD PICTURES TO A MAC". I couldn't even assess the camera because of this limitation. Sony dropped the ball because this looked like it would be a great camera (I'm returning it tho, so I'll never know)

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I love this little camera!  It's just what I was looking for.  It takes great photos and is easy to operate....so far.  It's small and fits anywhere.  I'm not a photographer so I was just looking for a little point and shoot I could use.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: My long loved digital camera and its case were failing. This replacement is great! (I always buy last year's models to save money). Got for a good price. Had to study the manual for a bit to understand and set options. Paired it with HDE Neoprene Case for Sony Cyber-Shot Digital Cameras. https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B001U8V87U/ref=oh_aui_search_detailpage?ie=UTF8&psc=1

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Almost a "Kiddie" Camera.  Slow save rate (even though I have one of the fastest memory cards available).  Takes some Great pictures, takes some 'ok' pictures, takes some bad ones.  All in the same light conditions.  Strange.  BUT, I bought it as a backup camera and to have a zoom better than my phone.  My samsung takes consistently better pictures.  The 8x optical zoom works well.  So i am underwhelmed, but given the price, i'm giving it 3 stars.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Small and lightweight which is perfect for my 4th grader. Very user friendly.

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: Great camera.  Great display and holds strdy

product_name: Digital Camera, Lyyes 2.7" Mini Camera HD 720P Digital Point Shoot Camera 8X Zoom Camera for Kids and Gifts (Black)
review: This  camera  works  really good.  I bought it for my 11 year old to take with her to dance competitions.  Its small enough to fit perfect in her bag.  It takes good quality pictures.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: I like almost everything about this camera. If it had an articulating screen for selfies or vloging it would be perfect. I wish they kept the photo timelapse feature.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Changed my life.,This is the best camera for anyone who wants to shoot videos and photos, for under $3000.  Get the one with the 28-70mm kit lens, it’ll work just fine. If you want a better lens, get the combo with the Tamron 28-75mm f2.8.,There are better photography cameras out there (A9, A7riii, and Canon consistently wins in photography competitions with the 1DXmkii and 5Dmkiv) but those cameras are expensive. Unless you’re a pro-photographer, the A7iii is more than enough.,Videography is where this camera shines.,The Sony A7iii and a6400 are currently the best cameras for amateur and semi-pro videographers.,Here’s why: at this price point, these are the ONLY cameras that can shoot 1080p 120fps AND have a 4K option (in 24 or 30fps).,In my opinion, these are the only three frame rates that videographers need. 24 and 30 allow you to have the standard cinematic shots (many camera have this option, but the Sony’s have it in non-cropped 4K option).,And you need 120fps, for cinematic slow-motion.  Seriously, for any future videographers out there, you NEED 120p.  60fps is not enough for that beautiful slow-mo that you’ll want.,Only Sony and Nikon (z6) can do it, but Nikon is meh.,Also, Sony has best low light capabilities. No need to say more.,Cons:,The lenses are expensive!!,People say, “glass is more important than the camera body,” but for a videographer, I don’t think so.  If you shoot at 35mm on a 24-70mm vs a 35mm prime lens, you’d have to pixel-peep to tell the difference between the two. What I’m trying to say is, you don’t need that many lenses, regardless of which camera ecosystem you’re with.,For starters, I recommend a mid-range lens (24-70mm f2.8 or f4, or the Tamron 28-75 f2.8) and then grow from there. See which end of that zoom lens do you prefer more. If you’re consistently shooting towards a shorter focal length, then invest in a 16-35mm next. If like me, you find yourself using the high focal length more, get the Sony 85mm 1.8 next.,In the end, I have three lenses only, and they do everything I need.,Sony 16-35 f4,Tamron 28-75 f2.8,Sony 85 f1.8,Conclusion: if you seriously want to dive into videography and photography, to his is the camera for you.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: I love this camera. My canon 70d broke almost a year ago and I need a new one. I looked a several others and decided full frame mirrorless. It has great autofocus, face and image stabilization(not as good as say a gh5 but still good). I love using my a7III with my sony 90mm 2.8 g lens. I also have a 28-70 sony 3.5-5.6. The kit lens is not that sharp but its pretty great for the price. The sony body itself is small and can barely fit my hands. I use the battery grip to make it more use able and it is fine. The back screen doesn't flip out but it does tilt up. The auto focus for stills is amazing and not bad for video. The menu system is awful but there is not many custom buttons and menus you can avoid this. The image quality is great and I love the 1080p 120fps. The 4k at 24 is great as well. I stay away from the 4k30 since there is a crop. The custom buttons and record are all in great spots. I love the dual card slots. is meant for the faster SD II card but two SD I will work. You can change how you want things to record and too what card. I really love the silent shutter mode which is great for on film set photography, interviews, weddings where you don't want to make a sound. The finally pro is it does work with external monitors like the atoms assassin and small hd. just make sure you get a cage for that. The cons are the lens prices. They are honestly outrageous. The really great sony gm lens are way more expensive then ones for canon and nikon. Almost a 1000 more. The lower end g lens are great but also still pricey. The regular sony lens are what you would except, basic but useable. I would look into sigma lens and other lens companies they do a great job. I am also going to be adapting lens to see what that's like so far I can't give answer. Possibly in an update i could. Another con is the screen is not greatest which is why I use a monitor. The fact that its mirrorless the sensor gets dirty much quicker but I know how to clean my sensor its just something to note. This camera is for hybrid shooters. Its great for stills and video. If you want just video look at a gh5 or black magic. If you want just still this will work but you could get something cheaper. I myself really recommend this camera.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: I ended returning the camera after 3 weeks of using it !,I am Wirh Nikon for the past 6 years , old school DSLR ... here is my take on the A7iii:,- good camera for entry level photographers,- I notice photo quality issues under low lighting and in general,- battery life is so low !,- quality of matrial, grep and the plastic feeling really turn me off..,- I hated the menu system,Sony is great camera and mirrorless is future but for me , not now ... I will stay with DSLR for next 2~3 years , just my thoughts

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: I moved to the A7II from a Sony A6500, which is itself a wonderful camera (I enjoy the light weight of an APS-C - a good hiking camera). The A7III has proven itself a delightful upgrade: Still light enough (not the monstrousness of a Canon system, from which I was a refugee), and yet with glass and a sensor that worked very well for my use (family occasions, landscapes, portraits).

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Great build quality and design. It definitely had its learning curve coming from Canon, so you should dedicate some hours on YouTube. Autofocus is amazing.,The smartphone connecting feature works 75% of the time, but that's more of an app issue. I don't like file transfer app that Sony makes you use.,Besides Sony's crap PC and iOS software, this camera is perfect. I think it kicks the Canon 6D's ass.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Overheats too easily

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: I have been using this camera for 3 days, and still I haven’t been able to go to the mountains. So this review is based on my first impressions as a previous A7ii owner,- I love the 2 SD cards availability. I wanted this for a long time, saving my photos on two SD cards simultaneously improves reliability.,- The SD card slot is locked, so I won’t open it accidentally every time that I take the camera out of my bag.,- Autofocus is much more realizable and responsive.,- bigger battery = better battery life,- custom / favorites menu is a great plus when you can’t remember where are those settings that you constantly use.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: This is another case of Sony coming out with a product with a horrible feature.  Not only does it save files in a complicated tree where your video files are in a different place than your images, but the image files are a continuing sequence, but the video file names reset at every card change.  So, if you buy this to take videos of your kids you will overwrite them and be very upset.  No other major camera manufacturer does this.  I'm coming from a Canon, was using a Fuji FZ80 for a 4k video bridge camera, my wife is a Nikon person (apparently she has more money than me), and I've been using Casio underwater cameras forever.  My old 3.2 megapixel HP camera (that came with a 4x6 printer) didn't have this problem.  Sony came up with this nightmare all on their own.  Wow.  I am still stunned with how stupid this is and if I did not save files in two locations I'd have likely overwritten.,The autofocus is not as good as I would have expected (almost equal to the T4i).  I bought 2 lenses, telescope mount, spare batteries and charger...  And I think this camera is going back.  Since it occasionally just comes out with a completely out of focus mess I can't give autofocus or picture quality 5 stars.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Incredible camera with wonderful autofocus and video abilities. I'm upgrading from a Sony a6300...there are so many things better about this camera. The sensor is much more sensitive so I no longer need to use a flash. It works very well with the Sony 55mm/1.8 lens (incredibly sharp). The combination is wonderful to use. I just came back from vacation in Montreal and took many wonderful photos (Botanical Garden is amazing).

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I bought this for a young relative. It takes good pictures.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: So far enjoy using -- like the use of 2A batteries

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: The size for small hands.  Personal

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Easy to use, takes great pictures.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Close-up feature is not too effective

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: You get a lot for the money.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: This is not as good a quality camera as earlier cool pix that I have bought.  Just doesn't feel as solid and feels like it burns through batteries faster.  Use it for real estate due to wide angle and using double A batteries.  Ordered an older Coolpix L32 and will use this one only for a back up.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: It's okay.  I don't like it near as much as my old CoolPix, but it will do.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: So far so good, I've had it a few months and it is taking pictures, pretty much what one wants in a camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I really like it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: As someone who is not a super skilled photographer, I bought this camera for my trip to Tanzania and Kenya, because I wanted something good for catching images of the animals and landscape, but not so overwhelming that the camera was distracting me from the beauty of where I was. This camera was the perfect fit for me. It's light and compact and not overly complicated. I came back with stunning images of leopards in trees, lions on rocks, etc. The zoom was definitely "good enough" to get some quality images that I will never forget. There was also a panoramic feature that came in really handy a few times to get a wider shot of a line of elephants crossing the road.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am headed to Italy so I will do a follow up when I get back in August.,Follow-up review: I am very pleased with this camera. The pictures were sharp and the menu is easy to use. I also like that it has Wi-Fi so I can instantly upload the pictures to my smartphone. I was able to zoom farther and with clarity than others in my group with their cameras. Not sure of the actual model types used but some were Cannon and Nikon. This camera has a 4K feature that enables you to shoot 30 frames per second. You can go back later and use the picture you want from this shoot. Once again this feature was the best of those that had similar in my group.,Hope this updated review helps.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: After comparing the bigger brands, this camera offered more features at a lower cost. The 60x optical zoom is a very nice feature. The camera is very easy to use, make taking quick pictures much simpler and the image quality is far superior to my fruit-branded cell phone's camera. The colors are far more realistic.,I bought this camera for taking pics of products for selling on eBay. The camera works great for this and provides tons of features for using it everywhere else. I bought some extra batteries and an external charger to go along with this. Now I can go on a road trip and never run out of battery juice for my camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This camera's photo quality actually surprised me because the long zoom range.  But the photos are better than expected - not professional, but this isn't a professional camera.  It's pretty easy to understand and work.  I am having some trouble with the image sliding around in my view finder when I zoom in on a subject.  I get it steady, but it seems to bounce up and down on it's own and I can't make it stop.  It's a crazy long zoom too!  But it looses quality like crazy too with the long zoom.  Nice wide angle though.  Overall, I really like this camera and recommend it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I got this for my Dad who is 84.  He is an excellent photography and has always used Leica cameras.  However he can't use his Leicas anymore because of a hand tremor.  I selected the Panasonic because of its ability to control stability.  My Dad is now into photography again and taking amazing shots with this camera.  He is also getting into computers and digital photography at 84 because of this great camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This was my fourth Panasonic Lumix camera - I have stepped up from one of the first Bridge cameras that they offered, and I loved them. That is until, I got this one. My last camera is the DMC-FZ100. I wanted the upgraded zoom and megapixels. Let me say that the camera does have good points. The weight of the camera is a nice beefy feeling, and makes you aware that you have a camera in your hands. The zoom is INCREDIBLE! Wow,,,it almost breaks my heart to return it because the zoom is so amazing.,There is a hot shoe for an external flash. That is about where my "WOW factor".,Panasonic made a decision to leave items off of this camera items that had a GREAT purpose and now they are gone. Things like the tilt screen,,,the external MIC plug, the macro setting on the setting wheel is gone, and now must be found in the setting menu (it's easy to find, but it used to be easier to just turn the setting wheel). But the tilt screen gone? Why? Having a bridge camera is the reason why folks like me LOVE having a tilt screen. Most of us are amateur photographers, we LIKE the tilt screen! We don't want to manipulate the different lenses,,,many don't like having to mess with manual focus or settings to control many things. I for one like the ability to change my settings manually,,,but,,,I'm also only 5ft tall, I can't get many shots that taller folks can get. But, give me a tilt screen and I can hold the camera up in the air, tilt the screen down, and see what I want for a decent picture,,,that has been taken away.,That being said,,,I could live with it when I saw the zoom ability! I loved it!!! I could see birds hiding in trees from quite a distance! WOW - I was a happy shutter bug! Then I started to use the camera. The zoom focus was sluggish and super slow (it was not supposed to be this way). I played around with the settings, and was hoping that this would change, it didn't. But, I dealt with it, and started taking pictures,,,the back screen was almost invisible in bright sunlight, so I switched to the view finder. Getting my full view was a bit difficult for me, but I got the shots that I wanted. It was a clear, bright sunny day, not a cloud in the sky and spring cherry tree blooms were screaming for their picture to be taken. Out of 128 pictures taken from my walk, over half had to be deleted. This was an anomaly that had never taken place in my photoshop menu before. The ones that I did keep, all had to be manually adjusted for clarity. I was upset. I had such high expectations for this model camera. I was willing to give up certain items, in a swap for that awesome zoom capability, but the quality that was lacking in the photos themselves, was just not worth it. Many people have raved at this model, and the pictures that it takes. Perhaps I just got a bad camera? I don't know. I cannot be sure. And, I'm not willing to take that chance. I will be waiting for a different brand camera, to arrive on the market place in March. It will cost much more, but, at this point, I'd rather spend more money, and get everything that I want in a camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm not a pro or anything but I was tired of taking pictures on my phone.... Just going to say this is absolutely amazing. Very easy to use and the features are easy to control... If you are taking Instagram pictures I'm sure any other camera would do as Point and Shoot are all the rage these days...however if you are serious about quality pictures that don't require a year of schooling to become a photographer than this is for you.,The nice thing is you can do a quick filter edit of colors directly from the camera.,Also the video quality blew my mind...,If you are hesitant don't be and get this one vs the other one you've been thinking about. I did and I'm very happy.,I took photos around my yard yesterday....and of the moon!,I feel like a pro!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am definitely an instamatic user, so when this came, I have been having a blast with all the choices I have.  I would highly recommend watching the dvd that comes with the camera.  The booklet is good, but very basic and this camera can do so MUCH.  I love the telephoto lens, this camera pulls the birds right up to me.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This would be my second panasonic camera. Don't get me wrong, I desperately wanted the fancy Rebel T6 camera but wasn't quite ready to spend that much money, plus money for lenses.  This one comes with a fixie lens (meaning you can't change it out) but the zoom is pretty dope. It also has a macro setting, for those of you that like up-close shots.  It has lots of features I still haven't figured out, but my friend who owns a Canon thinks it's pretty cool since it has a few settings that his $800 camera doesn't have.,So if you're looking for something to begin with for photography, or getting REALLY good quality images, check this camera out.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm new to taking any semi professional photos. The extent of my camera knowledge extends to cell phone and go pro, which I've managed pretty well on. One thing I've missed using both of them is any kind of decent zoom.  The FZ80 on the other hand will zoom for days. It's actually pretty incredible. This allows for all kinds of creative space to take photos of nature and wildlife. For the price I think it takes very detailed, clear pictures. The fast delivery was a bonus as well.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: What a deal! I've had my camera for a couple months now and I love it. The package comes with so many accessories, this is great for amateur photographers or families wanting something to capture moments beyond a smartphone. The only issue I had was with delivery, it was left in the middle of my porch in the rain. Thankfully I got home before it got too wet and nothing was damaged.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Detachable flash is not compatible, the camera does ok pictures, none of the features like portrait or landscape make any difference in the picture, all are not very sharp, and the flash comes up for every picture unless in the no-flash mode, even in bright light outside. Not happy with it at all but by the time we started using it more it could not be returned.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I'm still a beginner and this camera is amazing, I have a photo of my mom at the beach that I took and edited and a picture of my Starbucks drink when we were leaving the beach,this camera is already amazing, the auto setting is great considering im a beginner and don't know how to do ISO and all of that confusing stuff

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I am new to photography, so I had been doing a decent amount of research, reading reviews, comparing prices...the whole nine yards, before I landed on this Canon Rebel T6 DSLR camera bundle.I feel like I should start first with saying I absolutely love this camera. While I've only had a couple of cheaper cameras that I could call my own, I have used a variety of cameras, but this is my first DSLR....and I LOVE IT! The Canon lens that comes with it is a handy for multiple situations and shooting conditions, as well as the ability to zoom a bit. However, my praises on this bundle, for the most part, start and end with the camera and the Canon lens. Most of the bundle is kind of a joke except for a few choice items, that I should say does still make it worth the additional $20 or so more it is than getting just the camera and lens without the accessories. The bag, SD cards, and SD card reader are all helpful, and are by themselves worth the extra $20 for the included accessory bundle. However, the stand alone flash is not compatible with this camera. The two "lenses" that are included are not really lenses at all, but actually screw on the end of your nice Canon lenses, making your pictures worse. The cheap filters are exactly that, a handful of cheap filters, that I suppose could come in handy, maybe, one day...possibly. I have not tried out the remote switch yet or the lens cleaning kit. And lastly, the tripod is a cheap plastic one that will likely get broken in a matter of a few shows during transport, and will likely need to be replaced. Attached some photos from the camera.,Tl;dr - This bundle is great, and this camera is amazing for someone who wants solid quality for a good price. The accessories that come with it are worth the extra $20.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I really wanted the T6i but this was such an amazing deal and it surpassed my expectations with all that came with the camera for the price. My photos are amazing with this camera. It is perfect for my needs right now.
