review: Small, and pictures were dark, RETURNED!!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Excellent fast service! My daughter really loves the camera!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I got this as a starter camera for my son who is taking 6th grade photography.  It was very easy to navigate and he's well on his way.  Pictures look good and he's having loads of fun!  Good package deal.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: I like the camera just fine. It's very similar to Olympus Stylus. What I don't like is the recommended Sandisk card that came with it. After looking at very reviews it appears this card is not reliable. Although I program my camera to sequence the pictures to "auto reset", it still records the pictures with random/out of sequence numbers. Since I use the camera for business, it's important to me to store picture file sequentially from project to project. If I shoot multiple projects in one day, I need to manually sort through pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Cant say much since it was a Christmas gift for a 10 year old girl.  When I hear more, I will let you know.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB SDHC Memory Card + Flexible tripod + AC/DC Turbo Travel Charger + Replacement battery + Protective camera case with Deluxe Bundle
review: Bought for a gift.The bundle has everything you need.Easy to setup.Seller communication excellent,Highly recommend!!

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: What can I say that you have not already heard? This is the camera to beat in 2018. It has set a new standard in features and quality for digital photography.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Focusing system is great with native lenses and also with old Minolta lens with adapter.,Photo quality is also very good. This is a huge upgrade from my old trusty A772.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Photographed 4 high school baseball games over two days.  Approx 800 photos.  Only 12 not in focus.  I suspect those were operator-error.  Love this body.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Best mid-upper range camera you can by. I have both Canon and Sony. No wonder it was 2018 camera and mirrorless camera of the year. I absolutely love this camera.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Sony keeps staying ahead of the competition with this one. One complaint that I would have is the confusing menu system. I had to watch a couple of YouTube vids just to make out what each of the menu options did. Otherwise No complaints of performance or picture quality.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Absolute love this Camera, AUTO FOCUS is insane, and I absolute love the S&Q Feature for slow motion, I will say, my only problem was, it did make my Sony a7s & a6300 footage look so Dull at the side of this Camera, any Sony users out there, it's a NO BRAINER... buy this camera, the, best, just got even better

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: Been waiting since 2012 for a good camera to upgrade to and this one was worth the wait and this thing makes my work easier especially the eye AF (game changer) would love to get another one but maybe the a7S III or the a9 II

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: The camera is great but I’ve noticed that in all of my photos there’s a smudge in the same exact spot every time, I’ve cleaned the lens and it still appears in my photos. Is there something wrong with the sensor? Can I get an exchange for one thag doesn’t do that? I know it’s a small issue, but for a $2,000.00 camera I shouldn’t be getting this

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: If you're just starting out like me, this is an amazing camera. Inexpensive for the features you get, wonderful quality photos, and a great selection of lenses available.

product_name: Sony a7 III Full-Frame Mirrorless Interchangeable-Lens Camera Optical with 3-Inch LCD, Black (ILCE7M3/B)
review: It was a gift to someone. The report I received is that everything about the camera is great.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this as an early father's day present for my husband since we were going on vacation. He has used it non stop and was able to capture some fantastic photos of our children on the beach. The zoom is incredible, the quality of the pictures is amazing & it's a nice sized camera. I would say perfect for a family camera or even for a photographer just starting out!! 5 STARS!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: If you are looking to take quality pictures for a reasonable cost you found it! I love this camera and I even can bluetooth it straight to my phone thru wifi and get all the pictures on my phone!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The camera came just as described. I especially like the extra battery and  micro card. Haven't really used the camera much as it will be for work related business but being it is a Canon I am sure it will do fine.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Excellent camera and a great price!  Perfect for the cost conscious who still want a versatile digital!  Great service too!  Thanks!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The package has everything! !  The camera is small and fits in your hand which is great.  Seems to be easy to use.  I still have to really get into it.  Pics look good.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Ordered this for an Alaskan Cruise we will be taking this year. Thrilled with all the extras. Much lighter than my old SLR. I have played with it a bit a d am delighted for the price. Thanks

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: I sent this back. My phone takes way better pictures. This camera never stopped jiggling EVER to even be able to snap a photo.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Very disappointed with lifespan of the fully charged battery.  Even after we recharged the battery, we only had at the most 4 hours.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: The cannon camera is small but that has nothing to do with the quality of pictures that it takes they are close to being as good as I get from my Nikon SLR camera there's different reasons for both Joel I wanted you to know that you chose a wide selection of things to send the camera because anyone buying this camera would be up and running day one thanks again for such a quick turnaround and I'm sorry I didn't get back to you sooner

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX420 IS Digital Camera (Black) with 20MP, 42x Optical Zoom, 720p HD Video & Built-In Wi-Fi + 64GB Card + Reader + Grip + Spare Battery and Charger + Tripod + Complete Accessory Bundle
review: Purchased this as a gift for my daughter's 12th birthday. She loves it!! It takes great photos. You do have to learn how to adjust the settings so you get the great quality photos, but it's still a great camera with good quality bundle pieces.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I got charged a 100dollar re stocking fee ! When I return this camera. The battery stop charging after two months of use.,I love the camera. But I just got this in December. I have only used the camera a handful of times and the battery won’t hold a charge. And the charger won’t charge the battery. I had to buy another charger. Because the charger that comes in this bundle doesn’t work. I charged it all night. And when I went to try it out it kept saying the battery was low and to charge it soon.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: i’m a beginner and it’s very easy to use and learn with!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera!! I’m a total newbie with a baby on the way and wanted a great quality camera for all the baby pics coming. I did have to watch a few YouTube tutorials and do some reading to learn this camera but really worth it. Takes great quality photos and is easy to use.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: We're very pleased with this purchase. It was a first DSLR Camera for my son who was taking a digital photography class. The camera takes great photos. It has many options and features. We love that it was a no brainer and came with all the accessories that you need. We highly recommend this camera!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera came with all the accessories to get started taking really beautiful pictures. I had everything I needed to begin with except for a zoom lens which I quickly added. I've had so much fun with this!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Have used this a couple times since buying it.  Really only used the 18-55 lens.  Have not used all the other items that came with the bundle yet.  Overall I would say this is a great first time camera for someone getting into photography.  I bought a 18-135 lens on as a separate and used that on July 4.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I LOVE this camera! I bought it to take family photos. These were the first few pictures taken while I was tinkering around with it. I have 0 experience with photography but this is so easy to use, a child could take stunning photos. In fact, the pictures of the little blonde kitty were taken by my boyfriend's daughter's (ages 10 and 8). I love this camera!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Just got this on Friday...... 3 days ago now.,1st thing I noticed is the impossible to use viewfinder. Why they even bother putting it on there is beyond me.,Other than that, this thing takes really good photos and really good video.,The on screen controls are really easy and intuitive to use unless you're an idiot.,The lens filters and image effects are completely unnecessary in today's world with Photoshop and After Effects.,So again, why bother including it?

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Good price.  Camera takes great pictures, but the screen quit working on our first trip.  We were still able to take pics.,Canon's warranty registration is much more complicated than it needs to be, but they repaired and returned the camera quickly.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This camera is amazing! The kit is great if you’re new to photography and want some ideas of stuff to try out. The pictures come out beautifully, even if you’re novice. Probably not going to use everything it comes with but it’s cool to try it all out for a reasonable price.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is very high quality and I use it for work to take pictures and it works great. Good price as well as quality I enjoy this purchase very much . Happy with the quality of the pictures for the size of the camera

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Directions for use appear to be written by someone who doesn't own a camera and doesn't understand why numerous items need no explanation.  If you follow directions on more than one item, you must understand that it's not you and that you weren't meant to understand the unexplained.  I ran the fully charged battery down just trying to make the correct choices on unreachable menu items.  It's listed as a camera for children and elderly people, this is harassment.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: You can not focus or review the photos on screen.  Pics are grainy, very poor quality.  Definitely not 21 MP as described.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I was hesitant to purchase this one due to low price, but bought this based on other reviews and was honestly expecting a little more. The picture quality is poor and I've made every adjustment possible. Seems to take a littpe better photos outdoors, but even my phone has much better quality than this thing. I passed it into our kids, for them to play around with and as a starter camera. I am currently looking for a much better quality one. Really wished I hadn't have purchased it.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: We bought this for my seven-year-old daughter and while the camera is pretty straightforward to use, the photo quality is not great. I know I can’t compare it to photos from a “real” camera, but especially outdoor the photos are very grainy, washed-out, and out of focus. It’s a little disappointing. We’ve messed with the settings quite a bit, but that doesn’t seem to help.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Don't waste your money on this camers. This camers does not work.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: When trying to load the disc that came with the camera the error message said it was incompatible with iMac/Apple. Also the description said  you could use a SanDisk Memory card up to 64 GB (which I bought) but the camera was unable to format it. Amazon's description and stats said nothing about the incompatiblity and once I was able to read the manual it stated that it recommended only going up to a 32GB Memory card.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Terrible camera. Terrible customer service. This camera was literally used on two separate occasions. The third time I took it out to use it was broken -- it wouldn't stop zooming in and wouldn't turn off. I contacted customer service to return it and they said it was past the return period. I wrote again saying this camera was LESS THAN A YEAR OLD and only used TWICE and please refund me and let me send it back. They NEVER responded. Cheap camera. Awful customer service. DO NOT BUY!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Have to say the pros are the camera is really lightweight and the function is enough for the beginner like kids. However the picture quality is exactly an issue. But thinking in other way, if I really need a High performance quality, I prefer to buy professional one to instead of it. For now, this one is enough for kids at my home.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Price is very good anf it got good rating by other people. However, when I received it I was surprised, it looks like a toy. The 2 things I like about it is that it's compact and can take up to 21mega pixel pictures. What I DON'T LIKE is that the camera looks cheap in quality (although advertisement pictures looks great). What I didn't like and why I don't recommend this camera to anyone I know is that the DISPLAY is of the lowest quality possible, VERY DARK and almost monocrome. I CANNOT tell the quality or color of the pictures because every picture is dark and blueish. Even when I uploaded it to my computer, it looks terrible unless I use photoshop to fix it up.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I got for my mom. She likes the color and the size,fits right in her purse.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: 'Nuff said

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Don't buy this camera. Takes blurry photos. Every photo fuzzy. I'd return this if I would have kept the box!!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: nice camera.Takes great pictures. Very small which I love. Easy to use.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Having hard time with stability but could be me takes great pictures

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera is great! Took it to Japan with us and got really great clear shots! The video footage was great too!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: A camera like this in the 80's would've easily run at around 800.00 minimum. With just the default settings, I took pictures in the semi-dark and it produced clear images. But the best is in regards to close snapshots. I can use it to take pictures of documents at very close range and the letters comes out sharp clear.,So happy I made this purchase. You will not be disappointed.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: This camera takes horrible pictures especially closeups. I thought Canon was a decent product but this camera is terrible. Maybe I just got a defective one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: I love it! Easy to use, point and shoot. Compact and it doesn’t take up space. Fits easily in your product. I love cannon products!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Takes suprising pretty good photos if on the right setting!! Great and convenient!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Easy to use digital camera that takes excellent, sharp pictures!

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Good little camera, great pictures. Still trying to learn all to the features, but do far it's easy to use and takes great pictures.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I love my little camera. I keep it in my purse for those moments when you wish you had a camera. It takes good, detailed pictures. The one drawback for me is that it will not take the kind of close up pictures I occasionally need. If I stand back and use the zoom, it struggles sometimes to find the focus. It occasionally takes accidental pictures of the inside of my pocket, the ceiling, or the floor, but I chalk that up to my own random pressing of the button.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I use the camera for both business and personal. In my career as a real estate appraiser, I must have gone through dozens of cameras. I can tell you that most of time, the "achilles heel" of cameras that I have owned is the battery door. This part cannot take the wear and tear of opening and closing so the latch fails; then resorting to scotch taping it closed until I get a new camera. On this model of Sony cameras, they have taken great care to make the battery door spring loaded so that there is absolutely no stress or wear on the latch; It will not fail. Therefore this model camera has lasted far longer than any other camera that I have ever used. The ease of use and lens quality is first rate. I can easily fit everything in frame without stepping back too far.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Does everything it's supposed to do.  It has more capacity then our Samsung S6 phones and can do more.  Plus, it's truly small and easily carried in your pocket.  Smaller than a pack of cigarettes.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Bought for my granddaughters 12th birthday.  Chose sony due to the reliability history I have had with their products.,My granddaughter quickly learned how to operate and rechargeable battery lasted for numerous pictures.,The 20.1 mp rating is a plus. Another plus is the ability to recharge the battery without removing it from the camera.  The 8 times zoom is nice, but not very practical over about 6 times.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Really tiny ... Works well took a few pictures of some birds with the zoom.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Slow, slow, s l o w! Very disappointed in this camera's speed. I took it to my daughter's graduation and it was so slow in taking the pictures that they are all blurry--people started moving before the shot was taken. I chose Sony because I have an old 3 MP Sony camera that takes great pictures. My Samsung phone takes better pictures. Might work ok on stationary objects, but forget people or animals.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Still new, but takes a good picture for the price, image stabilization is good for the price. I'm satisfied with it, considering the price is so competitive.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I had an older version of this camera which I got 9 years ago, and it ended up breaking. This camera is mostly an upgrade. The one thing that I don't like is that you can't choose to put it in macro; the camera tries to decide where it needs to focus and if it needs to be in macro, but sometimes I will be trying to take a picture up close but the camera will want to focus on something farther away.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Superb camera with outstanding low light performance. All these images are out of camera JPEGs in high ISO (ranging from 4000 to 10000) at different zoom level. This is no doubt going to be a game changer. Extremely happy with the image quality.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: I was going back and forth and couldn't make up my mind whether I should purchase this camera or not. I needed a camera with good autofocus in video for a new project I'm working on. But I'm a fan of APS-C sensors because I don't see the point in lugging heavy zoom lenses and telephoto primes needed for FF cameras (Nikon's 135mm is 810g and the 85mm is only 350g!  I also prefer the deeper depth of field for video that I get from a crop sensor and even for photos because I hate mushy backgrounds, I'm usually shooting in nice environments and don't want excessive blur. F2.8 in a crop sensor camera is perfect for my style.,I also didn't like the fact that the kit lens included with the Z6 is only 24-70mm. I feel the kit lens should be at least 24-85mm -70mm is simply too short. For video it's not bad as I could change the camera to crop mode, but for shooting close up and outdoor portraits, 85mm is a must have!,Because Nikon does not have a mirrorless crop camera, I tried the Sony a6400 and the IQ was awful in video, (for photo the IQ was pretty nice but the "best" standard Sony crop zoom lens, the 16-70mm Zeiss lens is not so sharp...). Besides for the ISO and dynamic range, the video from the a6400 looked pretty much the same as my 1" sensor camera, the Sony RX10 (in 4k the a6400 was just slightly better). I was considering the Fujifilm XT-3, however after watching many videos comparing the xt-3 to other cameras, I saw that the ISO from Fuji cameras are approximately 1 stop darker than cameras from all other brands. I compared the Sony a6400 and the Nikon d500 (which I currently use primarily for event photography) with the xt-3 at high ISO on dpreview's website with the Fuji set to one stop higher ISO for exposure equivalency. The Fuji xt-3 was pretty noisy compared to the other cameras when used according to real life settings ( one stop higher than the other cameras). And the Z6 against all the crop sensor cameras was amazingly clean! The Z6's sensor is amazing, it is much better at high ISO than the d750 which is only a third stop better than the d500 at high ISO. ( I own the d750 as well and only use it as a backup to the d500).,I decided to go with the Z6 after watching Jared Polin and Max Yuryev's videos comparing autofocus of the Z6 against the a7iii, Canon R and xt-3. From their videos, I found the Nikon autofocus as being on par with the a7iii (and better than the Canon R).,As much as I really wanted a crop sensor camera, I must admit I'm very happy with the Z6. The ergonomics and handling is fantastic, the IQ is amazing, the color science is awesome, and autofocus is totally reliable. I have not downloaded the v2 firmware on the camera to test eye AF but I'm sure it's reliable. The AF is not as good as the a6400, which has absolutely amazing AF, it focuses quickly where it's pointed at, not only if there are faces in the frame. The Z6  focuses wherever it's pointed only in video mode and it's a little slower than the a6400. In photo mode (as well as in video mode,) the Z6 does focus continuously on faces which is why most people want continuous AF for. And of course, whith firmware version 2, it focuses on eyes as well. (i'm not sure if there are other improvements in the speed and focusing with the V2 version.) With the v1 version that is installed on my camera, I find the AF to be totally reliable for my purposes ( I don't shoot wildlife so I'm not an expert in that regard) and I will be using it for professional video purposes. I am excited to download the V2 firmware so I can use eye AF to shoot events and for portraits. I'm very excited for eye AF as I believe it will make my job easier, especially when photographing kids.,I'd take a Z6 over a Sony a7iii any day, certainly over a a6400, regardless if the AF is not that good as the Sony cameras but I do hope Nikon will continue to update the AF.,I was so excited to find that I was able to lock the shutter and focus settings with the fn1 button! Because I move around a lot, I always manage to change settings without realizing it. One of the reasons I love my d500 is the shutter speed and aperture lock and I was extremely happy that it was included with the Z6! Thank you Nikon for that feature!!!,The Z6 is definitely is the most fun camera I ever used and I don't regret purchasing it!,I love everything about this camera, but I really hope Nikon will come out with a crop mirrorless camera AND a 16-80mm, with an f2.8 or at least f4,  KIT lens for it!

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: So this review is for those wondering how the different piece of the kit fit together and if it makes sense to buy all of this or get things in pieces. I am going to focus on a few little things which I was unable to learn until I got my Z6 Film Maker's Kit.,1) The foam cutout on this kit is for everything minus the gimbal stuff, it is designed to go into a pelican 1520 case, and the cutout for the Atomos Ninja V is a big box-shaped cutout for the entire Ninja V packaging which might honestly be nice since you can repurpose that section as you see fit. The Z6 won't fit in its cutout if you add anything onto it like a bracket or a camera strap.,2) The HDMI cable guard Nikon provides with every Z6 does not work with the HDMI cable which comes with this kit because the HDMI cable plug is too big. (Also as an FYI this is a mini HDMI cable input on the Z6, I had the hardest time confirming this before I got my Z6 in the mail) This is a minor issue but something Nikon should have noticed,3) You will want to get a lot of accessories for the atomos (batteries, SSD, screen protector, SSD to USB C caddy) and a follow focus for the Moza Air 2 gimbal. Probably also a pelican case or backpack for your gimbal for transporting it, thankfully it comes with a foam cutout.,4) The foam cutout for the 24-70 lens is a big box which is snug around the lens hood but not much else, Nikon could have done a better job with this.,5) The magic arms do not hold up the atomos recorder in a straight position with the gimbal no matter how I try. I need to know buy a separate 2nd handle accessory for the moza air 2 for the camera. This is a huge negative which could have been avoided easily in my opinion. I'll probably still use this magic arm for the mic I guess.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: This is a sweet little camera.  It is easy to use and so small.  Everything arrived on time and in good condition.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: I AM MOVING FROM MY GOOD OLD D700 TO THIS NEW MIRRORLESS CAMERA. THE PRICE IS RIGHT, VERY LIGHT, AND FEATURES ARE EASY TO USE. NOW EVEN MY GF WILL FIND IT EASY TO USE IT WITH THE MUCH IMPROVED INTERFACE AND AUTOMATIC FACE RECOGNITION FEATURE. THE MINOR ISSUE WAS THAT ALL MY AF-D AND AF-I LENSES WILL STILL WORK BUT LOSE THEIR AF FEATURE UNLESS I PLACE THEM ONTO MY GOOD OLD D700. I MIGHT NEED TO GET ANOTHER BODY OF D500 SO THAT MY 80 -200 2.8 WILL GET A 1.5 FACTOR BOOST.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Sold one of my D610s to get this camera. Have a ton of F mount lenses. Honestly, my expectations were actually a bit low when I bought this body. I was just thinking there was no way my F mount lenses would focus well on a new mirrorless body. I was very wrong. I think the Z6 performance is amazing in almost every way! I could shoot with my 85mm F1. 4g lens forever with this body. It's always tack sharp. Been shooting with it for a few weeks now and still quite impressed. A traditional DSLR still has its place but that's why I still have another D610 as a second body. Looking forward to the new firmware updates Nikon will release this year.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: I traded my Nikon D7000 for this camera. Researched almost all online discussions of the full frame Mirrorless camera and decided to buy z6. The camera is very sharp, great low light performance and fantastic autofocus. The camera and lens feels solid and there is not much learning need for previous Nikon owners. Attached is my cat with the 24-70mm f4 kit lens.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: The camera was delivered quickly and it is easy to set up and use. The only thing people need to be aware of is to make sure you get all the add ons like the usb cable and the flash drive if you are planning to transfer pictures and do not already have the necessary add ons.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Lightweight and easy to use

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Bought for vacation, very easy setup, takes good pictures, a little small for my hands, love the accessories that came with the camera especially rechargeable battery and cases.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: It was the perfect starter set for our daughter who is just getting into photography. It has everything she needs

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: It's the Beast and the Best mirrorless camera currently in the market for both photo/video.,I have been using z6 since 8 months and it works perfectly for both photo & video.,Also, the new added Eye Auto-Focus works so perfectly that I never miss the shot mostly during dance performance in events.,Face Detection in Video has also been improved after newly release,Also, its so good during lowlight. Video can be shot in 10 bit N-Log profile with external recorder like Atomos Ninja.,I have got Ninja V recently and its raw footage is just mind blowing after applying LUT's in Premier Pro.,Battery life is also good and I can get around 900 Raw pictures with one full powered battery.,I used my friends Sony A7III before buying z6 and I didn't like the Sony's color,menu & grip much so I bought z6.,Only drawback is z6 has single memory card but its XQD card which is so robust and reliable unlike SD cards which has high failure rate.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: This is the best mirrorless full frame camera amongst the 3 big names. I tried all, Nikon is still tops in terms of the ergonomics, the best EVF and also the nice touch screen. The snapbridge is not that bad as some described. Perhaps it has improved so much since the first app. And the new eye focus and focus improvement firmware coming soon will bring the bar higher as evidenced in CP+ demos. And that is Nikon's first full frame mirrorless attempt only !  The Z mount is bigger and better, because the lens is easier to design and sharper right to the corners. The XQD card is just the beginning as it is CFexpress compatible which is 4 times faster write speed.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Finally upgrading to FX from the D5300 and am glad I held out!,I’ve been eyeing the D850 for days, but couldn’t bring myself to spend the money considering I’m only shooting amateur.,The photos are gorgeous. The battery life isn’t worth complaining about as it’s wise carrying multiples in the first place. The single media slot is on everyone’s list, but I’ve yet to see this as an issue yet. Perhaps I’ll carry a spare card here as well.,I’ve been pouring over the reviews anxiously waiting for this set and it’s finally here. Menus are user friendly and what more can you say than it’s a Nikon.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: I am an amateur photographer and have used Nikon DSLR for many years. No question mirrorless is the future. The Nikon Z6 is a great camera, feels great taking photos and video. Lots of options with taking any photo, and the new lenses for the Z series are first rate. I traded my Nikon DSLR and now use the Nikon Z 6 as my go to camera for everything. Video quality is wonderful.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I needed a camera that would take excellent pictures of our Koi Pond and the Koi.  This camera is all that and more.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: I was surprisingly pleased with the package that I received.  The accessories are great.  I am especially amazed at the multi-slot USB card reader because I have a lot of different memory cards from various devices and I was able to load them and transfer files to an SD card.  The mini tripod is easily collapsible.  I liked the SD card storage pouch although one of the pockets was not attached (the thread came loose).  I tried to use the screen protector, but I couldn't get it smoothed out, and I didn't like the bubbles  due to lack of clarity on the screen.  The camera case is just right for the camera and SC card storage, but nothing else.  The BEST part of the package is the Canon camera.  I was replacing a Polaroid digital camera that had a larger screen; but I couldn't be more pleased with the photos from this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great gift to an aspiring photographer. Or someone needing a great little camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: Great pictures and small

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20MP 8X Zoom Digital Camera (Silver) + 32GB Card + Reader + Case + Accessory Bundle
review: My 11 year old granddaughter got this for her birthday.  She loves it and her pictures are fabulous, she is in training for the photographer position in the family one day..  Easy to use, easy to carry, small, perfect all around camera

review: Not that impressed. Indoor photos aren't any better than the 8-year-old camera I bought it to replace, despite having a much higher pixel count. Outdoor photos were pretty nice. Just not as great as I'd hoped.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought the camera for the 11year old granddaughter.  It was easy for here to learn and she likes the zoom.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This camera is so easy to use. I need it something simple but powerful

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Perfect small Camera !! Works like a charm ! Easy and Smooth !!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: It works for the price. Not the best picture quality but i suppose it will do for the time being. Not super impressed and i wouldn't pay that much again

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I was pleasantly surprised when i got the camera. I have a cheap smart phone that takes horrible pics so i just needed something with a little better quality. This camera is it. For the 80 dollars it is well worth it. A perfect camera to keep in the middle console of my truck so i can catch those awesome pics i see all the time and think " man , i wish i had a good camera " I also purchased the 10 dollar insurance and it is well worth it as well . It covers hardware malfunctions and accidents like dropping it and stuff like that .. Well done amazon . thanks here is you pic

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Very easy to use and takes great pics

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: This camera is  great for blogging on you tube  or where ever you want to put a video online . It is easy to use and comes with two batteries and it also comes with another lens and a few more things that come in handy . Over all not to bad of a camera for the class it is in .

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It’s easy to use and set it up. It came with two batteries, so it last for a long time. The picture quality are wonderful.Play back mode for video has great picture quality and color is very vibrant.and zoom clearly and the sounds clear.

review: I had a great moment with this camera in coney island beach in New York last weekend with my girl friend, it could do zoom in and out to get closer or far as much as you want, clear lense and give high quality picture , it really worth the money i spent

review: This camera is perfect for vlogging! The picture quality is really good and It comes with a wide angle lense or macro lens and 2 batterys. The screen reverses so you can see yourself and it's easy to attach to a tripod.

review: I grew up in the 90s. My family had something similar to this. Smart phones were not available back then. For something only 1/5 the price of an average smartphone today. This camera brings quality and fun time as well as great memories.

review: Aweful, I  brought 3 , pictures  are  not clear ,  battery dies  in a week. Won't buy again.  Purchasing a  better camera .

review: The camera comes with everything that you need, except you will need to supply your own memory card like most cameras. It is very easy to use, simple easy menu navigation. The picture quality is worthy of its price.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: My dad loves it. It has a classic look with modern digital functionality. Pictures come out with good color, and it is also simple to use. A bit pricey but very unique design!

review: It just ok good for a back up spare. Quality not the best.... but I got what I paid for .

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Seems to take decent pictures. No usb cable included in the box. For $85, a $2 USB cable should come standard. Not happy.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: Great Camera. It takes great pictures and is lightweight for on the go. Recommend buying!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: We found that our cell phones and iPad cameras took better pictures.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I am a professional photographer and came to Tulsa to photograph the NCAA Tournament at the Bok Center.  I did not have a media pass so I could not get in with my Nikon D7100.  I take wide angle photos for  a company that sells tickets.  I have a Nikon point and shoot in the car for these times but it went down on me.  I drove to the closest box store and they had this Nikon Coolpix A10.  I like that it takes AA batteries, a dead battery is what caused this problem in the first place, and that it takes SD memory cards.  The color was great and the photos where very sharp.  The VR worked like a charm in the low lighting of the arena.  I would have much prefered to use my D7100 with the 10-20mm lens but this little pocket camera is perfect in a pinch!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: great camera for sporting events and outdoor photography in the light, Hauling around a big lensed DLSR id just not practical most of the time so this gets good shots quickly with ease of carry. The battery lasts surprisingly a long time although I don't use the rear display that often which usually uses a lot of battery. All in all it takes pretty good long shots and is good for sporting shots when I select the sport scene mode the scene modes work well.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I recently purchased this camera after my previous Lumix fell off the table. I went to my local camera shop to see the different brands out there and liked this one. I went home to research it and was happy with the reviews. I found this cheaper at Amazon and purchased it. When I went on vacation recently, I enjoyed having this camera with me. The zoom is amazing and the picture quality was beautiful, I am no pro at taking pictures and I will probably never use all the functions but, this camera is incredible! I have tried uploading a picture 3 times to this review but it isn't working. This camera is definitely worth the purchase!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am truly surprised with what this camera can do. 4K video at 30 FPS is a great feature to have that no other price points have even dared to include. Beautiful photos and the zoom is unbelievable.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Awesome camera. It does everything well! This is a hybrid camera. It has the full functionality of an SLR, but the ease of use of a point and shoot. The ability to control the depth of field is taken to a level of simplicity that is genious (there is a wheel that is also a depressable button that changes control mode... aperture, shutter speed, etc.), allowing for "on the fly" control of the lens.  Sometimes it seems a bit slow to focus on distant objects, but when it does, the optics prove they are excellent and the pictures of objects taken at high distance (even in low light) are amazing. Highly recommend!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Overall great quality. It's very light. It can zoom very well (oh optical zoom, how I love your clarity). It records on SD (make sure you get class ten for best quality). The controls are also very simple.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I bought this camera for a "Bucket List" trip to Yellowstone and the surrounding areas. I took over 1500 pix of landscapes and animals. This camera always came on and focused very quick. I took photos of 4 wolves close to 3/4 mile away. You can tell they're wolves. I have a slight shaking in my hands and the fz 70 even took Most of that out. INCREDIBLE SHOTS. Moving at 70mph. Low light. Long shots. Battery lasted over 500 shots. Close ups on flowers. The only glitch is when you're wanting to take a longer shot and the camera focuses on something closer, electric lines, leaves, etc. I usually could step one way or the other and problem solved.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I used this on a media trip and was completely impressed with the quality and the ease of use. The touch screen was a breath of fresh air from my other cameras and the preinstalled setting modes were amazing. Check out the quality of the pics I posted - all settings in the camera. I didn't have to touch anything manually.,My only issue was figuring out the WiFi. I haven't had the patience to go through the manual, but it was easy enough to pull from the SD card.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera.  Since it's no longer made and you`re able to find one at this price, buy it!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Great camera, much better results than other instant cameras and film!!!

product_name: GordVE 2.7 Inch Digital Camera, HD Camera for Backpacking, Mini Digital Camera Pocket Cameras Digital with Zoom, Compact Cameras for Photography
review: Happy to get a camera like this at a good price. I like it that it’s light and small enough to carry around. Good picture quality too.Excellent camera for the price, very good photos, amazing zoom, highly recommended,

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Yes, 60X zoom. Really! And if you lower your picture quality, meaning you do not take a 16M picture but set it to 5M or 3M, you get 135X zoom.,I took pictures of faces 300 feet away, clear and smooth.,It has a great anti-shake as well.,This camera can be used completely auto (for beginners) and completely Manual, completely! Shutter speed, ISO, F stop, everything manual.,Only a few days old, mine is. I took about 100 pictures so far. IMPRESSIVE!,The manual is simply worded, easy to understand. Nothing special explained but the on-board programming makes it idiot simple.,And the camera is completely fool-proof.,So If I were you, get one. It is not even expensive. How to check it? Browse Amazon.com for 60X cameras and see.,Anyway, I am completely pumped with this toy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is the best camera have ever had. it uses a MOS sensor which is much more accurate and clear than CMOS that is used everywhere. (GOOGLE MOS VS CMOS). the 60x lens with image stabilization is amazing. you will hear the little stabilization motors running when it is zoomed out. it has great wide angle at the other end. the battery lasts way longer than any point and shoot. it has dozens of modes to shoot under. I bought a 64gig chip for it.,Don't hesitate to get this camera. I did lots of research and comparisons and this one wins hands down. I am an electrical engineer ... total geek and nurd.,larry ponziani

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This has been my main youtube camera for pretty much a year now and the only reason I'm upgrading is because in the tech community its all about the video quality and I just needed to upgrade to a DSLR camera. But other than that I'd say that this is a really killer camera for the price. You can get some great photo and video out of this thing and it has killer zoom. 60X!!! review: This is the definition of an inexpensive pocket camera. Yes I know the notion is less popular these days with cell phones having cameras in them, but the addition of a big zoom range, wider angle at the short range, low price, and small size makes this an attractive option. Not a professional camera by any means, but quite serviceable. Bring reasonable expectations, and this item will suit your needs.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Good value, good product

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Sony Cyber shot is a high quality camera that is very easy to use. People have asked me if some of the pictures I've taken with this are professional, and they are surprised when I tell them I took them with this camera.

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: So I bought this as a birthday gift for my dear friend. She loves to take photos and has a BIG dslr camera but it gets heavy and switching out lenses for different purposes is time consuming. She wanted something more point and shoot style and I took a chance on this one. SHE LOVES IT! She took these photos early in the morning and the video as well. Look how clean and crisp the images are. Focus can be a little difficult with no manual adjustments to the lens but she can get use to it

product_name: Digital Camera Video Camera Vlogging YouTube Recorder HD1080P 30FPS 24.0MP 3.0 Inch Flip Screen 16X Digital Zoom WiFi Camera with Wide Angle Lens and 2 Batteries
review: It's a nice budget camera to have.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: I was patiently waiting to upgrade my entry-level D3300 and D80 cameras to a more pro-level body. When Nikon announced they were going mirrorless I knew that was the route I wanted to go. I am amazed at how sharp my images are and honestly it is to use, especially if you are already in the Nikon family. Paired with the FTZ adapter, ALL of my lenses work. Something that doesn't get discussed often is the the focus peaking for my lenses that don't Autofocus. Focus peaking is very precise and brings new life to old film lenses. No buyer's remorse here!

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Such a great all around camera for photos and video. And now we’re about to get firmware updates to add better auto focus modes and support for future memory cards.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Excellent camera.,For those that are interested in a GPS function the Aokatec GP7N  is compatible with the z-6.,If fully displayed all GPS coordinates in the (Exif info(.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Absolute and utter garbage. I tried it for a wedding in a low light situation and I was stunned by the terrible footage I got. D600 footage was actually better than this, you will also need to use an adapter to put on NIKON lens for whatever reason.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: Image quality is amazing. Video is amazing. AF was very good, now with the recent firmware update, it's very competitive. If you are coming from a DSLR you will appreciate the high fidelity of the electronic viewfinder. You will also appreciate Nikon's ergonomics and button layout which, in my opinion, are the best out of any full-frame mirrorless camera. Honestly, go to a camera shop and pick up the Sony, Nikon, and Canon; adjust settings, take a few shots, and see for yourself. Battery life isn't bad either, just make sure to put it in airplane mode when you aren't connected.,XQD cards are great but having to pay $130 for a 64gb card makes me sick. They should have stuck with SD cards for another generation.

product_name: Nikon Z6 Full Frame Mirrorless Camera Body
review: I've been shooting with a D5200 since 2013 and wanted to go fullframe. Was going to buy the D750 in 2017 but video is important to me and I couldn't justify spending $1500 on a body that lacked good video focus and limited me to 1080@60p. So I looked at the Sony a7iii and was about to buy it when the reality of their high lens prices discouraged me. I mean you can get excellent Nikon mount Tamron/Sigma quality lens for significantly less than the cost of an equivalent Sony lens (I got many quality 3rd party Nikon lens for less than $800 while the equivalent Sony is greater than $2000). As great as the Sony a7iii is that sunk it for me...so I decided to wait. Well I'm glad I did as later in 2018 came the Z6 and I bought it as soon as I could. Now 2 months later and several assignments I'm still happy with the Z6.,My main concern was the Z6's compatibility with my Tamron 24-70 2.8 and Tamron 70-300 vr. I'm pleased to report they both work but with some minor nuances. The 24-70 works well except when focusing continuously it looses functionality (screen goes white while it calibrates) for a split second then continues focusing like nothing happened (once every 8 seconds or so as you continuously engage focus). On the other hand the 70-300 performs (see picture of bird at 300mm in tack sharp focus though covered with leaves - cropped to allow pixel peeping) but with the same issue with the addition of a very faint buzzing sound when VR is activated on the lens. Also did a test with a friends Tamron 70-210 f4 and it totally does not work. You get the message "Error. Press and release shutter button again." that does not go away after you press and release the shutter.,Did some night shots (FTZ, Tamron 24-70 2.8 A007N, Altura flash unit) at an event and boy I had to work to get focus. Forget auto focus continuous and face detection at night and be prepared for the drudgery of auto focus single and checking to ensure target focus. To be fair focus is about as good as that on my D5200 (though it does not feel as snappy). However, my focusing with the Z6 was really hit or miss at first but when I got use to it my keepers increased.,Don't throw in the towel yet for this wonderful camera. High ISO pictures show much less noise and performs better than many top full frame cameras and you don't have to worry as much about focus calibration issues. Also did a whole night shoot with one half charged battery and it still has 2 bars to spare.,The Z6 feels well built compared to the D5200 and is noticeably heavier (with FTZ adapter on) than my D5200 with a 3rd party grip attached. The informative and excellent EVF, awesome touch LCD, high frame rate with fast clearing bufffer, much lighter than dslr alternative, awesome dynamic range, superb video, etc makes this camera a joy to use.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Focusing issues are too numerous and too often for my being able to find it acceptable. I am returning the camera. But for the sake of others here is what I have found,The LCD is inadequate and difficult to see when you need it most in direct sunlight as it does not pop out to swivel but for a guy who does most of his photography in bright sunny Florida the viewfinder is my preferred method for completing images.  The viewfinder is bright enough but is of poor quality and considering this has such as large zoom range, having a good EVF is very important. There is the ability to change the brightness of the LCD screen and many users are not aware there is a framing grid overlay grid you can find in the settings so you have a visual horizontal and vertical grid to assist in composition of your shots. ..useful for keeping sunset horizons straight for example.,The camera is speedy in it's startup and focusing time.  The zoom is smooth and increases in just the right increments.  There is no focus assist magnification,  a feature that magnifies a small portion of the focus point to help you visualize detail of that area which is useful when using a long zoom and would've been a very useful tool for a zoom of this magnitude.,Shame I have to return this camera, it felt good in my hands as far as the body grip and I wanted to make it work.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This product didn’t last a year! It no longer holds a charge. Way too expensive for very little quality.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The camera comes with a USB cord that can only be used by the camera.  The (laughably called cord) is all of 12 inches long.  Who is the stupid engineer that came up with this?//  I would just as soon have a separate charger.  This has left me wondering just how chintzy the rest of the camera is.  I am on the verger of returning it over this.  What happens if the charging cord gets lost or damaged?  How much will Panny charge for the replacement?/

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The camera is everything you can expect.,Amazing zoom, solid construction, good features. But...,Disappointed about the lens, not the usual lieca lens. Understand that they had to cut cost, but still not up to the mark.,Again the question comes about the cost. Camera takes a little longer to save the images.,Low light performance is very poor.,Other than that, the camera performs awesome in bright light conditions.,For the cost its well worth the money, but it is not a camera you'll be amazed with.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: So far working ok. I think it’s a great zoom camera. I just hope the lens doesn’t can’t stuck which occurred with my lumix company zoom cameras with the Leica lenses.,I give it four stars because the autofocus is slow.,Only time will tell .Appears to be of good quality for $350,Update 42018!the af button the writing is starting to disappear.,When it comes to focusing you have to depress the button only half way until you see the green squares . I wish Sony would fix these 2 issues

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have been looking for a good mid-range priced camera to photograph flies I tied for fly fishing. This camera takes fantastic standard and macro photos! Read the operations manual folks! This is a fantastic point and shoot camera 📷! Can't wait to do a 4k video!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Everything I wanted and more! I bought this camera specifically for bird watching. It's really hard to juggle binoculars, bird books, and a journal and trying to identify before they fly away. I wanted a quick point and shoot that had the ability to zoom in so I can see the bird's features. So far I'm blown away. I know nothing about cameras and I've gotten some really good shots on the first try. Can't wait to see what it can do once I figure out all the features! Happy, happy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Fantastic Camera. This is my third Panasonic Camera, each one better than the last.  I carry a Panasonic DMC ZS20 camera in my purse that I use all the time but I also wanted one that had more zoom for when I travel or have my family here or for a hundred and one reasons.  I wanted a camera that would fulfill my desire for great pictures, up close and in the distance, at a reasonable price.  My ZS20 fills my everyday need but this FZ70 does so much more but is too big to carry in my purse.  Of course, there is a lot more to learn about this camera but then it does a lot more than my other cameras.  It is light weight enough to handle with ease and I like the feel of it in my hands.  I do not need a professional camera, just a good camera for my picture taking pleasure.  As far as the bells and whistles, I have not had the chance to go through everything this camera can do as yet but look forward to experimenting in the future.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I am really enjoying using this camera with the 60x zoom.  Some photos, when zoomed to the max, are not crisp when handheld but most are pretty good.  When at a "reasonable" zoom they are good.  The only thing I don't like is the online manual.  I'm not printing out 200+ pages and I like to read and experiment which I find hard to do online.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is an amazing camera.....I've had it for about a month, and have spent a lot of that time learning some of the features and capabilities. The FZ70 is an upgrade for me, having had an FZ40 previously.  Because I never spent much time trying to learn all the features of the FZ40, this camera is almost a whole new experience. Be aware that the manual is not very clear on a lot of the functions of this camera, but there are other sources online for help.,The images (those taken correctly) are clear, and the 60X zoom is fantastic. Some reviewers have stated that image quality is not very good when utilizing the ultra zoom, but I think you will find that with any large zoom if you don't use a tripod.,All in all, I think I will enjoy this camera - even more so after I master all of its functions.  My one disappointment is that the price has dropped considerably since I purchased it last month.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I bought this at the big-box retailer with the blue store front and starts with a W. Try as I may, I just am not getting good pictures from this camera. I don't expect super quality, but my dear departed Canon Powershot in the same price range did a far superior job with both clarity, contrast, focus,speed of picture storage, and every other aspect of picture taking.  It is far too late to return it, so it will end up in a drawer somewhere, or I will give it to a child wanting a first camera. I can't recommend this camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I ordered this elsewhere because my other digital camera I have been using since 2010 finally kicked the bucket.  I needed something with better megapixels anyhow.  My Canon PowerShot went up to 10MP.  Since this one has 16MP and was very affordable, I decided to give it a whirl.,Great pictures, easy to use, nice features, but one thing that still baffles my mind...NO CABLE!  You mean to tell me for $80+, you couldn't throw in a $5 USB cord?  I'm sorry, but that's awfully cheap of Nikon.  Even my dinky camera from seven years ago included one.  So I had to make, yet, another purchase in order to transfer the pictures onto my PC.  Even though you have a card reader as an alternative solution, I don't know anybody in the world that has one.,I'd also like to mention that, every time you replace the batteries, the darn thing resets back to default, meaning the date and such has to be reprogrammed.  The self-timer doesn't stay.  I have to keep setting it for every single picture.  Again, my last camera didn't do this.  As well, the tripod mount on the bottom is too far to the left, which can cause it to tip over if not balanced correctly.,Overall, it's okay, but come on Nikon, give your customers a cable.  Don't make them go out of their way to purchase something extra for whatever oddball reason you see fit not to include something that's essentially required in order to make full use of your product.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: Not worth the money.  You get the camera with batteries and thats it.  No memory card or a battery charger.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: First off, it does not come ready to use out of the box. It does not include a memory card or a cable to transfer images to a computer, as my circa 2011 camera did. Slow to focus and there is no way to override the autoflash to turn the flash on. You can turn it off, but as far as the autoflash, it makes the decision as far as when a flash is needed, and it's often wrong...

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX A10
review: I bought the camera/card package and of course, after turning on the camera for set up, I get a message card cannot be used. No explination of why...just cant use. Totally sucks. Found an old SD Card and put it in took a couple photos with NEW batteries, batteries dead.

review: I just received the camera a week ago. It seems to take good pictures and everything seems to be in the box. The only problem is the tripod. I am unable to mount my camera because the screw is smooth. There are no ridges on the screw so I can even screw it in. The piece around it is extremely weak too. I've been trying to contact customer support but its not allowing me to submit my phone number. I don't know how to even report this issue. Very frustrating.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle

review: Takes amazing pictures, the tripod is easy and quick to use, and all of the other accessories are wonderful as well. Amazing bundle for the price. I would definitely recommend this to anyone starting out. Also, the transfer to other devices is very simple and fast!,I love this camera!,(The photo of two people was taken on the tripod by connecting my phone to the camera via Canon app.)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Not even Costco could beat this bundle, the price is fantastic for what you're getting, the camera is not the latest and greatest of course, but great for entry level photography or for setting up a photo booth. I paired the flash with a radio trigger to backfill light, flash worked well! And while taking pictures outside it even had the uv filter to ensure the colors weren't messed up

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I have bought a Sony cyber shot 2.0 DSC P31,  a Sony 7.2  3X1000,  A SONY 12.1 steady shot,this Sony DSC W830 is a nightmare to try to get it to down load to my computer. I gave up and took,it to a professional  for help which took him almost two hours to get it to down load to my old Sony 7.2 PMB,files , then I have to do back to my 2.0 and 12.1 files to send e-mail out. So now I have two files the DCS W830,and the Sony 7.2 and the photos I can send out in my 2.0 and 12.1 ??? I suggest  if you buy a Sony,get it from a land based store so they can show you how to down load it to your computer before you pay for it.,Like a Best Buy or something. I am going to try a new brand next time four is enough for me. The delivery time was great,Packaging was great, price was great directions sucked.
