product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: This camera and accessory kit was a great buy.  I have used it several times and the pictures are beautiful.  I wanted a camera that was simple to use and small to carry and this one fits the bill.  Plus all the accessories work well and are grealy helpful!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I recently bought this camera. Took hundreds of photos and now learn that there is no driver to download so that I can upload the images. I guess I will order a card reader and see if that works. CANON SHOULD OFFER A DRIVER FOR NEW MACS.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: i've taken some amazing pics with this. people are shocked it was with a point and shoot.,I put a couple up for example.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The battery life for this camera was less than 2 hours.  I charged it overnight to be ready for my tours the next day.  After about 20 pictures the battery was at half strength and lasted for maybe another 20 pictures.  The older Sony camera batteries had at least 6-8 hours of constant picture taking.  I even bought extra batteries but they weren't any better.  It was terrible for my trip to Scandinavia.  Good thing I had my Ipad otherwise I wouldn't have had any pictures to share with my friends.  You would think that newer cameras would work better but this camera is proof that statement is incorrect. My big Nikon Camera had batteries that last 6-8 hours without recharging..

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Totally pleased with purchase!! Comes with three chords that when all put together Can be used to charge in the wall outlet. Then one chord can be used to charge in the computer. And one cord for the car.Super easy to use. To set up the camera is very simple and easy to figure out which button is which.It comes with a battery but no memory card the memory card I had to buy separately but it was not expensive and for the price of the camera I was not expecting it.It takes just your regular general memory card nothing fancy.The only issue I had with it was the arm strap. Even in the instructions it did not say how to attach it and we have yet to figure that out. So if someone could help us that would be great.The feature that helps you to get a focused picture even when you’re shaking a little bit works great.The instructions are pretty much basic and simple and so you may need to find out more information about it online.It works best for outdoor pictures I think. And the zoom is A very nice feature.They have continued to improve it in the past few years.It is lightweight but it has enough body to it to hold it easily when taking a picture.If there is no charge to the battery it takes approximately an hour to an hour and a half to charge.I purchased this camera for the purpose of taking outdoor nature pictures for the cards that I sell. And I am very pleased with the camera and so far think it is going to work great for that purpose. I would recommend this camera to anyone who just want something simple but well worth it with great quality.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Great little camera, perfect for my older mom who is technologically challenged ;-)

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I have used Sony over the years because of their outstanding quality.  I read reviews before purchasing this one.  I take many, many pictures of mostly small Jewelry items.  I need a CRISP picture w/o graininess and good rich color.  I got neither.  I wish I had ordered my replacement sooner as this has been a big disappointment and I felt as if I maybe got a refurbished camera instead of a brand new one?  For the sake of two days, I am unable to return it.  Please do not buy if you need a camera for fine detailed pictures.  It will not do that for you.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This is probably a good general camera but wasn’t what I looking for. I tried this out at a zoo but since most animals were moving the pictures came out blurry and I couldn’t find a setting to fix this. There is a delay from when you push the button to the picture being taken to the picture showing on the display. The display is pretty low resolution and made me wonder what the quality of the pictures truly were.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I previously had a Canon S100, which was a good camera for me, but I damaged the racked out lens when it got bumped.  The S100 had worked well for me, but now is not available as new. I read the reviews of other cameras, and thought this Sony camera might be a good camera to use for shooting stills and video at concerts where the venue does not allow larger "professional" cameras.  I was very disappointed  in the auto focus function of this camera. It even has an auto-tracking selection where you are supposed to be able to pick a point in the frame to follow focus, but this was still not helpful in stills shooting, and did not seem to be an option for tracking focus in video shooting. I think my cell phone was a better choice for this purpose, but I had wanted a better optical zoom. This camera, despite the 5X zoom, still was not powerful enough to really get me the close ups I was looking for. I also has trouble with slow shutter speeds in a concert I took pix of, making horribly unusable photos. The menu also was not very intuitive.  Because of the focusing and slow shutter speed and menu issues, I promptly returned this for a refund, and received the refund quickly from Amazon.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Gave this to my granddaughter for her 9th birthday.  It is nice because she can hook to their computer and don't have to worry about wasting film for bad pictures.  Taking good pictures has to be learned through  practice.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Hey the camera does have a slow exposure because of the small sensor. That did not bother me since it takes great photos. I know some people complain of the slow shutter. This is not a camera I would be taking to a sporting event or concert or birthday party. This camera is perfect for sightseeing and landscapes.,As I have other more expensive cameras for that type of photography.  I just wanted something compact to take on airplane when traveling and when I was traveling light. To take nice pictures. You know sometimes you are traveling and do not have time to carry around a dedicated camcorder and a hybrid point and shoot and a dslr. Sometimes you just want to enjoy the vacation and leave your fancy camera at home. That's where the dsc800 comes in handy. I will be updating this review with pictures. In the coming days.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The first thing I notice is how light the camera is; it seems to be made out of 80%+ plastic. Easy to use. Small and will fit in a pants pocket. I had it on Easy mode and the pictures I took were not in focus so I am returning it. Considering upgrading.

review: Doesn't seem to work very long on the battery's, so I'm very disappointed in the product. While not an expensive camera, you'd think for this amount you would get better results.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I really like this camera.  Very easy to use.  Photo are  crisp and sharp.  Took photo of the moon and with the zoom lens it’s like you had a  telescope added to the camera.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I just received this camera. It came a few days faster than expected. Well-packaged and everything in great condition.  I purchased the red-colored one and it's a gorgeous little piece of machine. It is small but doesn't feel cheap. Feels good in the hands and not too heavy. I briefly read the manual and was able to start taking photos and videos right away. The buttons feel very intuitive so far. Very pleased with the quality of the photos, especially close-up shots which I love to take. I took some test videos and for such a small camera, the quality of the audio and video seems really good. I love that the display screen can be adjusted. Makes it easy to experiment with some cool and unusual shots.,I haven't tried out the WiFi feature, but was able to connect to my computer really easily with the USB cable and download the photos with no problem. I'm really excited to use this camera. I bought a couple of other cameras I had to return, so I feel really good about keeping this one.,So far, from my first impression I would highly recommend this camera if you are looking for something not quite as expensive as a true professional camera, but still want something that takes great photos. I also love that it came with batteries you could use right away as well as a battery charger and rechargeable batteries.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I have had this for 1 week. Used it a lot already. Very easy to use but it has frozen like 3 times. I had to remove batteries in order for it to work again all 3 times. Then it frozen while watching a video and made a very loud noise.  Also not great for fast pictures so if you have a toddler and want to capture that great moment quick forget it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I am thoroughly enjoying using this camera!  I haven't had it long enough to learn all of the ins and outs of it yet, so I don't know everything it will do.  I am excited about learning how to take better pictures and being able to edit on the fly.  I highly recommend this camera, especially to a novice like myself.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is great, the bag is different than pictured but not bad. Accessories aren't the same brands as pictured and some of them are of lesser quality.. Still waiting on the Corel Paintshop Pro so I can't comment on that..,So a little update it's been 7 months and it still works good. Some pictures on the auto setting don't come out as clear or blur.. So outside it works awesome I have great pics of the moon and some clear shots from a great distance away frpm the subjust og the oic, but once I go inside it makes it so i2have to use flash to gwt a clear pic which I dont always like beciase it changes the coloring. So if i want a pic in soft light where it has a yellowish tone because of the amount of light I can't get it because the camera will say raise flash and not take the pic unless you do or change the setting..

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Bought this camera for our Universal and Disney Vacation. We took close to 500 pictures. The picture quality was spot on. Love this take it on vacations and family outings

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Really nice case for my new P520. Don't spend or money on the cheap stuff ... this one is the one you want to protect your new camera.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Too small to use in Nikon p610.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Great product for my Coolpix P520 Nikon camera.  Looks good and will protect the camera well, that's why I purchased it.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: I really wanted to like this case, which looks like a classic leather Leica case of the '50s and '60s, but it didn't work well for me, and I'm returning it. It comes in 2 parts: the bottom, which stays attached to the camera via a tripod socket that screws into the camera's tripod socket; and the top, which is a "hoodie" that fits over the camera body and lens and attaches to the bottom part with three snaps. You're supposed to be able to let the top part dangle by one side snap while you take pictures, but mine was so heavy and the snap so loose that it consistently fell off. As another reviewer noted, the bottom part covers up the camera's side ports and door to the battery and memory card, requiring you to remove the whole case in order to access them. The faux leather is also thick and stiff. Although the case fit the camera well, I found it too unwieldy to be practical, despite its good looks.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Bicast leather (also known as bycast leather or PU leather, sometimes described as split leather) is a material made with a split leather backing covered with a layer of polyurethane (hence the term PU leather) that is applied to the surface and then embossed. Because it is only used for the backing, the leather portion of this material is generally not visible in finished goods made from Bicast.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Excellent quality.  Loved the feel of it, but it was too big for the camera (even though it states it is for the Nikon P520).  The reason for the return was that the side part that you have to put the camera into blocks all access to the ports for charging - so I'd have to take it out every time I wanted to do anything (I have a wireless remote adapter that wouldn't work while in the case either).  In addition, the lens covering part was a pain to manage.  It was just going to be more hassle and work than it was worth.  I was looking for ease of use, and this was not it.  Great concept, excellent materials, poor execution and fit.  Returned.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: The quality of this product is fine and it provides good protection. My complaint is that the fit is sloppy for my Nikon P520. There is a large space above the flash. It does not affect the function of the case.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: This case will not fit on either a Nikon Coolpix P520 or Nikon Coolpix P520.There is only one for the camera to fit into case and then the screw on camera case will not align with tripod screw hole on base of camera

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: Although I knew this case was more for storage than regular use, as you can't access the battery and SD card slots without removing the camera from the bottom of the case, the leather is much too stiff and heavy.  If you un-snap the top of the case, and expect it to hang to the side during a shot, you'll be disappointed when the weight of the case causes the top to un-snap completely, and fall to the floor.  The case is really for storage and protection when not in use.  It takes you back decades to when cameras were heavy and needed a case like this.

product_name: MegaGear "Ever Ready" Protective Dark Brown Leather Camera Case, Bag for Nikon COOLPIX P520, Nikon COOLPIX P530, Nikon COOLPIX P610 Digital Camera
review: It looks great, I love the brown leather. It is very sturdy & fits my camera perfectly! Can carry it anywhere.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: This is a great little camera. I have used it on many occasions and for general picture taking it gives high quality and high pixel photos. It is in now standard form where the rear screen is used to select the picture. The camera has a flash and the focusing has a reasonable range.,However there are some things worth noting:,1. I cannot get good macro close ups of flowers. The combination of a poor macro and the rear image have yielded several out of focus pictures.,2. There is a significant time lag between taking pictures, 5 to 7 seconds before you can snap another. I do not know why this is the case so if you are trying to snap some fast motion pics this may not be for you.,Overall it fits neatly in a pocket and unless you rely solely upon you smart phone this is a well priced option for quality pictures in general.

review: UPDATE: Still love the camera. Amazon sent me another (with a strap, brand new!) Great product, great customer service. I was going to delete my comments about my first order, but I think it's important to know how Amazon responds when something isn't just right and I appreciated the help. Great videos, great photos! Buy this camera!,I love this camera (have an older version) but I have a concern about the condition. It came with photos I didn't take on the internal memory. I'm not sure if this is a reconditioned camera and I'm not sure how to contact Amazon about that.  It also didn't come with a wrist strap (as advertised.),Pros: The lens is awesome. It takes great photos and great videos. Great resolution.,Cons: The flash isn't great but I don't expect a huge flash for a point and shoot. The door to the battery is a little flimsy (again, I knew what I was ordering.),It's a great camera and takes great photos. My only concern is why someone else's photos are on this camera!

review: Im giving it 3 stars because its not a terrible camera but you get what you pay for. I bought it because i wanted to record more videos, take pictures but I'm always running out of battery and memory on my iPhone so this cheap camera seemed like a good option. The pictures i took didn't come out well, Its hard to go from iPhone quality to this. Also whenever you take a pictures it takes about 2 seconds to process which gets irritating because sometimes an object is moving and you might miss it because the camera is slow. Again if you are used to the iPhone camera but looking for something like that quality but in a digital camera this is not the one for you. I will say that the battery on this is great, it only takes about an hour to fully charged, I was impressed. I returned the item, its been about a month at this time and i still have not received a refund.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: this camera is AMAZING!  I can't say enough about how many beautiful shots I have taken with it.  Last night I tried it out at the 4th of july fireworks.  I got some beautiful shots!  it's way technical and I know very little about anything other than the Auto menu, but I am very happy with the results.  The idiot button works!  happy, happy, happy!!!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have a very lengthy history with point and shoot cameras. I am a professional photographer so I suppose that I am spoiled by DSLR quality however Panasonic has never let me down. I bought a Panasonic Lumix DMC-ZS3 when it first came out. I was thoroughly impressed with the quality for the price that I had paid. Concert videos came out great and a lot of the photos were really good too. I still have that Lumix and my son now uses it.,After dabbling with DSLRs for a while I decided that I wanted a more professional level point and shoot. I bought a Canon G12 and while it had some impressive features it just was not what I expected from the reviews I had seen. It was okay during concerts (one of the main reasons I have a point and shoot) but it wasn't something I was excited to use. After I sold the Canon I went to a Nikon Coolpix. I am an avid Nikon fan. That is the only DSLR I shoot with so I figured the point and shoot would be just as good. I was wrong. The quality of the photos was horrible and I couldn't get a clear shot to save my life. The Coolpix quickly went back. I stuck with the Panasonic Lumix ZS3 for a while and then went to a Nikon N1 J3. Again, not great. I did not like how it handled but I have kept it around for a year.,I was browsing reviews for cameras that are great for my upcoming trip to Disney. I saw this Lumix FZ70 listed so I did some more research. After reading reviews here on Amazon as well as other sources such as Ken Rockwell I decided that I would jump on the low price that I paid. Yet again Panasonic did NOT disappoint. I got the camera this morning so I have not been able to fully test it and will definitely update when I do, but from what I have done so far today...IMPRESSIVE. The zoom is ridiculous and much clearer than I expected it to be at 1200mm!,Below I posted a macro shot (holy crap!) and also posted a shot where the lens was at the shortest and then the longest length to show the power of the zoom. In the shot where you can see the entire street I put a red circle around the car that I zoomed in on. The red circle is in the center of the photo, far far down the street. I cannot wait to get out there and test this camera's capabilities in Disney in a few months and then at a concert in May.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This has been the most wonderful experience with this camera.  I love the zoom.  The macro is working for me.  The Creative filter setting has been a great experience.  I cannot say enough about this camera.  If you want a camera at a great price with so many features it boggles my mind, then this is the one!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera and find any excuse I can to take it out and take pictures. The quality is amazing and the zoom is incredible. It takes some time to get to know how to use its features which I am still learning but I love it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I purchased this Panasonic LUMIX Digital Camera for my husband, as a Christmas gift. After extensive, research, online and in retail stores for several months, and asking for advice from several family members whom...enjoy photography and have experience with various camera brands...I made my choice. Not only for the specifications that I wanted, but also, for the affordable price, that included accessories, this Digital camera...has met our expectations. At this time...we are still 'working with all its' capabilities'...am amazed. We live in South Texas, and have not yet, explored all of what Nature has to offer...we are excited to venture out!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I'm a serious rookie when it comes to photography but this is definitely a great starter camera. It takes beautiful photos effortlessly and the range/zoom this camera has is unbelievable! Well worth the price. Which is a fair price at that!,Best of luck! ♥

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Incredible camera....telescope really gets you up close for razor sharp pictures......this is my second one......have one at each house...love this cam....

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Used for heavy real estate photography. Amazing wife angle without fish bowl effect. Handles backlight issues and great without flash. Great camera for the price-blows away past two canond

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera.  For just about 30% more cost than a pocket camera, it way outperforms one.  I got this before my Alaska trip, and boy was I happy to have it.  I got some bear pictures that look like I am in dangerous territory even though I could barely see the bear with my naked eye.  Awesome zoom.  The quality of the pictures are also quite good.  You can digitally zoom up by quite a bit and still have resolution adequate for printing.  It has lots of bells and whistles that I've yet to start digging in.  On the down side, It feels like it would probably break if I dropped it from a foot.  I've been careful so far.  So I don't know if it would handle a drop.  Since I don't really know, I cannot knock it.  Due to the picture quality per price alone, I highly recommend this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Well...I can't wait to upload some pictures I bought because with the 3D feature, the possibilities are endless and you don't have to be a "rocket scientist" to figure the gizmo out. I'm a Writeographer and the 60X zoom is the reason I went the Lumix route, without paying an "arm and a leg"! I'm a major budgeter and with my hubby retiring at 53, taking pictures to me is very important right now to look back on in our prime. Why pay $$500 on up for camera's because of the "brand" name or because it has more features than one could even use with knowhow. I love it so far and it's only been a week....will let ya know if this glee lasts. To me, nothing is any good if it doesn't go at least 3 years electronically minus any headache malfunctions:-)

review: I love it so far and I'm super impressed with how lightweight and tiny it is, as well as the picture/audio quality from what I can tell so far. review: I thought since the camera was a 20.1mp it would be a great camera but my iPhone 6S Plus takes better photos. The photos are not clear and a lot of the time it’s blurry. It’s not operator error either I’ve used many cameras and never have they been as bad as this one. I’m going on vacation so I’m going to use my iPhone for the photos. Don’t waste your time or money on this horrible camera.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: We got this camera for a 7 year old. It's compact and easy to use, but takes at least a second to respond after you press the shutter button. It also tends to select slow exposures (like 1/30 sec), even when using the flash. And it often simply does not focus. The result is that around 2/3 of the photos from it are either badly out of focus or show motion blur. It's frustrating because our daughter has a knack for photography and loves having her own camera, but this one is thwarting her efforts. I don't know if there are any good cameras in this price range; this one is pretty much a waste of money.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Takes great photographs, easy to use,  light, compact.  I think the screen on the back is a good size.  Nice zoom. 5x.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I am editing this review on 9-16-18 after having trouble with the auto focus and exposure. I have set the camera exposure to spot with much better results on the focus and the color/exposure of the photos under fluorescent lighting.  Photos look nice when exposure is correct and it is focused. Kinda slow to turn on.  I take photos of engines I build and am turning it on and off a  lot.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Before I begin, my previous camera was a Sanyo vpcT1496R 14MP camera.,The people that say their phones are better either have brand new phones, which some of them come with 13MP+ cameras....or got a defective camera.,This is a good camera. I can actually use the zoom and it isn't always a blurry blob. (It can still be a blurry blob depending on settings, but it doesn't have to be) I haven't really messed with any settings. I've put it to where the display shows standard and not the actual quality of the photo to save battery, and the pictures still look way better than my old camera. I can't wait to someday go to the zoo and take pictures with this thing.,The battery life is fine.,I bought this from Focus Camera on Amazon. I mention this due to the one problem. I got the European version and I live in America. It came with a European charger which isn't compatible with American plugs. It came with an adapter that isn't even listed in the parts that can come with the camera....which means this could've been a used camera (albiet one that was taken care of) since someone had to open it to add the adapter that doesn't come with it. The adapter could be a POS and cause problems. Amazon did fix it by letting me order a charger and refunding me the amount (Amazon, not the seller). Note: the authentic looking chargers (the ones that look like the one it was supposed to come with) are the ones where you take the battery out to charge it. Which I dislike because that means every charge....gotta put the date in and everything (warning for those who get the correct charger),Minus the charger thing, it's a good camera. It's fairly cheap as well. Sony usually has good quality in their electronics, though you can always get a dud.,Edit: Since reviewing this, things have changed: This thing is flimsy. Out of NOWHERE the part that pushes out and pulls in the lens broke so now the camera refuses to do anything beyond tell me to turn it off and on again. So I can't suggest you buy this camera unless it's the only half decent one in your price range.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This camera is crap.  The pictures are so blurry that I get disappointed every time I even try to use it.  I am better off just using my phone because the quality is better.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: It takes wonderful pictures but it has a terrible glitch!  The button used for taking the pictures gets stuck and you have to do it twice to get a picture!  As I bought this to take pictures of my puppy (now a dog), it's very frustrating because he is not going to stick around for me to get the pic!  I usually end up with a picture of the ground because he is gone by the time I punch the button twice.  Sadly, I have missed out on so many great pictures of him.  I have put up with this for a few years now but I am going to start looking for a new one now.  :(

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Okay, but not great.  For the cost of this camera and the specs it listed, I expected a better produce.  The camera itself feels cheaply made and the quality of the pictures were average.  It was also difficult to take pictures without getting blurry shots.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I bought this little camera for a trip because I knew I'd run out of storage space on my iPhone. It fits in a pocket, so it's easy to carry and handy. I could take all the pictures I wanted with this camera, but my iPhone is easier to use and those pictures were of better quality. Since the trip, this camera just sits. Eh.I'll take it on another trip, in case, but now I have a new phone with more storage, so this will just be my backup.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: no manual control of flash or focus. Focus impossible trying to focus on a ring stone when camera insisted on focusing on background. I could find no way to control lighting. Long wait for shutter to fire, couldn't tell exactly when. Normal snapshot operation & software o.k.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I always took it for granted that when I purchased a Sony product, the quality would be excellent. Unfortunately,after many years, that is no longer  the case and Sony has succombed to the competition lowering their standards,in the process. This camera is made in China, is flimsy, the LCD display is small and dull and the focusing mechanism,is erratic and undependable.. There is only enough internal memory to hold 3 photos, virtually useless.,I intend to purchase a Canon camera and hopefully, the quality standards will not be comprimised

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: Cheaply made...But takes nice pictures.,PROS,* The megapixels. If you plan your shots, and lighting is ideal, this will produce magazine cover quality stuff.,* Easy to figure out, which is a good thing. Quick start instructions included leave out a lot of details. You can download full instructions, however.,* Small and light.,CONS,* Cheaply made, kind of an expectation in this price category.,* On and Off switch is small, and you have to stab it hard to get it to work. I don't think it will hold up to many such "stabbings.",* Slow. You think you have a great shot, press shutter button, and it kicks in just as subject closes eyes or has moved to the next room. This is not the camera of choice if you want something you can just pull out of your pocket and grab a quick spontaneous shot.,Bottom Line: Nothing special. Nice pictures in quality detail, for sure. But it is not reliable. Slow. You will miss enough great shots as to make you want to cry. I am returning mine. But if you are determined and can live with the shortcomings, it may be good enough.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: It's a very good camera and it suits my needs well for taking progress photos of construction sites.  It would be better for me if it had a wider angle and if both the date and time imprinted on the face of the photo --it only imprints the date.

product_name: Sony DSCW830 20.1 MP Digital Camera with 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver)
review: I needed a new camera and refuse to pay a lot of money for a camera for every day use.  The price was perfect and I am really happy with this little camera.  It has many features on it and the pictures look wonderful.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Nice little camera for the money.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Compact and easy to use

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Bought for my daughter. She loves it! Great starter camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This camera worked great for a couple of months and then just stopped working. All my pictures come out blurry.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: gift for grandson who went to the Philippines

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Very nice great pics

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Great little camera.  Easy to use and fits in your pocket.  Just the right camera when your camera phone just doesn't do.  Hard to beat the pictures at 20.1 mega pixels.  You can really blow up the pictures to your hearts desire.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: A little harder than my old camera but I am older also. I just realized that I do not have a charger for this camera. None of my chargers that a living in a drawer fit the small hole on the camera. Where can I get  a charger

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

review: Great

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Great pictures and video.  I would definitely buy again.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 Digital Camera w/Image Stabilization and Smart AUTO Mode (Red)
review: Has a white line down the center of the view screen that is also in the pictures. For a point and shoot, not worth my time troubleshooting or waiting for a replacement. Supposed to be brand new, but acts like something refurbished. It doesn't look like everyone has issues with this camera, but with the competition available in the camera market, who has time to ship a cheap camera back and forth until you get a "good" one from the factory? Returning.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Have used it a lot

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Just what I wanted and ordered, very reasonably priced and came very quickly after I ordered it. Would definitely order from them again.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Works good. Would buy it again.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I will be returning this tomorrow unfortunately. The battery doesn't seem to be inserting correctly and I believe that is whats causing it to not charge as well. Too bad, it seemed like such a great bargain. The pictures posted with this seem to be of great quality.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Just Avery nice pocket camera

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: i like this camera for its simplicity and its at a very reasonable price. the audio is better than i thought it would be. the only thing i do not like is when i am filming and it goes in and out of focus and blurs, even when the camera is not being moved around. just something to keep in mind before purchasing, it will do that if you use it for film. pictures so far have been ok, no blurring that i have noticed.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: 4 stars for the camera, and 3 for the accessories.  The one thing this camera lacks is a threaded mount for filters.  Even if you are using the filters to protect the lens, it's important to have the security of a threaded mount, not some force-fit add-on.,Otherwise, my only complaint is the same one I have for any camera that lacks a real viewfinder.  On a bright, sunny day, with the sun overhead, or behind you, no matter how much you turn up the view screen, you'll have trouble seeing much.  Everything else works just fine.,As for the accessories, the tabletop tripod is fine, the rest of the stuff is nothing to write home about, and the rechargable batteries wouldn't hold a charge for 2 weeks,(unused).

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: It’s only the first day of opening up the mystery box and finding all the goodies inside. I bought it for my girlfriend’s birthday and so far she seems reluctant to have it. She hardly read through the manual and is figuring everything out; mind you she is a beginner in photography. So that’s an important note that it is not super complex. With that being said, it is more than a simple camera. With photos, videos, and blue tooth options I say this camera takes beginner to a different level. Not only did we receive the camera, but a bag for it, memory cards, rechargeable batters with the charging port, cleaning kit, a stand and other stuff we are still figuring out. Needless to say this was a great bundle. Will have more to say when more use has been put into it but so far so good.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera is noice, I’ve taken some pictures of my son and puppy and they have come out clear and beautiful pictures especially with the flash. I am taking it to Vegas with me next week so I’ll update on how it goes a week over there. The tripod was a little dented on the leg and stuck. It took awhile but I was finally able to unstick it so hopefully it still works right. The screen protector that came with it didn’t stick at all to the screen I ended up just throwing it away. The bag had all the camera cleaning stuff and I was surprised by how much was in there. The strap seems like it’ll hold tight, but I’ll let y’all know about that on my update of the review. So far I like it and I’m excited to use it at the wedding.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: My wife loves to take pictures, and has used a Nikon DSLR for years. But this camera is so powerful and useful to her that it will be her "go-to" for all quick snaps. She has tried it out in almost all scene modes and is very well satisfied with the results. And having the pics appear instantly on her iPhone is a great plus.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: So far, I'm frustrated. SD card that came in bundle is not compatible with camera, had to order another SD card because camera will only take 4 pictures then reads Memory Full. According to customer service that's how the camera is. That should be included in initial information and why send an SD card in bundle that doesn't work with camera? I'm also disappointed the only way to look at manual is to download it, no paper copies. Much more time consuming scrolling through pages than being able to flip through paper pages. I hope to heck once I get the hang of the camera I'll like it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This was a gift and it was the best gift to buy, fast shipping, packaged beautifully. This camera is amazing, the quality and ease is amazing. You can transfer photos from it via Bluetooth to your phone. It’s incredible. The red color is very sharp, the tripod is such a neat idea and perfect addition. Honestly I am just very pleased and my wife is extremely pleased with this gift.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera was nice but I was really disappointed with how I recieved it. Many items were missing and other items were not as depicted in sales pictures. I ordered red Camera but recieved the black one.. (not a huge deal but kind of disappointing) I ended up retuning the package due to missing items.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I bought this camera to replace my older one, similar model but this one is newer.  I love it!  Still learning how to use it but so far I am well pleased and all the extras are amazing. It's a battery operated camera and I like that as you can bring extra batteries, having to charge between uses was a pain.  This one came with 8 batteries, 4 are rechargeable in a charging box!  Wow!!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera itself and what we got have been great thus far seeing as how the wife just got it 48 hours ago. We did not get the mini tripod listed on the inventory sheet. My wife would have preferred to have the software in physical media form and not download codes. The box had a few indentions on it but the camera itself was not damaged, however the bottle containing the cleaning solution had leaked out somewhat and a few items were wet luckily nothing of real value was ruined. Overall I feel it was a good purchase for the money.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I was already familiar with the coolpix line from Nikon so it was super easy to use, excellent picture quality. This upgrade for me was great with the 16 mp and enhanced memory, the camera is also lighter. The only thing I do miss is this camera does not have an eye piece.  The only time that matters is when the sunlight is so bright you can't really see what you are shooting on the viewer screen due to glare.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Got this camera for my vacation to Disney world. For the price of the camera it takes really nice photos. I have nothing bad to say about this camrea.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Zoom does not work unless you are an expert photographer, if I was obviously I would never have bought this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great camera for the price. Solid low-light images. Great zoom. Long battery life. As hobby photographer, I found this a very solid addition to my iPhone 6 which I often use for quick pictures. This camera is much better at tradeshows and similar areas where lighting is not ideal. Still haven't tapped half the options, but if looking for a solid point and shoot camera, can't go wrong with this one at this price.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've had this camera for a couple of weeks now and have shot about 1500 photos with it.  I wanted a bridge camera that had a longer zoom than my fz200, didn't break the bank and was small and light enough to actually keep with me.  At 60x, fz70 has almost twice the optical zoom of my fz200 and I can still use the doubling lens I bought for the fz200 once I purchase an adapter if I need more than a 1200mm zoom.  Don't get me wrong, I love the fz200, the low light capabilities of the fz70 doesn't compare but the 60x zoom is nothing short of amazing.  The picture quality is fine for my needs (snapshots, travel photos, birding shots) and the camera is light enough to keep in my backpack.  I am a novice birder and the ability to get a decent picture of a bird a good distance away is helping me learn to id what I was missing before.  I am more than happy with this camera.,Pros:,- Did I mention it has a 60x optical zoom?,- Small enough to keep with me.  Can't get great pics if the camera is sitting at home.,- Picture quality is decent.  Not as good as the fz200 but you don't pay as much for this camera either.,Cons:,- Battery life.  Not great.  Can be extended by dimming the screen and turning off the setting to keep the focus motor going.,- File name conflicts.  Since I own two Panasonic cameras I have to be creative when importing photos.  There is no way to alter the file naming convention of PXXXXXXX.JPG so it is easy to overwrite files if both cameras are being used.  There is a site online that tells how to jump ahead in the numbering schema but that is just putting off the problem. [...]  I've resorted to uploading the files from this camera to a specific folder then running a script to change the filename from PXXXXXX.JPG to QXXXXXX.JPG.  An extra step I wish I didn't have to remember to do.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Note the optics are not as sharp as the Zeiss as on many other Lumix models.  The auto focus is also quite a bit slower and sometimes does not completely focus.  VERY LONG LENS, great for a non interchangeable lens camera.  This is OK to take to most concerts as the lens is fixed and not interchangeable.  Best I have found.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Was looking for a second camera body for an extended trip, but sought this one,upon recommendation by a friend.  I am very pleased so far.  It is light, for easy,carrying and for hand held focusing; the magnification is great.  The auto focus,is sometimes a bit slow, but eventually zooms in nicely.  Simple to operate.,Brief story about magnification:  friend took a photo of a person about 1/2 mile,away, then could not see the person with his unaided eye.  Later found him using,10 power binoculars.  Photo was clear.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Just took it on a once in a lifetime vacation, just getting it 4 days before I left.  It took fantastic pictures of the polar bears.  The fantastic zoom brought them right up close.  It is easy to use once you get used to the power switch and the mode switch so close together.  Pictures indoors, scenery outdoors;  I even got some pictures of the northern lights by using the self timer as a "remote switch".

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have a wonderful Nikon DSLR but wanted a portable camera with a long lens. The camera does an infinite amount of tricks and the zoom is just incredible. I have received so many comments on the moon photos I've posted on Facebook. I actually took a HAND HELD 1200mm shot of the moon and it came out perfectly. A tripod would would make that particular job easier, but I still got a great shot. Dollar for dollar, this is the most rewarding $300 I have ever spent.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: It feels great to really get a super deal. 20 mm to 1200 mm. F 2.8-5.9. Has a Hot Shoe. Must Buy at current low price. Love it as a backup and specialty unit.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: For brevity, the only thing I don't like is the way you choose aperture and shutter speed when in manual mode.  Earlier models used a tiny 'joy stiick' and they have moved to a thumb wheel.  It's ok once you get the hang of it but I preferred the older method.  Other than that I quite like this camera, however I do mostly shoot manual and have not played with the various 'modes', except for the movie mode which is great too.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: I consider myself a beginner and I love this camera and all the accessories.  One of my best purchases.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Awesome buy for that start up professional photographer. Everything you need here to get the game rolling!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: a good price for the camera alone  the canon lens is good, you can throw the other ones out, they are worthless  the rest of the accessories are useable  be careful with the tripod it breaks easy... love the camera though

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Great product. The packaging was not damaged. Everything arrived that was stated. Great picture quality. This is not a point and shoot camera. This camera takes great pictures and comes with everything you need to take professional pictures.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This package has everything you could want or need for amateur to pro photography! The price is amazing and it arrived very well packaged and on time!

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Best value you can possibly get! I was looking at getting the same exact camera from Best Buy, but for just the camera alone it was more than this entire kit.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: The camera itself it great and I'd give it five stars! Exactly what you'd expect from Canon. However I rated this "bundle" just one star, so I split the difference for my rating.,I feel duped by the accessorie bundle now that I've taken a few classes and am learning what I really need and what is worthless. Some of the accessories aren't even compatible with the camera!! And some articles I've read say their "filter lenses" might even damage your device.,That said you do get two memory cards, a tripod, a strap, and a table tripod that are useful... After some price comparison I don't feel too cheated. Overall I don't like the false advertising here and wish I'd done more research before I bought this bundle.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Picture quality is good. Stuff it came with is eh. Overall decent for the price.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter.  She recently expressed an interest in photographer and this camera is great for her needs.  Pictures look clear.  Ease of use is phenomenal.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: Its a good cam.,But i get some,parts which are not new. See picture. Seems like they,put returned items in my box. It was for my wife birthday, i was dissapointed when I saw it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: After reading the reviews I was skeptical about the zoom/focus.  After using the camera on a family outing...sure enough when I zoomed in on a subject..it was difficult to maintain a steady hand...and it appeared that my "close ups" were not going to be so good.  To my surprise, when I went to transfer the pictures to a folder..ALL the close ups were in focus and crystal clear. (Just make sure the shutter speed is set faster)  Every thing was delivered on time...seems to be a great "Beginners" camera for those who wish to be a little better than the average "Family Photographer".

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Awesome picture quality ! Not the most intuitive,,,there is a learning curve ! But if you stick with it it pays off with photo quality of far more expensive cameras. I called an 800 Canon number and the technical support tech was OUTSTANDING in her knowledge and patience ! Then there was a hawk in the tree in front of our condo, and I zoomed, and zoomed, and zoomed !!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: You get what you pay for. This camera took horrible photos. Sort of difficult to use too because it didn’t come with good directions. But after toying around with it, you can figure it out. I wouldn’t recommend this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Love this camera, great price. Love the zoom on this. The picture was taken from Garret Mountain in Paterson, 15 miles from New York City but I still got a great zoom on it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Takes great pictures/video and the zoom lens is absolutely super. In fact, I gave my Nikon DSLR to my grandson as this does everything I need and the picture quality is just as good. Further, this KIT includes all the basic stuff you would need to get going with a new camera. I particularly like the case that comes with it, very sturdy ballistic nylon fabric that holds what you need and is nicely padded with a strong removable strap. It zippers and snaps closed.,Very, very pleased so far

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Best starter camera I have found.  This is a light weight camera easy to use.  Extra battery and carrying case made this fir a great purchase. Love that there are different straps and ways to carry when and about. Pictures are crystal clear, excellent zooming capabilities for a starter camera, would deffenitly purchase again, willbeven advise others this product!

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: The camera came fine, but the instructions are in Italian...I'd like English so I can change my rating...can't find online.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Surprisingly good. Great bridge-to-a-bridge cam. Unsure which bridge or full-on camera to buy? Do your aptitudes align with the photo talents praised by friends and family? Two weeks producing with this little guy and you'll know what to buy and whether you should. I shot, filmed and staged for 4 hours on a single charge with marketable results. So tiny. Neat with a capital "O".

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: I could not use this camera because of card error faults.  I tried two different scan disks within the specification of this product  and the error persists.  Each time I inserted the card, I made sure that I heard the click when inserting the disk.  The camera does not work.  I am returning today for a refund.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Just received my Canon Power Shot and it comes with everything and more than what I expected for such a great price!,It takes videos, comes with a travel adapter, an extra memory card, and a memory stick to transfer to my computer.,What a DEAL!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I have been getting some great shots with it. Some out of my boat in high winds with boat rocking. The zoom is great. Here is one shot, I used the zoom in a very rocky boat at about 150 yards.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I LOVE THIS CAMERA. it's excellent for a beginer b/c you just turn the knob and does all the work for you. it also has a good zoom, but not one you can take off and replace with a better one when you b/come a better photographer. i can live with that, except that i want to take pictures of hummingbirds, dragonflies, tiny blooms on native plants and other small birds but if you zoom to much it b/comes blurry. still, i HIGHLY recommend this camera for its beautiful colors and excellent quality.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Great pictures and the app on my i-phone works great with the camera.  I can take picture using my phone and easily upload pics to app and can email or text them right away.  Highly recommend this camera

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: This camera is advertised for old people. Well, I'm old-er and I can't read anything printed on this camera.

product_name: AbergBest 21 Mega Pixels 2.7" LCD Rechargeable HD Digital Camera,Video camera Digital Students cameras,Indoor Outdoor for Adult/Seniors/Kids (Black)
review: Very easy to use.  For the price it would make a great 1st camera.  Perfect pocket or purse size.  Two batteries in the package was a plus.  2.7 inch screen looks nice and makes it easy to get a good shot.  Nice little camera.

Easy to use, easy to handle, great results.

review: I purchased this camera to make Youtube Videos. For the most part, it was very easy to use. I didn’t need to look at an instruction manual to figure out all the settings.,The pictures may look a bit blurred the moment you take a photo, but after you view your Photo Gallery, it looks really good.,For recording videos, I recommend this for beginner Youtubers. It captures a lot, it comes out pretty good, and you can add-on features to it like a microphone. I do recommend the microphone as it’s better for sound quality.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I purchased this camera on February 20th. I was looking for an easy and affordable camera that I could use for small trips and figured that I could use it for when my niece is born in August. Well, that’s probably not going to happen, because it is already not charging properly. The first few weeks it worked fine, and the pictures were decent. Not the best, but not bad either. Good for the price. I have only used this camera three times too! I assumed it would work good for at least a year, and so obviously a problem like this so soon after buying it, I’m extremely disappointed.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This camera takes decent if not good pictures or absolute crap, depending on what? Can't figure it out.,The exposure, white balance, the focus and sharpness is either a complete mess or acceptable.  For the price, it works ok, to keep in the glove box to take pictures after an accident.,Our other two Sonys are great, and so is the full frame Nikon, but this little bastard is a hit and miss all the way.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Got this for my 11yr old to take for her 2 week trip to aunt and uncles.  She absolutely loves it!  Great size to fit in her purse as well

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Bought this camera on April 19, 2017 worked great up until November 2018.  Wow what a disappointment. don't know how long this was suppose to work, but it should work for longer than it has. I never dropped it or did anything that would cause this to happen. It was very handy to grab and go. Pictures all turn out blurry even though it beeps to take the picture. Wish it still worked.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I took a gamble and ordered this camera despite poor reviews about blurry photos. I was hoping others were having operator error issues. I am an intermediate photographer and shoot with a DSLR most of the time. I was looking for a pocket camera for quick snaps when a bulky camera is not convenient. I tried every possible setting on this camera and 99% of the time captured blurry images. I returned the camera within 2 days of purchase.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 DSLR Camera with 18-55mm IS II Lens Bundle + Canon EF 75-300mm f/4-5.6 III Lens and 500mm Preset Lens + 32GB Memory + Filters + Monopod + Spider Tripod + Professional Bundle
review: This product came with all items I wanted, is about $100 higher compared to other marketers on Amazon, HSN and others, but when I got it today I'm so happy because It's great value for my money 😁😁😁👍

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The size is great, fits in my little leather cell phone case so I can clip it on my belt.  Seems to be made well.  My other one, similar size & features crashed at my sons wedding.  Very disappointing as thats why I bought it.  Had no problems what so ever with this one.  Have many Sony products, never had any problems.  Happy Camper.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I got this camera for my elderly mom who has limited dexterity and degraded vision after reading a review that rated it good for that case. You don't need to remove the battery to recharge it and also, it recharges through the USB data cable. It has a usable auto mode so she just turns it on and presses the shutter, that's it.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I bought 2 units, one for my 7 year old and one for my 9 year old.  We took a trip to San Diego and I thought t would be cool if they could create their own scrap books based on their pics.  The cameras held up well and they are still using them (it’s only been ~4 months but they use them a lot).  Great buy.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: The camera is great.  it's nice and small, it functions easily and the battery is still lasting off of the initial charge from almost a month ago.  The photo quality if great and I would highly suggest this camera.
