product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I have to admit I am pleasantly pleased with this camera. It came with everything described and it even came with extra non rechargeable batteries so I could turn it on and start shooting. Everything except the tripod was able to fit into the case, which is fine because where I'm using it I won't need a tripod.  Connecting it to my android phone with the Nikon Smart Bridge App was simple and easy. Being able to download the pictures to my phone so I can share them without a computer is an amazing feature. I would recommend this camera to friends and family.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I love the camera itself. My daughter is just getting into photography and saved up her money to buy this bundle. It came with the items shown, although not the exact items. The only thing we didn’t receive was the Paint Shop Pro x9 as displayed. I also checked the bundle items to make sure I didn’t misunderstand the picture and reached out to the seller and haven’t had much luck yet. I’ve read that there were download codes, but we got nothing. I’m willing to change my review to 5 if I can get this part fixed.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: My daughter saved all of her birthday, Christmas, and chore money to buy this camera for herself, and even at 12 years old, she takes really good pictures with it! She has only looked at a page or two in the manual, plus my husband has given her some pointers. The camera does all of the work for her.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Great first camera. Plenty of filters and options for my use as a vacation/family camera. For the money I like the value. Zoom is beyond expectations. Dislike the screen as I wish it would flip around to front  facing, however it is clear and works fine. Zipper pulls on case broke off immediately. Came up with homemade replacements easily. All in all though I would recommend.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This package came very quickly and the camera works great. The only reason for the one star, however, is that I was under the impression that I would be receiving a digital download of Paintshop Pro, which was sort of a deciding factor for me to buy this product. I did not receive any card or disc or anything of the sort which is very irritating.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Wi-Fi connectivity is advertised, and I bought this camera based on that premise so pictures could be uploaded to the computer in that manner. There is no Wi-Fi connectivity. What it does have is some proprietary connection using an app that is not even available for a Windows PC. Wouldn't have made this purchase had this information been clearer.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Just learning but the camera is almost easy to use right out of box.  The camera arrived a day early. My husband took it out the box and we started using it. The picture quality is great and love the movable screen,  Can take pics from any direction.  The availability of using  wifi and connecting to phone is also great. Can't  believe the price for the package deal.  Well worth it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Got the camera in for a trip we are taking to Europe. Everything is great, could not think of anything I would need to buy outside of this bundle except more memory cards. The camera took great pictures and videos, auto focus is good. The only downside for us was that the microphone would not pick up sound (conversation and narration) well, unless the photographer was doing the speaking. We anticipated this, so we bought an external microphone, unfortunately this camera (and all those in its class, Canon, etc) do not allow for external microphones, so we are returning it, as we have to buy a much more expensive camera to accomplish this.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Excellent seller. Everything was delivered on time and packed up nicely. All things in the photo were included. Great deal. I could not be any happier. Camera works perfectly and today I'll head into the mountains to give it the real test of quality.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: The camera has all the features that I need such as Wi-Fi am Bluetooth features. I'm able to control the camera from both my smartphone and my iPad  simply amazing.  I would have preferred to get a mean you will with the camera however I was able to go one line and download the manual

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera.it is like having a small telescope as a lens.the color and quality is really good.i bought this for the zoom capability but am surprised at the versatility.it will not replace my canon eos rebel t3i but i carry them both while out taking photographs.the price was fantastic and am more than pleased with the camera.I would like to add that I added some close up lenses and found it takes amazing close-ups.this is a really good camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I wanted the performance of a $500 plus camera and this camera fits the bill exactly for me at much less money.,In the Cathedrals of England it takes good pictures in poor light. With the small viewfinder selected it is good in bright sunlight.,The battery seems to last forever although an advanced warning of a flat battery would be good.,Overall a great camera.  And very light to carry.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Although I have had this camera for only a few weeks, I must say the FZ70 is one of the best values in digital camera. From here, all references to lens focal length will be in 35 mm film photography equivalent.,For about $300, you get a 60X lens that stretches from a heretofore unheard of 20 mm ultra wide to 1200 mm super telephoto, all in a relatively small and light package. Most super zoom cameras have a zoom range of 24X to 50X, and the wide end usually starts at 24 mm or 28 mm. You won't believe how much wider 20 mm is until you compare pictures of the FZ70 with "lessor" super zooms taken at the widest setting.,If you shoot video, the microphone's sound gathering capability will adjust with the zoom lens's focal length, so that even when you zoom in, you can get good sound from a distance.,Other than being an excellent value, the FZ70 gives you the ultimate in convenience. There is no need to haul a whole bag of heavy lenses in order to take different shots. The magic is in the size of the image sensor, which is 1/2.3 inch. This is much smaller than sensors in APS-C or Micro Four-Thirds cameras. But also because of its smaller size, it becomes possible to design a super zoom camera with an astonishing zoom range. If you use a full-frame camera, the zoom range is about 3X to 4X at most before the lens physical size, weight, and cost become prohibitive.,So the trade-off is image quality vs. convenience vs. cost. The FZ70 takes, IMHO, excellent pictures and video. It won't do as well in low light situations when compared to cameras with larger sensors, but the pictures and videos are still very good to excellent.,I prefer using the zoom lens on this kind (superzoom/bridge) of camera, because it allows quick AND smooth zooming action using the convenient, powered zoom ring around the shutter release. Most DSLR cameras do not have this feature; you need to twist the zoom lens itself, which cannot be done smoothly throughout its zooming range. This is especially important when shooting video.,If you want to know more about this camera, both before and after purchase, you can download two official FZ70 owner's manuals by googling "fz70 owner's manual". The Basic manual is 34 pages long, while the Advanced manual is 226 pages.,For me, I believe that the best camera is one that I can take with me all the time, without straining my neck, shoulder, or wallet.,I highly recommend the Panasonic Lumix FZ70 for convenience and travel photography. While others miss shots contemplating which lens to use and changing lenses, you won't. ;-)

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Purchased to take pictures and videos at my nephew’s sporting events. Need good zoom feature. Good camera once you learn how to use it. At first the controls and settings were cumbersome. Make sure you get an UHS or Class 10 memory card for best results.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I  bought this camera for our cruise and enjoyed using the camera during our trip.  It took a while to get used to all the options but once you familiarize yourself with the camera it's simple to use!  I love it and look forward to using it on future trips.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This has turned me into an avid amateur photographer! Have taken stunning photos! Has every feature I need, excellent value for the money.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great zoom, great photos and nice to use. Only one feature that I find lacking that was not too clear in the description .  The multiple burst mode. It does have this mode and it is fast but you only get 3 photos in a burst. Not so good if you are trying to capture just the right moment.,Takes nice clear video too. Just know you are not going to be able to plug an external mic into it. For the price, This camera is hard to beat.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is an excellent camera for the price with great functionality.  It does take some getting use to its operation, but once mastered gives outstanding photos.  I took this with me on a trip to Africa.  It took incredible closeup shots using the telephoto function.  Other people were carrying their $1,000 cameras that weighed 3 times what this camera weighs.  But their photos were not noticeable better.  I recommend this camera to any budgete conscious individual looking for a great buy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)

review: Its the best point and shoot camera I have ever had.  Its big and really makes me look professional because of its sophisticated design.  I also got bright detailed pictures that were taken in dark areas and poor lighting without the flash.  That technology really works in this camera.  I however had some problems in taking very close up shots without using the zoom, maybe it was my inability to set a function that allows that.

review: I bought this camera. I t worked fine for 3 1/2 months. Then it quit working. It won't stay on for more than two seconds. I bought a new battery, but that didn't help. So I contact the company that sold it to me. SURPRISE! They said the warranty only lasts for three months. When I bought it, it said there was a one year parts and labor warranty. THEY LIED! DO NOT BUY THIS CAMERA, IT IS JUNK, AND SO IS THE COMPANY AND WARRANTY THAT CAME WITH IT.

Honestly I should check the online manual to see if there are settings to adjust this issue; the auto / on / off feature can't be the only flash setting, can it?,Hey, its a Sony and it was < $70, can't go wrong.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: NICE CAMERA.  EASY TO OPERATE.  TAKES GREAT PHOTO'S.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I returned this camera. I found that it took terrible pictures compared to any other camera I have had. I have an older version of this exact camera and it is far superior. Not sure how it is 20 MP...everything looked blurry no matter what.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Best semi-pro camera you can get for its price range, definably a good entry level for semi-pro enthusiasts like my self looking to learn the magic of photography. Take a note and buy some filters with it too, and a nice strong Tripod, amazon offers a nice one from its basics line: https://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B005KP473Q/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o00_s01?ie=UTF8&psc=1

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I was used to a very expensive DSL for years. It was heavy and took brainpower. As I am now 63 I wanted a cameras with cool features but more user friendly with good pic quality. I was nicely surprised. However it would be wise to watch tutotials on YouTube as it makes it easier to learn the features.  I think this package deal u(is awesome. 2 Batteries and two S cards, as well as other goodies makes this a really sweet deal!!---

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I bought my first Canon (35 MM) while I was in the USN stationed overseas.  Had found out that the Navy photographers used Canon products and that was enough for me.  That was a used one and heavy....After my retirement, I bought a Canon Rebel which I still have.  (uses film so ..).  My next purchase was a Canon Elph which takes excellent pictures.  And,now this one!,The vision in my right eye has deteriorated and the Elph screen was a little small for me to see the scene like I wanted.  I love to take pictures and decided to purchase this one.  The quality of pictures is excellent, it is easy to use and the battery life is good, so far.  I have taken over 60 pictures and haven't had to charge the battery yet.,I am still in the learning mode but the camera reminds me of the first Canon I owned in the early 1970's.  The service representatives at Canon are outstanding.  I had to call them with the "Elph'" once when I couldn't get the pictures to transfer to the PC.  Most patient with me when I told them I was visually impaired.,This one comes with a small tripod, a nice case plus a few other accessories.  When the eagles soar overhead this summer,  I am in hopes of catching them in flight.  Plus, I live in the 'boonies' so lots of wildlife around my cabin.  Will definitely come back and edit this review if anything changes with this camera.,One other thing is that I don't have a cell phone as they don't work in the area that I live.  So, am unable to make a comparison with a cell phone.,Excellent, just excellent and I couldn't be more pleased with this Canon camera and my purchase.,Edited to add a couple of pictures taken the other night.  The first one is without magnification and the second picture is with the 50 X.  Am still learning the functions on the camera and having a lot of fun in the hills of Vermont...  And, hoping the full moon event will be a clear night...,Most highly recommended.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Has great zoom for a lesser expensive camera. Closeups great too. Everything advertised came with the order. Although I haven't yet used all functions, I am pleased with straight shooting. One question: there is a dial behind the shutter button bur no where in the manual does it tell it's function. Haven't figured out what it does yet.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I really like this camera!!! I'm not a professional whatsoever and the quality of the camera is fantastic!

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This camera is perfect. I wanted a beginner's camera so I can get used to everything and eventually work my way up to an expensive/pro camera.  The quality is 16mp, but the pictures still come out really good. It came with anything that I needed. 2 rechargeable batteries, the battery charger, mini tripod, 2 ss cards, screen protectors, screen cleaner,  a card reader  and the camera carrier. I'm not sure why people are complaining about the bag size but it fits perfect for my camera and a couple of other things. The couple of things I didnt like was the very complicated straps.. took me a min lol. and the cleaner was leaking. But nothing else was affected

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This is great camera if you need a cheap price daily carry snapshot camera or as gift for someone don't have one.  I order this camera for my parents as daily carry camera so they can capture some interesting photo of their daily life while I am not with them.  They love it because they are not tech person, they not even know all the features on their smartphone. I spend 5 mins to reading manual and setup the camera 10mins to explain to them how to use. After one hour they are good to go with this camera.,Pros:,1. Easy to use, nothing complicate on/off, shutter, zoom and menu button.,2. Super lightweight, maybe been use DSLR for while this camera just too lightweight for me, even lighter than my mobile phone.,3. Better than mobile phone quality picture (If you are mobile phone photographer NVM),4. Good battery life. This will save some battery juice for my parents smartphone.,Nothing is prefect there still something need to watch out.,Cons:,1. Poor quality on the LCD screen. If you loading your photo to your computer it will look so much better than you check it on the LCD screen on the camera.,2. So lightweight mean sometime you can't get a stable shot,3. Menu language limitation there only few major languages are available not many choice as other model.,4. Video quality is kind of noise but still acceptable.,Over all me and my parents both are happy with this camera.  They can always carry a camera to anywhere they going now. I mean for this price range and the quality we got I am happy with it. Of course if you are look for better image quality and rich features camera, look for other this just good enough for daily snapshot, you have to pay the right price to get the right quality tool.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: BEST decision I could have made

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I absolutely love this camera. Has so many good features. The only thing I have a quarrel about is the softness and noise at the telephoto end. But you can't have everything. The reason I bought this over the sx60 and b700 is this camera has better autofocus. And it's quite when zooming.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The camera is fantastic. I'm not going to repeat what others already wrote, but I wanted to add a few things:,1. Panasonic is using a strange folders naming on the SD card where the video clips are hiding. It reminds me Sony. Never understood why it is needed to have the video clips (which are MTS files and not AVI, MOV or whatever you saw before) buried three levels down in the card.,2. When the camera is turned ON, there is a strange noise that never stops but increases when the lens is extended. If you place your ear above the Mic, you can hear it well... When you switch the mode to Play, the noise goes away. It is there always and only when the camera is in capturing mode... all modes.,3. The Flash shoe, as nice as it may be, does not work with all mountable flashes. I tried the Nikon SB600 and no joy. When I press the shutter button to take a picture, the flash resets and recharges, but there is no flash light... So the shutter causes the short to tell the flash to reset, but not receiving the command to fire it, strange.,4. The lack of a lens hood is an issue, especially when you have a lot of light using the zoom. I found a rubber hood with a 55mm thread outside (that fits to the camera thread) and 55mm inside, so you can attach a filter to protect the lens. Of course, found it here on Amazon.,I've added a few images of a mountain and cactus using the different zoom settings. You can find those images at the Users Gallery above.,Although I have a few minor issues with the camera, I still gave it 5 stars because the number of features that are built into this body and the X60 zoom are just remarkable. I use a DSLR full time and adding this lens in a shape of a camera, as much as there is a difference between the two, is a great way to be more mobile. I am testing more features every day and will update this post with what I find.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I like it. Takes great pictures. Still learning how to use it. But so far so good ! Arrived quickly and in great condition!

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: My sister is not an accomplished photographer at all, but she found this camera at a local camera store and took it on our trip to Tanzania in February. I wanted a super-zoom too and got the Coolpix P530 because we use Nikon's at my office and I was very familiar with the interface. Well, this Lumix definitely outperformed my Coolpix. It has a longer zoom, which I knew ahead of time. I could not get the Coolpix to adjust focus when I shot video and zoomed in and out, there was audible noise on the zooms. And the Lumix has the ability to adjust photos in the camera, which is pretty cool and which we are all getting used to on our smartphones. When I got back, I returned the Coolpix and purchased this Lumix, and have not regretted it a bit. I'm sure I haven't taken it through all of it's bells and whistles, but so far, I'm very pleased with the purchase.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is working out to be a great camera.  I'm not a photographer, I just take pictures.  The FZ70 has replaced an older Panasonic Lumix model that I've been using for 7 years.  This new one is much quicker boot up, it focuses faster, it is truly spectacular in low light conditions.  As with all digital cameras, it has many functions which I will probably never use, but access to this camera's,adjustments and settings is much easier and more intuitive than the old camera.  In other words, Panasonic has produced a new model that improves greatly on the old model.  I'm glad I bought it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've used this camera for quite a while now, so that I could give my honest review.  I'm a professional photographer and I wanted a lighter, smaller camera for certain situations when it's impractical/hard to haul around my DSLR and lenses.  As familiar as I am with digital cameras it took a while to learn all the features and how to get to what I wanted quickly, such as auto bracketing, but I'm becoming faster with experience.  For the most part it's a wonderful camera, and I couldn't be happier with the amazing zoom.  I believe the onboard stabilization works well, and I've gotten some good shots provided the light is good and it's not extended quite fully. I've been happy with the overall sharpness. It's easy to handle and seems to be pretty sturdy. I'm still working with the white balance, as it tends to shoot towards the cyan side, but that can be easily adjusted later in post production.  I also like the macro feature. There are so many features and I'm having fun exploring all of them.,I do have a couple of gripes with the camera, the first of which is the amount of noise. I've read that others don't seem to see it, but I'm dealing with as high a resolution image I can get, and unless the light is optimal where I can shoot with a 100 or 200 iso setting I need to do a lot of post processing. (I could use a tripod, but if I was going to haul that along I'd bring the big camera.)  Low light situations do give you good color and sharpness, though. The other issue, and the most worrysome, is the delay in writing to the card.  There is a limited burst feature that can be somewhat helpful although it only gives you 3 shots.  I'm using a Transcend 32GB SDHC Class 10 card which has proven to be fast in my DSLR, but still quite slow in this camera. This means that it's not as good for some wildlife (or small children and dogs) shots and the like, as if your subject is moving you'll need to wait up to a full second between shots.,These annoyances are balanced with the price and features.  Everything dealing with photography is about compromise. :)  This the most I wanted to spend on this type of camera, and I'm very happy with the return on my money. If I wanted a little more more I would have had pay a lot more.,I've attached a few examples I took yesterday late in the afternoon, when the light was starting to fade. The first one of the tree trunk and grass was taken with iA which exposed with a 3200 iso, which as you can see is very grainy (to be expected with that exposure and conditions).  The second one, of the reeds, was taken with the zoom and aperture priority, with an iso fo 400.  The third one, skyline and blue sky, was also with an almost fully extended lens and iso of 200. These were all shot RW2 and are at 100% resolution.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: The zoom is fantastic. The macro is better on the  Lumix DMC-ZS19 . The photo's are much better than they appear on the camera. All over, I am pretty satisfied with this camera. It's a bit heavy when trying to shoot with the lens fully extended so don't try it in the wind.  I have been taking some pretty amazing nature photo's in the Florida Keys where I live. I would recommend it to anybody that doesn't want to carry 5 lenses when traveling. I

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I was looking at a Canon Powershot SX60, but the retail is $480.  friend bought one for about $409. Then I found the Panasonic DMC-FZ70 for $189 refurbished with no tax and free shipping! I read the reviews, and it sounded pretty identical to the Canon. I'm a near-professional photographer with 40 years' experience using every type of camera imaginable. I also like a bargain. So I bought the Panasonic. Even though it was refurbished, it arrived without a scratch and in perfect condition. It's an amazing camera; does everything; has all the bells and whistles; the viewfinder is essential for any ultra-zoom camera. Most importantly, it's so sophisticated that you just point and shoot your way to photos that will impress everybody. No fuss. No mistakes. Get this camera. It's a steal.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: I bought this as a gift for my daughter to replace her sony that broke. She loves it. Does exactly what she needs for a pocket camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Found that the camera produces low quality images when the flash fires.  Images are not sharp and the colors are off, also the images are fish-eye distorted.  My 12-year old Nikon Coolpix 3100 takes much better photos.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: it work great, love the price. take great pictures

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Best value for a camera. Takes nice 720p video, excellent pictures. Simple to use and simple settings. Decent zoom.. Happy with it.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: my favorite brand of cameras

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This type of camera is perfect for beginners while still having multiple options and settings to choose from. My only complaint is the magnification. The zoom is not that great, so if you're into nature shots go with something higher that 5x.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Cheap and not worth it. 3 months old and will not turn on. Try Olympus or Canon

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Its small. Maybe smaller than I like, but it takes great pictures. I keep it with me all times, you never know when that Photo Moment will come at you. Bought one for my best friend too, she loves it. The price was fantastic!

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: Got this for my mom for her birthday. She needed something SIMPLE, and easy to use. Slap this thing in "easy" mode and it's literally idiot proof. She's even had some nice shots with this thing + for the price you can't beat it for a beginner camera.

product_name: Sony DSCW800/B 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Black)
review: This camera was out of my imagination. I did not expected much and just want to have a better pic than my smartphone cam. However, pics turns out perfectly and love colors of the images

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I purchased this camera as a gift for my husband.  I knew it was not top of the line, but the reviews looked seemed to lead the way to an 'ok' product and that is what it is, 'ok'!  There are times that the focus isn't the greatest, but for the money it is good!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: So far the camera is wonderful and easy to use. I haven't had it very long but what I have used of it has turned out great. My only reason for giving a 4 was due to the photo paint shop editing software. I am unable to download it because the website says it's unavailable. Other then that the camera is great!

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I love this camera soooooooo much! I bought this for our trip to Germany and it did a fabulous job. I will say though, that the pics of stained glass windows in cathedrals were better capture from our iPhone. Other than that, this captured more than 2,000 WONDERFUL pics on our vacation! I love it's ease of use. I bought it one month before the trip and played a lot with it.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I cant accurately guage the rest of this camera, because it didnt come with an SD card as advertised. I have contacted customer support. Haven't heard back yet.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Awesome camera! Snapbridge works great although I did leave the connection up and pictures transferred to my phone as quick as I took them draining the battery faster. Zoom is fantastic. Autofocus is great, push half way until it beeps and shoot.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Battery dies quickly, and it freezes, I have to take the batteries out then put them back in so many times. Sucks when I'm on vacation or at my daughter's dance competition or graduation

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: Unfortunately I've had the camera for 6 months and I only use it on three occasions but I can never consistently get clear pictures. I've changed the settings I've read the book and I missed out on a number of good photos because the pictures are blurry. I'm attempting to contact the company to help correct the issue. This is my third Nikon camera I've always like this brand but not much success with the Nikon b500.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: What an easy camera to use. It takes nice pictures and the bundle that came along with it was just as great as the price which walmart is selling the same model at the same price (not including tax) with no bundle. Very happy with this purchase. Connecting it to my iphone was easy as well, very handy.

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: This is  a fun camera. Still leaning all the workings of camera. Good for beginners or like me want something easy.  I’m Not a professional.Dealing with Amazon and Beach Camera.  GREAT!,Also the best experience with Beach Camera dealing with an issue I thought I had. They jumped right in to solve my non issue to make things right. They mean what they say about making you a happy satisfied customer 🤩

product_name: Nikon COOLPIX B500 16MP 40x Optical Zoom Digital Camera w/Built-in Wi-Fi NFC & Bluetooth (Black) + 16GB SDHC Accessory Bundle
review: I travel a lot so I finally gave in and bought a camera. This one is okay, it doesn't have the kind of focus I was hoping for in a camera but it was on the higher end of okay, so I decided to keep it. This being my first camera, maybe I just don't completely understand how to use it's features. It's beyond nice that it comes with everything you could possibly need. The camera bag is HUGE though. So I'd recommend getting a smaller one.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I read all the reviews before purchasing for our 15th anniversary trip to Belgium. I loved it. The battery life isnt great, but I bought extras and a car charger. While I did have to change the battery, I never completely ran out of juice. The pictures are GREAT. I love the available filters.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This is honestly such a good camera and the set is so perfect for someone just starting out. I recently broke my camera and figured I’d try this one out and took it to the zoo to take some pictures and they turned out amazing!! 10/10 recommend.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This was a Christmas gift for our 15 year old granddaughter. She started crying when she saw what it was.  She LOVES it.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Had this for a little while and I use several times a week.  The pictures are great and it is easy to use, the battery last a good while.  But, the extra battery is a must.  Had a Cannon point and shoot camera before, but this is SO MUCH BETTER.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This is an amazing point and shoot camera.  The picture quality is great for my needs . The zoom is just what I need to get great shots of birds and deer  on my walks .,It is easy and convenient  for my needs and the wifi is great to quickly share those pictures.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: The Canon SX530 HS, I will say that it’s not a bad camera but for a person who is a beginner then yes. When you take the picture it make look blurry but when you look at the photo book then it’s looks mostly crystal clear. This is a great beginner camera but would recommend buying an adapter for like adding lens. The size is 67mm for the camera. For buying a lens adapter is somewhat cheap. I bought mine for $6.99

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: I have not yet used all of the features because I am a true novice to digital cameras. Have taken a few nature photos with zoom and am really happy with the ease of focus and quality of the zoom feature. I am looking forward to learning how to use the camera to its fullest.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: Great camera and good quality pictures. My wife is from the Philippines and all the girls there are born with a phone or camera in their hands. They as well as her enjoy their pictures. This camera was easy for her to use and has already taken over three thousand pictures in the first two months. It is sometimes annoying to me to take 23 pictures of the same thing but I am learning to deal with it. This camera makes it easy for me to snap that many pictures of my wife because I just point and shoot.  She loves it and if I only learn one thing in this life may it be Happy Wife, Happy Life.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: This camera has a great zoom and a very fast recovery time--many pictures can be shot in a second. I wanted to photograph butterflies in my garden. It is hard to do since they will not sit still long enough to get a camera ready. This camera can focus and shoot fast enough to actually catch a butterfly in flight. I am very impressed with the zoom.

product_name: Canon PowerShot SX530 HS Digital Camera with 50x Optical Image Stabilized Zoom with 3-Inch LCD HD 1080p Video (Black)+ Extra Battery + 24GB Class 10 Card Complete Deluxe Accessory Bundle And Much More
review: An easy camera to use. Images are descent. If you want pro looking pictures, get a pro camera. These pictures are way better than any cell phone. And the options/settings are so much more versatile.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Only had this a few days, but so far I am impressed. I wanted a small camera that I could carry at all times, with a descent optical zoom and not pay to much for. Picture quality is great for this size of camera and it is very easy to use.Has some great settings on it to get some cool effects and the video quality is brilliant. I transfer pictures straight to my IPad.Which means I can put pictures straight onto FB or send pictures to friends and family straight away. I have not had a chance to test all of the camera functions, but the ones I had needed have worked well

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I love that it has a wrist strap and little bag to store the camera in. She's having a grand time taking photos. We bought an SD card for 10 bucks to store the photos on; I'm not sure the camera would store them without it. Since it isn't marketed for children with a colorful kid-proof body or built-in games (which I really didn't want), it feels like the grown-up item that it is. It's easy enough to operate without reading the manual although some of the butttons are tiny and hard to see without reading glasses. The pictures are clear. I'd even recommend this for an adult who wants a basic camera with few frills.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I’m a fairly lazy person when it comes to returns, but I’m actually returning this purchase. To be fair to the company, shipping was much faster than expected which was great since I purchased this for my impatient 6 year old. However, quality of the product is FAR below the reviews. The camera is very cheaply made and feels like it’ll break in your hands at any moment. There is a switch on the side of the camera that changes between close up and scenic views that feels like it’s going to break the whole camera every time I use it. The camera never focused for any image (I’m experienced with photography and couldn’t get it to focus) and after fully charging the battery for over 15 hours it died after only 3 pictures. I would strongly urge you to reconsider purchasing this product and go with a better known proven point and shoot. For the time being my 12 year old Olympus point and shoot is still a significantly better option for my son and I’m disappointed that I even gave this a try.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I purchased this camera as a gift for my daughter-in-law to take pictures of my new grandson. The only camera she had was her phone. This camera is small enough to fit inside a diaper bag or small purse. The only thing is it does have to be periodically charged and one may forget to check it before that "must have" picture. Still, it's a good camera & she loves it!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Got this camera to use on vacation. The image stabilization is good if you only have minor movement and the zoom works pretty well. The camera struggle a little in low lighting but most shot footage outside which worked great. Overall, this camera was exactly what we were looking for. It was something cwe could take over seas to capture memories with but wouldn't hurt the bank if it was lost, broken or stolen.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: I used this camera from previous employer. I am no longer at that company so off I went to my local Amazon and now I am the proud owner of this wonderful camera! Size of camera is GREAT! Easily slips into my purse or pocket. Removable memory card (need to purchase separately). Quickly down loads all images and videos on computer.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: This is such a cute camera. It is similar in size to my phone so I can carry it around with me.The pictures it takes are pretty good! Not the highest quality digital camera, but I got this for the nostalgia feel and the instant photos. The camera acts more like a printer where the images come out fully developed compared to the slow develop of older instant photos.I love the fact that I can have a digital copy of the photos so I can give them away to friends.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: This will make a perfect birthday gift for my 11-year-old nephew, who enjoys taking "professional" photos and videos for his family and friends. 18 Mega Pixels,1080P high definition resolution, and a LCD display, this camera is a professional device. And extended storage should be enough for him to take many photos and videos. I've played with it for a little bit. It was easy to operate, and the picture/video quality were great. I'm sure he'll be very excited and happy to receive this gift.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: My daughter who is 7 took pics of all the family, the pictures are so retro ( and flattering) , yes the film can be pricey but the pictures everyone was admiring! We will keep them forever in a lovely pink album!,The chunky, easy to use design means all ages can manage it- not a lot can go wrong! Would definitely recommend a present that keeps on giving and encourages creativity

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Got this for my 8 year old daughter for birthday gifts as she loves taking pictures. She was so happy with it and has taken lots of pictures. Some aren’t always great but the majority of them are great for the size. I think she will capture lots of memories with this.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: The other half loves this because its easy to work, and that is all he needed ..but ... he got more?He got beautiful clear pictures too, that I'm able to enlarge (quite extensively) for him in Adobe PS without hardly any pixel blur.A nice little camera that does what it was meant for: point and shoot and you get a Brucey bonus with wonderful clear pictures to boot!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This was for my daughter - a camera cheap enough that I wouldn't cry too much if it got lost or stolen.,So I wasn't expecting much.,I did expect it to work all the time. In 30 minutes of trying, I got 2. After which it totally froze both times.,And those were the times it didn't:,Turn off as soon as you pressed the shutter,Screen turned solid blue (been a long time since I've seen a BSOD) upon trying to format the memory card,Went to a solid crosshatch and was unresponsive,Just turned right back off as soon as it powered on.,Turned on and froze and wouldn't turn off unless you held the power down for 10 seconds.,Turned on and froze and wouldn't turn off unless even if you held the power button for 30 seconds, requiring a battery pull.,The battery was horrible tight, and there's no way you can get fingers in, nor could you do even the gentlest of taps to help it out a little, because the skinny, flimsty, waiting-to-be-broken-off battery cover hinges on the narrow side, making it super weak. Luckily, I hadn't trimmed my nails in a few days...,Repeat ad nauseum for a full 30 minutes.,Then it let me take 2 pictures.,Well, maybe I won't right a stinker of review if the pics are OK.,They're awful, look at the grain, blurriness - and this only at ISO 640!,If this was 10 years ago, it'd be fine.,But I can spend $40 and get a action camera with WiFi, with a waterproof case, that I bought because I wanted something I was less afraid to take risks with. It's been to Hawaii, snorkeling, it's been on a 30ft selfie stick tacking pictures in a factory, mountain biking, hung out the side of a convertible - flawless. And the image quality on that is MUCH better.,The only reason I got this instead, is that the action cam is a fixed, super-wide fisheye - not great for photography, but fine for oddball landscapes or action shots - it's pretty niche.,The unreliability I can forgive, but I know what the bathtub curve is and sometimes it just sucks to be one of the people at the top, on the start of that graph.,But this is 2005 CMOS camera quality. I dunno how the heck everyone else can think this is passable quality. A dirt-cheap 'burner' phone does better. A lot better.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Smaller is definitely NOT better - especially when it comes to inexpensive electronics.  To begin with, the micro-font instruction manual states that the package includes a digital camera, ProTags Express Software Installation CD, USB cable, User's instruction manual, Strap, Camera bag, Lithium battery, and a charger.  There is no CD nor is there a charger in the kit.  In fact, I called Amazon to send a second camera for the missing parts, and they were not in the second shipment either.  Second, it is nearly impossible to configure the camera with optimum settings.  I am not unfamiliar with cameras and electronics, but I had trouble paging through the settings.  I even had a highly skilled techie friend try to set up the camera and the best we could get out of any of the pictures were grainy shots less than 2 megabytes.  This product is not worth the time it takes to open the box. Don't waste your money. No way this camera shoots a 21 MP image.  I think they are missing a decimal point in the description.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: I have got it as a present from my partner and was absolutely thrilled when I opened up the box.,It is rarely easy to use something for the first time. Probably the first 5-10 photos you’ll take won’t be perfect but be patient because it is so much fun to use this camera once you get a hold of it.,Pretty good quality for the price and I really like that I can just give the photos to people and they can keep it in their phone cases or wallets. Many great memories kind of get lost in your phone but these can be close to you all the time

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Just got this camera today. I've been shooting video on it and taking photos. I think it's a good quality. Obviously there are better cameras but this is just perfect for what I need right now.Great for the price

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Ok some photos are a mass of white or dark but isn’t that part of the art when trying to get the shot. It’s all learning.,This camera is owned by an 8 year old and she loves it. She took the pic in this review as well. It’s a piece of independence and you actually have a physical product for once amongst everything else that’s now digital. Just don’t be expecting iPhone X quality and just appreciate this for what it is.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: Great little camera and quite simple to use. You need to buy a suitable SD card when you buy this camera. Really compact which makes it easy to carry around. Was easy to download the software on my PC to enable photos to be downloaded. For such a small camera I am very impressed with the photo quality and the zoom feature is very smooth

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This was very easy to setup, it connected straight to my wifi in the house and I could view the video clearly on my android phone. I tested it for a few days looking out the utility room window and all was well. I then installed into the coop and even though this is 70ft from my wifi router it connected ok and the video is nice and clear.,Pan & tilt work as they should, all round a good camera and does all that I need it too.,My only gripe is that I can't find any software that runs on a Mac to view this camera, which is a shame. If anyone know of any please let me know.,Photo taken in the pitch black, pretty good hey.

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: I bought this camera for our unplanned trip. During the past years my husband and me we take our holiday in the same time but we do not plan were to go. I install the camera very easy – it can be see that in order to see how it makes pictures or videos I used in our yard. The image and video are qualitative and as can be see in the attached pictures from our holiday

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,21MP Point and Shoot Digital Video Cameras-Travel,Camping,Gifts (Black 1)
review: This camera is great! I bought it as a backup as I had bought a cheaper one and wasn’t sure whether it would work properly.,This camera is fantastic; it’s easy to set up, gives you a 360 view, and the quality of the picture is brilliant.,I went to my sisters who lives about five to ten miles away and the camera connected flawlessly and I managed to scare my dad with it!,I will be using this to keep and eye on my baby when I can not be in the same room with him.,I am extremely happy with this purchase

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Camera is great. Accessories are not germane and are redundant. Wish I would have just purchased the camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I love the color, the size and ease of using.  The accessories, I have used some and some I have not.  I am happy with the purschase.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: This was a birthday gift for my 15 year old.  It is being used a lot and takes great pictures.  I recommend this camera.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: I needed to replace my old Sony camera that broke when my toddler got ahold of it. I love cannon so I decided to purchase the pocket cam perfect for trips on the go!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Everything is exactly as described

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Just what I needed...all inclusive, everything you need in one!

product_name: Kodak PIXPRO Friendly Zoom FZ43-BK 16MP Digital Camera with 4X Optical Zoom and 2.7" LCD Screen (Black)
review: Product is defective and have not been able to return.

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Great camera, bought it for my mom

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle
review: Everything you need!  I haven't used it yet, but I am going on a trip and will use it a lot!

product_name: Canon PowerShot ELPH 180 20 MP Digital Camera (Red) + 32GB Card + Battery and Charger + Accessory Bundle

review: Perfect for a very small pocket camera.Just be realistic in your expectations. No small sensor camera will do well in low light conditions.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: We've gotten used to the ubiquity and usability of cameras on smartphones and tablets, so this is in some ways a step back but the ease of use and picture quality makes up for it. Plus, it's a low-cost device that can go many other places I have no intention of taking a more expensive device to (beach trips, hello).

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I took this with me on vacation.  It was easy to use and I was able to take great photos even from the train.  There is a slight delay between pushing the button and getting the picture, which made taking photos from a moving vehicle a challenge.  The battery life was great, but I do recommend carrying an extra.  You also need a memory disc because the camera's storage capacity is very small without it.  Picture sharpness and color are excellent.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Takes good photos and worked great for the couple months I had it. Dropped the camera from about waist height and it wouldn’t work anymore. Ended up getting a more durable camera after. Even tho me dropping the camera is obviously my fault, I feel like a minor drop shouldn’t be so serious.

review: My son has a developmental disability, and can not use a smart phone. This is very easy for him to use, and he is very happy with it.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I've had this camera for only three days. I've taken over a thousand photos and cant believe what a great camera it is. It takes fantastic photos. The zoom is incredible, There are so many features that it's mind boggling.. well maybe me being 70 has something to do with that boggled mind.. I have a few cameras and one is a Nikon d3200 with 4 lenses and a gazillion attachments and assorted gizmos.. I wish I had bought this one first. It does everything the Nikon does and more and only weighs a fraction of the Nikon. For the price of this camera you cant go wrong. Enjoy.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love my FZ70 taking pictures and videos of the moon and Jupiter zooming in on snow covered mountains here in North Idaho. Did I say I love my fz70. Only have had it a week can't wait for another clear night to take more pictures and videos. And I hope the Elk come back that were out in the field in front of my house. Have some great shots of dear and Canadian geese. Did I say I love my fz70.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I think many people including me bought this camera because of its 60X zoom.  The zoom is remarkable, but after you use the camera for a while you find out some wonderful things that are not really talked about.,First, the camera does a remarkable job recognizing back lite scenes and compensates remarkably well.  If for example you open the flash and there is a bright window behind the person whose picture you are taking it compensates perfectly.  Often it can compensate for back lite without the flash, but it will remind you when back light requires flash.,Second, with flash skin tones are remarkable.  Also, most flashes on little cameras wash out at close range this one doesn't.  It also compensates so that you don't find people up close are overexposed while everything in the background goes dark.  Obviously this only works up to a point.,I always shoot with the the red label (iA). you have nothing to lose and much to gain. This provides a modest HDA exposure that doesn't scream "manipulation" and also, I believe, provides some sharpening.,Even with a sturdy tripod it is just about impossible to keep the camera steady while pushing the shutter button at 60X.  So use time delay with your tripod on long shots.,Robert I. Rhodes

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera!  Great photos and easy to use.  Plenty of options is you want to get fancy, but great automatic shots for most of us.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I gave it 5 stars in reference to the price. While you'll never mistake the photos taken by this for photos from a nice dslr, for the money this camera performs really well. The balance is a little strange since the majority of the weight is the excellent zoom, but is comfortable enough in the hand for the average application. High speed shooting is definitely not a strength; it's not recommended for birding unless you're comfortable being very persistent and are prepared to shoot A LOT, which is unacceptable to most birders. Indoor shooting is okay in most lighting conditions, though it struggles in low light. The flash is powerful for a pop-up, as with all cameras the learning curve for indoor shots is a bit steeper. I may sound a bit negative, but overall I really like the performance vs. price. For the average user, I highly recommend this product.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great camera for non-professional wildlife photography. Great resolution of 18Mp for photos, 4K for videos, videos in slow motion, panoramic photos, many manual configurations or totally automatic for those who prefer. The zoom is impressive, reaching 60x at 18Mp or 120x at 9Mp. Excellent value for money. For maximum performance UHS1 - 3U SDSX memory is required.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: This is very good product and the features work good,just found a mode that u can enhance pics with as color might be off due to lighting,works great and clarity of pics at x60 is very good,not a camera expert but do take many pics and play around with different modes available 2 see what looks better

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: LOVE IT, love it. The pictures are great. The controls are not as easy as the Pentax that I returned before buying this, but the picture quality is better the zoom lens is astonishing! The only drawback is the manual. The one provided with the camera is scant on information, enough to get the owner up and running,but not much else. I needed more detail. A manual comes on the cd to be downloaded and then printed if desired, however, I could not get it to print. I wound up ordering the manual from a third party, so now I have the manual that should have come with the camera in the first place. Who in the world is going to carry a computer around all over the place so that he or she can refer to it while getting accustomed to the camera. Not me, that is for sure. Great camera and seems to be well built and sturdy also. I hightly recommend this camera.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I love this camera.It works beautifully in all settings and takes great shots.The only bad thing is im still waiting for the picture storage card,its going on three weeks and it hasnt even shipped yet.Cant they make a card to work with the camera?Whats the story on this,getting very impatient about this.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Did a video of my grandson's eight grade jazz band performance in the school aud.  We sat more than half way back. I used MP4 FHD and iA+ plus beyond 60X optical and adjusted the exposure for the overhead lighting. The resulting video was sharply focused and skin tones were natural. So close that he seemed to be standing in front of me.,At 10MP, iZoom enabled 151X optical.  Excellent camera for long zoom enthusiasts at a low price.

review: This camera is good for the purpose that I want it for.  It is compact, easy to set up and use.  There are a variety of customized settings that can be easily changed.  The lens has definite limitations - there is less resolution than on my other cameras of the same type.  Not so good for close-ups.  It was a reasonable price for small general utility camera.  I'm satisfied.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: A great point and click camera.  The flash lights up the entire scene in the dark.  My company uses these cameras in our day to day business.  They are compact and easy to carry.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This is my first digital camera.  I am 72 and not well versed in modern technology.  I live in the past and am coming kicking and screaming into the modern age.  The camera seemed intimidating.  I learned most of the operating procedures from the manual.,After I learned how to take photos, I had to learn how to transfer them to my PC.,I was lost until a young neighbor showed me how to do it.  Photos can be accessed either by using the memory card or connecting the camera to the PC via a USB port.,If an old guy like me can operate this camera, so can you.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I needed a camera that will date and time stamp the photos. It puts the date and time on the reviewed pictures, but when you download only the date appears. For my husbands business he needs date and time. Otherwise a very easy to use camera.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: I can't believe they sold this camera and didn't both to put a cheap SD card in the box.  It is small enough to fit in your pocket, easy to use. We will see how it goes

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: This takes the worse pictures of any camera I have ever used.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: A great camera. Huge zoom feature. Easy to learn and use the bells and whistles. I have two 20x small cameras that I love, too. One thing that I like about Panasonic is their picture menu system that lets you easily in one place select landscape, portrait, food, animals, sports etc etc. All their cameras use this same easy menu. For the mentally challenged as I am learning cameras this feature is so helpful ! ;-))

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: Great camera. Yes it does make a slight very tiny noise when you have it on that doesn't get noticed by any animal I've took a pic of but that is the awesome image stabilizer at work. Takes great videos too with good sound. Hard to beat for the money. Had this camera about a year. Starts up fast. Focuses fast. I took a pic of an ant at 60x zoom from about 7 feet away in focus. Great for the non professional. Macro close pics are great too.

product_name: PANASONIC LUMIX FZ80 4K Digital Camera, 18.1 Megapixel Video Camera, 60X Zoom DC VARIO 20-1200mm Lens, F2.8-5.9 Aperture, POWER O.I.S. Stabilization, Touch Enabled 3-Inch LCD, Wi-Fi, DC-FZ80K (Black)
review: I have taken nearly 1200 photos and videos with the camera since I've had it for about a month. Attached you'll find photos from a Texas Rangers game I attended that I took sitting on the TOP row between home plate and 3rd base. Evening game with no stand set on Automatic. Picture of baseball was of ball left by pitcher's mound between innings and zoomed all the way in. Other than that, I've used it mostly for pics of the 4 month old and it does absolutely fantastic.

review: I am a retired art teacher who focused on so much other media in the arts.  This is my very first true camera to explore new options,  I love it!!  It is a little more involved than a traditional point and shoot camera. Yet, it is not overwhelming to learn.  Anyone with a sincere photo interest should start with this camera. It is a great camera to start learning the camera basic mechanics  and practice artistic subject matter and concepts. Buy it and then let the fun begin!!  You won't regret it for one minute...

review: Just got this camera today. I've been shooting video on it and taking photos. I think it's a good quality. Obviously there are better cameras but this is just perfect for what I need right now.Great for the price

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Bought this camera to replace an old snapshot camera. Really like this one! Great photos. Takes pictures quickly so you don't lose that special shot. Good quality too. Telephoto works great and is intuitive. Pull the lever toward you to get closer to your subject, push to decrease. Takes video too although I haven't used it for that yet. Lightweight, slim and compact. Great all around snapshot camera!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: or snapshots use the auto settings.zoom in on them and you see the oil painting ISO boost artefacts.for perfect pictures go to program mode and limit ISO to 200it is in my pocket or camera bag all the time.for full zoom my shaky grip needs a lightweight tripod but it pays off in buckets.battery life incredible, I only charge it when I am bored!video is amazing for the size and pricethe motion shot function is not a real option, get the app for your phone instead.never use it with phone link or wifi so not much to say.

product_name: Canon EOS Rebel T6 Digital SLR Camera with 18-55mm EF-S f/3.5-5.6 is II Lens + 58mm Wide Angle Lens + 2X Telephoto Lens + Flash + 48GB SD Memory Card + UV Filter Kit + Tripod + Full Accessory Bundle
review: My girlfriend loves it 😍

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: This camera is perfect for trips, parties, and really any thing that you would love to have a portable memory of. The pictures are credit card sized and are actually pretty cool because you can fit them into your wallet, but just as easily combine them for a collage or scrapbook or something. Every single place I've brought this thing, it's been a hit, and people love taking instant pictures that they can carry around with them everywhere. Almost like a portable photo booth. The only downside to this camera is that if you use it a whole lot, the film packs can get pretty expensive, and they sort of fluctuate on pricing from time to time. But hey, if a picture is worth a thousand words, then the memories made from the pictures are absolutely priceless!

product_name: HD Mini Digital Cameras,Point and Shoot Digital Cameras for Kids Teenagers Beginners-Travel,Camping,Outdoors,School (Red 1)
review: Ok some photos are a mass of white or dark but isn’t that part of the art when trying to get the shot. It’s all learning.,This camera is owned by an 8 year old and she loves it. She took the pic in this review as well. It’s a piece of independence and you actually have a physical product for once amongst everything else that’s now digital. Just don’t be expecting iPhone X quality and just appreciate this for what it is.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: Nice enough camera. Easy to setup. Good picture quality. Biggest drawback is the camera was received with a type g plug for the power adapter. Fine if you live in the UK, but I live in the states. Contacted Amazon and they promptly issued a refund for the price of buying a new adapter plug. Thanks Joanne G @ Amazon for all the help.

product_name: Sony (DSCW800) 20.1 MP Digital Camera (Silver)
review: While taking video, right out of the box, the autofocus constantly refocuses. I have tried everything I can figure. I am not a professional, just an advanced amateur, techy person. Very dissatisfied. I own an A6000 and am very happy. I use this camera for carrying around in the pocket for general shooting. Not happy at all. Will give it away and buy another non-Sony camera.
